Source for file nusoap.php

Documentation is available at nusoap.php

  1. <?php
    2.

    3.

    11. 

  11. modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public
    12. 

  12. License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either
    13. 

  13. version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
    14. 

  14.  
    15. 

  15. This library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
    16. 

  16. but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
    17. 

  17. MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU
    18. 

  18. Lesser General Public License for more details.
    19. 

  19.  
    20. 

  20. You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public
    21. 

  21. License along with this library; if not, write to the Free Software
    22. 

  22. Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA  02111-1307  USA
    23. 

  23.  
    24. 

  24. If you have any questions or comments, please email:
    25. 

  25.  
    26. 

  26. Dietrich Ayala
    27. 

  27. dietrich@ganx4.com
    28. 

  28. http://dietrich.ganx4.com/nusoap
    29. 

  29.  
    30. 

  30. NuSphere Corporation
    31. 

  31. http://www.nusphere.com
    32. 

  32.  
    33. 

  33. */
    34. 

  34.  
    35. 

  35. /* load classes
    36. 

  36. // necessary classes
    37. 

  37. require_once('class.soapclient.php');
    38. 

  38. require_once('class.soap_val.php');
    39. 

  39. require_once('class.soap_parser.php');
    40. 

  40. require_once('class.soap_fault.php');
    41. 

  41.  
    42. 

  42. // transport classes
    43. 

  43. require_once('class.soap_transport_http.php');
    44. 

  44.  
    45. 

  45. // optional add-on classes
    46. 

  46. require_once('class.xmlschema.php');
    47. 

  47. require_once('class.wsdl.php');
    48. 

  48.  
    49. 

  49. // server class
    50. 

  50. require_once('class.soap_server.php');*/
    51. 

  51.  
    52. 

  52. // class variable emulation
    53. 

  53. // cf. http://www.webkreator.com/php/techniques/php-static-class-variables.html
    54. 

  54.  
    55. 

  55. $GLOBALS['_transient']['static']['nusoap_base']->globalDebugLevel = 9;
    56. 

  56.  
    57. 

  57. /**
    58. 

  58. *
    59. 

  59. * nusoap_base
    60. 

  60. *
    61. 

  61. * @author   Dietrich Ayala <dietrich@ganx4.com>
    62. 

  62. * @version  $Id: nusoap.php,v 1.94 2005/08/04 01:27:42 snichol Exp $
    63. 

  63. * @access   public
    64. 

  64. */
    65. 

  65. class nusoap_base {
    66. 

  66.     /**
    67. 

  67.      * Identification for HTTP headers.
    68. 

  68.      *
    69. 

  69.      * @var string 
    70. 

  70.      * @access private
    71. 

  71.      */
    72. 

  72.     var $title = 'NuSOAP';
    73. 

  73.     /**
    74. 

  74.      * Version for HTTP headers.
    75. 

  75.      *
    76. 

  76.      * @var string 
    77. 

  77.      * @access private
    78. 

  78.      */
    79. 

  79.     var $version = '0.7.2';
    80. 

  80.     /**
    81. 

  81.      * CVS revision for HTTP headers.
    82. 

  82.      *
    83. 

  83.      * @var string 
    84. 

  84.      * @access private
    85. 

  85.      */
    86. 

  86.     var $revision = '$Revision: 1.94 $';
    87. 

  87.     /**
    88. 

  88.      * Current error string (manipulated by getError/setError)
    89. 

  89.      *
    90. 

  90.      * @var string 
    91. 

  91.      * @access private
    92. 

  92.      */
    93. 

  93.     var $error_str = '';
    94. 

  94.     /**
    95. 

  95.      * Current debug string (manipulated by debug/appendDebug/clearDebug/getDebug/getDebugAsXMLComment)
    96. 

  96.      *
    97. 

  97.      * @var string 
    98. 

  98.      * @access private
    99. 

  99.      */
    100. 

  100.     var $debug_str = '';
    101. 

  101.     /**
    102. 

  102.      * toggles automatic encoding of special characters as entities
    103. 

  103.      * (should always be true, I think)
    104. 

  104.      *
    105. 

  105.      * @var boolean 
    106. 

  106.      * @access private
    107. 

  107.      */
    108. 

  108.     var $charencoding = true;
    109. 

  109.     /**
    110. 

  110.      * the debug level for this instance
    111. 

  111.      *
    112. 

  112.      * @var    integer 
    113. 

  113.      * @access private
    114. 

  114.      */
    115. 

  115.     var $debugLevel;
    116. 

  116.  
    117. 

  117.     /**
    118. 

  118.     * set schema version
    119. 

  119.     *
    120. 

  120.     * @var      string 
    121. 

  121.     * @access   public
    122. 

  122.     */
    123. 

  123.     var $XMLSchemaVersion = 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema';
    124. 

  124.     
    125. 

  125.     /**
    126. 

  126.     * charset encoding for outgoing messages
    127. 

  127.     *
    128. 

  128.     * @var      string 
    129. 

  129.     * @access   public
    130. 

  130.     */
    131. 

  131.     var $soap_defencoding = 'ISO-8859-1';
    132. 

  132.     //var $soap_defencoding = 'UTF-8';
    133. 

  133.  
    134. 

  134.     
    135. 

  135.  
    136. 

  136.     /**
    137. 

  137.     * namespaces in an array of prefix => uri
    138. 

  138.     *
    139. 

  139.     * this is "seeded" by a set of constants, but it may be altered by code
    140. 

  140.     *
    141. 

  141.     * @var      array 
    142. 

  142.     * @access   public
    143. 

  143.     */
    144. 

  144.     var $namespaces = array(
    145. 

  145.         'SOAP-ENV' => 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/',
    146. 

  146.         'xsd' => 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema',
    147. 

  147.         'xsi' => 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance',
    148. 

  148.         'SOAP-ENC' => 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/'
    149. 

  149.         );
    150. 

  150.  
    151. 

  151.     /**
    152. 

  152.     * namespaces used in the current context, e.g. during serialization
    153. 

  153.     *
    154. 

  154.     * @var      array 
    155. 

  155.     * @access   private
    156. 

  156.     */
    157. 

  157.     var $usedNamespaces = array();
    158. 

  158.  
    159. 

  159.     /**
    160. 

  160.     * XML Schema types in an array of uri => (array of xml type => php type)
    161. 

  161.     * is this legacy yet?
    162. 

  162.     * no, this is used by the xmlschema class to verify type => namespace mappings.
    163. 

  163.     * @var      array 
    164. 

  164.     * @access   public
    165. 

  165.     */
    166. 

  166.     var $typemap = array(
    167. 

  167.     'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' => array(
    168. 

  168.         'string'=>'string','boolean'=>'boolean','float'=>'double','double'=>'double','decimal'=>'double',
    169. 

  169.         'duration'=>'','dateTime'=>'string','time'=>'string','date'=>'string','gYearMonth'=>'',
    170. 

  170.         'gYear'=>'','gMonthDay'=>'','gDay'=>'','gMonth'=>'','hexBinary'=>'string','base64Binary'=>'string',
    171. 

  171.         // abstract "any" types
    172. 

  172.         
    173. 

  173.         'anyType'=>'string','anySimpleType'=>'string',
    174. 

  174.         // derived datatypes
    175. 

  175.         
    176. 

  176.         'normalizedString'=>'string','token'=>'string','language'=>'','NMTOKEN'=>'','NMTOKENS'=>'','Name'=>'','NCName'=>'','ID'=>'',
    177. 

  177.         'IDREF'=>'','IDREFS'=>'','ENTITY'=>'','ENTITIES'=>'','integer'=>'integer','nonPositiveInteger'=>'integer',
    178. 

  178.         'negativeInteger'=>'integer','long'=>'integer','int'=>'integer','short'=>'integer','byte'=>'integer','nonNegativeInteger'=>'integer',
    179. 

  179.         'unsignedLong'=>'','unsignedInt'=>'','unsignedShort'=>'','unsignedByte'=>'','positiveInteger'=>''),
    180. 

  180.     'http://www.w3.org/2000/10/XMLSchema' => array(
    181. 

  181.         'i4'=>'','int'=>'integer','boolean'=>'boolean','string'=>'string','double'=>'double',
    182. 

  182.         'float'=>'double','dateTime'=>'string',
    183. 

  183.         'timeInstant'=>'string','base64Binary'=>'string','base64'=>'string','ur-type'=>'array'),
    184. 

  184.     'http://www.w3.org/1999/XMLSchema' => array(
    185. 

  185.         'i4'=>'','int'=>'integer','boolean'=>'boolean','string'=>'string','double'=>'double',
    186. 

  186.         'float'=>'double','dateTime'=>'string',
    187. 

  187.         'timeInstant'=>'string','base64Binary'=>'string','base64'=>'string','ur-type'=>'array'),
    188. 

  188.     'http://soapinterop.org/xsd' => array('SOAPStruct'=>'struct'),
    189. 

  189.     'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/' => array('base64'=>'string','array'=>'array','Array'=>'array'),
    190. 

  190.     'http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap' => array('Map')
    191. 

  191.     );
    192. 

  192.  
    193. 

  193.     /**
    194. 

  194.     * XML entities to convert
    195. 

  195.     *
    196. 

  196.     * @var      array 
    197. 

  197.     * @access   public
    198. 

  198.     * @deprecated
    199. 

  199.     * @see    expandEntities
    200. 

  200.     */
    201. 

  201.     var $xmlEntities = array('quot' => '"','amp' => '&',
    202. 

  202.         'lt' => '<','gt' => '>','apos' => "'");
    203. 

  203.  
    204. 

  204.     /**
    205. 

  205.     * constructor
    206. 

  206.     *
    207. 

  207.     * @access    public
    208. 

  208.     */
    209. 

  209.     function nusoap_base() {
    210. 

  210.         $this->debugLevel = $GLOBALS['_transient']['static']['nusoap_base']->globalDebugLevel;
    211. 

  211.     }
    212. 

  212.  
    213. 

  213.     /**
    214. 

  214.     * gets the global debug level, which applies to future instances
    215. 

  215.     *
    216. 

  216.     * @return    integer    Debug level 0-9, where 0 turns off
    217. 

  217.     * @access    public
    218. 

  218.     */
    219. 

  219.     function getGlobalDebugLevel() {
    220. 

  220.         return $GLOBALS['_transient']['static']['nusoap_base']->globalDebugLevel;
    221. 

  221.     }
    222. 

  222.  
    223. 

  223.     /**
    224. 

  224.     * sets the global debug level, which applies to future instances
    225. 

  225.     *
    226. 

  226.     * @param    int    $level    Debug level 0-9, where 0 turns off
    227. 

  227.     * @access    public
    228. 

  228.     */
    229. 

  229.     function setGlobalDebugLevel($level) {
    230. 

  230.         $GLOBALS['_transient']['static']['nusoap_base']->globalDebugLevel = $level;
    231. 

  231.     }
    232. 

  232.  
    233. 

  233.     /**
    234. 

  234.     * gets the debug level for this instance
    235. 

  235.     *
    236. 

  236.     * @return    int    Debug level 0-9, where 0 turns off
    237. 

  237.     * @access    public
    238. 

  238.     */
    239. 

  239.     function getDebugLevel() {
    240. 

  240.         return $this->debugLevel;
    241. 

  241.     }
    242. 

  242.  
    243. 

  243.     /**
    244. 

  244.     * sets the debug level for this instance
    245. 

  245.     *
    246. 

  246.     * @param    int    $level    Debug level 0-9, where 0 turns off
    247. 

  247.     * @access    public
    248. 

  248.     */
    249. 

  249.     function setDebugLevel($level) {
    250. 

  250.         $this->debugLevel = $level;
    251. 

  251.     }
    252. 

  252.  
    253. 

  253.     /**
    254. 

  254.     * adds debug data to the instance debug string with formatting
    255. 

  255.     *
    256. 

  256.     * @param    string $string debug data
    257. 

  257.     * @access   private
    258. 

  258.     */
    259. 

  259.     function debug($string){
    260. 

  260.         if ($this->debugLevel > 0) {
    261. 

  261.             $this->appendDebug($this->getmicrotime().' '.get_class($this).": $string\n");
    262. 

  262.         }
    263. 

  263.     }
    264. 

  264.  
    265. 

  265.     /**
    266. 

  266.     * adds debug data to the instance debug string without formatting
    267. 

  267.     *
    268. 

  268.     * @param    string $string debug data
    269. 

  269.     * @access   public
    270. 

  270.     */
    271. 

  271.     function appendDebug($string){
    272. 

  272.         if ($this->debugLevel > 0) {
    273. 

  273.             // it would be nice to use a memory stream here to use
    274. 

  274.             // memory more efficiently
    275. 

  275.             $this->debug_str .= $string;
    276. 

  276.         }
    277. 

  277.     }
    278. 

  278.  
    279. 

  279.     /**
    280. 

  280.     * clears the current debug data for this instance
    281. 

  281.     *
    282. 

  282.     * @access   public
    283. 

  283.     */
    284. 

  284.     function clearDebug() {
    285. 

  285.         // it would be nice to use a memory stream here to use
    286. 

  286.         // memory more efficiently
    287. 

  287.         $this->debug_str = '';
    288. 

  288.     }
    289. 

  289.  
    290. 

  290.     /**
    291. 

  291.     * gets the current debug data for this instance
    292. 

  292.     *
    293. 

  293.     * @return   debug data
    294. 

  294.     * @access   public
    295. 

  295.     */
    296. 

  296.     function &getDebug() {
    297. 

  297.         // it would be nice to use a memory stream here to use
    298. 

  298.         // memory more efficiently
    299. 

  299.         return $this->debug_str;
    300. 

  300.     }
    301. 

  301.  
    302. 

  302.     /**
    303. 

  303.     * gets the current debug data for this instance as an XML comment
    304. 

  304.     * this may change the contents of the debug data
    305. 

  305.     *
    306. 

  306.     * @return   debug data as an XML comment
    307. 

  307.     * @access   public
    308. 

  308.     */
    309. 

  309.     function &getDebugAsXMLComment() {
    310. 

  310.         // it would be nice to use a memory stream here to use
    311. 

  311.         // memory more efficiently
    312. 

  312.         while (strpos($this->debug_str, '--')) {
    313. 

  313.             $this->debug_str = str_replace('--', '- -', $this->debug_str);
    314. 

  314.         }
    315. 

  315.         return "<!--\n" . $this->debug_str . "\n-->";
    316. 

  316.     }
    317. 

  317.  
    318. 

  318.     /**
    319. 

  319.     * expands entities, e.g. changes '<' to '&lt;'.
    320. 

  320.     *
    321. 

  321.     * @param    string    $val    The string in which to expand entities.
    322. 

  322.     * @access    private
    323. 

  323.     */
    324. 

  324.     function expandEntities($val) {
    325. 

  325.         if ($this->charencoding) {
    326. 

  326.             $val = str_replace('&', '&amp;', $val);
    327. 

  327.             $val = str_replace("'", '&apos;', $val);
    328. 

  328.             $val = str_replace('"', '&quot;', $val);
    329. 

  329.             $val = str_replace('<', '&lt;', $val);
    330. 

  330.             $val = str_replace('>', '&gt;', $val);
    331. 

  331.         }
    332. 

  332.         return $val;
    333. 

  333.     }
    334. 

  334.  
    335. 

  335.     /**
    336. 

  336.     * returns error string if present
    337. 

  337.     *
    338. 

  338.     * @return   mixed error string or false
    339. 

  339.     * @access   public
    340. 

  340.     */
    341. 

  341.     function getError(){
    342. 

  342.         if($this->error_str != ''){
    343. 

  343.             return $this->error_str;
    344. 

  344.         }
    345. 

  345.         return false;
    346. 

  346.     }
    347. 

  347.  
    348. 

  348.     /**
    349. 

  349.     * sets error string
    350. 

  350.     *
    351. 

  351.     * @return   boolean $string error string
    352. 

  352.     * @access   private
    353. 

  353.     */
    354. 

  354.     function setError($str){
    355. 

  355.         $this->error_str = $str;
    356. 

  356.     }
    357. 

  357.  
    358. 

  358.     /**
    359. 

  359.     * detect if array is a simple array or a struct (associative array)
    360. 

  360.     *
    361. 

  361.     * @param    mixed    $val    The PHP array
    362. 

  362.     * @return    string    (arraySimple|arrayStruct)
    363. 

  363.     * @access    private
    364. 

  364.     */
    365. 

  365.     function isArraySimpleOrStruct($val) {
    366. 

  366.         $keyList = array_keys($val);
    367. 

  367.         foreach ($keyList as $keyListValue) {
    368. 

  368.             if (!is_int($keyListValue)) {
    369. 

  369.                 return 'arrayStruct';
    370. 

  370.             }
    371. 

  371.         }
    372. 

  372.         return 'arraySimple';
    373. 

  373.     }
    374. 

  374.  
    375. 

  375.     /**
    376. 

  376.     * serializes PHP values in accordance w/ section 5. Type information is
    377. 

  377.     * not serialized if $use == 'literal'.
    378. 

  378.     *
    379. 

  379.     * @param    mixed    $val    The value to serialize
    380. 

  380.     * @param    string    $name    The name (local part) of the XML element
    381. 

  381.     * @param    string    $type    The XML schema type (local part) for the element
    382. 

  382.     * @param    string    $name_ns    The namespace for the name of the XML element
    383. 

  383.     * @param    string    $type_ns    The namespace for the type of the element
    384. 

  384.     * @param    array    $attributes    The attributes to serialize as name=>value pairs
    385. 

  385.     * @param    string    $use    The WSDL "use" (encoded|literal)
    386. 

  386.     * @return    string    The serialized element, possibly with child elements
    387. 

  387.     * @access    public
    388. 

  388.     */
    389. 

  389.     function serialize_val($val,$name=false,$type=false,$name_ns=false,$type_ns=false,$attributes=false,$use='encoded'){
    390. 

  390.         $this->debug("in serialize_val: name=$name, type=$type, name_ns=$name_ns, type_ns=$type_ns, use=$use");
    391. 

  391.         $this->appendDebug('value=' . $this->varDump($val));
    392. 

  392.         $this->appendDebug('attributes=' . $this->varDump($attributes));
    393. 

  393.         
    394. 

  394.         if(is_object($val) && get_class($val) == 'soapval'){
    395. 

  395.             return $val->serialize($use);
    396. 

  396.         }
    397. 

  397.         // force valid name if necessary
    398. 

  398.         if (is_numeric($name)) {
    399. 

  399.             $name = '__numeric_' . $name;
    400. 

  400.         } elseif (! $name) {
    401. 

  401.             $name = 'noname';
    402. 

  402.         }
    403. 

  403.         // if name has ns, add ns prefix to name
    404. 

  404.         $xmlns = '';
    405. 

  405.         if($name_ns){
    406. 

  406.             $prefix = 'nu'.rand(1000,9999);
    407. 

  407.             $name = $prefix.':'.$name;
    408. 

  408.             $xmlns .= " xmlns:$prefix=\"$name_ns\"";
    409. 

  409.         }
    410. 

  410.         // if type is prefixed, create type prefix
    411. 

  411.         if($type_ns != '' && $type_ns == $this->namespaces['xsd']){
    412. 

  412.             // need to fix this. shouldn't default to xsd if no ns specified
    413. 

  413.             // w/o checking against typemap
    414. 

  414.             $type_prefix = 'xsd';
    415. 

  415.         } elseif($type_ns){
    416. 

  416.             $type_prefix = 'ns'.rand(1000,9999);
    417. 

  417.             $xmlns .= " xmlns:$type_prefix=\"$type_ns\"";
    418. 

  418.         }
    419. 

  419.         // serialize attributes if present
    420. 

  420.         $atts = '';
    421. 

  421.         if($attributes){
    422. 

  422.             foreach($attributes as $k => $v){
    423. 

  423.                 $atts .= " $k=\"".$this->expandEntities($v).'"';
    424. 

  424.             }
    425. 

  425.         }
    426. 

  426.         // serialize null value
    427. 

  427.         if (is_null($val)) {
    428. 

  428.             if ($use == 'literal') {
    429. 

  429.                 // TODO: depends on minOccurs
    430. 

  430.                 return "<$name$xmlns $atts/>";
    431. 

  431.             } else {
    432. 

  432.                 if (isset($type) && isset($type_prefix)) {
    433. 

  433.                     $type_str = " xsi:type=\"$type_prefix:$type\"";
    434. 

  434.                 } else {
    435. 

  435.                     $type_str = '';
    436. 

  436.                 }
    437. 

  437.                 return "<$name$xmlns$type_str $atts xsi:nil=\"true\"/>";
    438. 

  438.             }
    439. 

  439.         }
    440. 

  440.         // serialize if an xsd built-in primitive type
    441. 

  441.         if($type != '' && isset($this->typemap[$this->XMLSchemaVersion][$type])){
    442. 

  442.             if (is_bool($val)) {
    443. 

  443.                 if ($type == 'boolean') {
    444. 

  444.                     $val = $val ? 'true' : 'false';
    445. 

  445.                 } elseif (! $val) {
    446. 

  446.                     $val = 0;
    447. 

  447.                 }
    448. 

  448.             } else if (is_string($val)) {
    449. 

  449.                 $val = $this->expandEntities($val);
    450. 

  450.             }
    451. 

  451.             if ($use == 'literal') {
    452. 

  452.                 return "<$name$xmlns $atts>$val</$name>";
    453. 

  453.             } else {
    454. 

  454.                 return "<$name$xmlns $atts xsi:type=\"xsd:$type\">$val</$name>";
    455. 

  455.             }
    456. 

  456.         }
    457. 

  457.         // detect type and serialize
    458. 

  458.         $xml = '';
    459. 

  459.         switch(true) {
    460. 

  460.             case (is_bool($val) || $type == 'boolean'):
    461. 

  461.                 if ($type == 'boolean') {
    462. 

  462.                     $val = $val ? 'true' : 'false';
    463. 

  463.                 } elseif (! $val) {
    464. 

  464.                     $val = 0;
    465. 

  465.                 }
    466. 

  466.                 if ($use == 'literal') {
    467. 

  467.                     $xml .= "<$name$xmlns $atts>$val</$name>";
    468. 

  468.                 } else {
    469. 

  469.                     $xml .= "<$name$xmlns xsi:type=\"xsd:boolean\"$atts>$val</$name>";
    470. 

  470.                 }
    471. 

  471.                 break;
    472. 

  472.             case (is_int($val) || is_long($val) || $type == 'int'):
    473. 

  473.                 if ($use == 'literal') {
    474. 

  474.                     $xml .= "<$name$xmlns $atts>$val</$name>";
    475. 

  475.                 } else {
    476. 

  476.                     $xml .= "<$name$xmlns xsi:type=\"xsd:int\"$atts>$val</$name>";
    477. 

  477.                 }
    478. 

  478.                 break;
    479. 

  479.             case (is_float($val)|| is_double($val) || $type == 'float'):
    480. 

  480.                 if ($use == 'literal') {
    481. 

  481.                     $xml .= "<$name$xmlns $atts>$val</$name>";
    482. 

  482.                 } else {
    483. 

  483.                     $xml .= "<$name$xmlns xsi:type=\"xsd:float\"$atts>$val</$name>";
    484. 

  484.                 }
    485. 

  485.                 break;
    486. 

  486.             case (is_string($val) || $type == 'string'):
    487. 

  487.                 $val = $this->expandEntities($val);
    488. 

  488.                 if ($use == 'literal') {
    489. 

  489.                     $xml .= "<$name$xmlns $atts>$val</$name>";
    490. 

  490.                 } else {
    491. 

  491.                     $xml .= "<$name$xmlns xsi:type=\"xsd:string\"$atts>$val</$name>";
    492. 

  492.                 }
    493. 

  493.                 break;
    494. 

  494.             case is_object($val):
    495. 

  495.                 if (! $name) {
    496. 

  496.                     $name = get_class($val);
    497. 

  497.                     $this->debug("In serialize_val, used class name $name as element name");
    498. 

  498.                 } else {
    499. 

  499.                     $this->debug("In serialize_val, do not override name $name for element name for class " . get_class($val));
    500. 

  500.                 }
    501. 

  501.                 foreach(get_object_vars($val) as $k => $v){
    502. 

  502.                     $pXml = isset($pXml) ? $pXml.$this->serialize_val($v,$k,false,false,false,false,$use) : $this->serialize_val($v,$k,false,false,false,false,$use);
    503. 

  503.                 }
    504. 

  504.                 $xml .= '<'.$name.'>'.$pXml.'</'.$name.'>';
    505. 

  505.                 break;
    506. 

  506.             break;
    507. 

  507.             case (is_array($val) || $type):
    508. 

  508.                 // detect if struct or array
    509. 

  509.                 $valueType = $this->isArraySimpleOrStruct($val);
    510. 

  510.                 if($valueType=='arraySimple' || ereg('^ArrayOf',$type)){
    511. 

  511.                     $i = 0;
    512. 

  512.                     if(is_array($val) && count($val)> 0){
    513. 

  513.                         foreach($val as $v){
    514. 

  514.                             if(is_object($v) && get_class($v) ==  'soapval'){
    515. 

  515.                                 $tt_ns = $v->type_ns;
    516. 

  516.                                 $tt = $v->type;
    517. 

  517.                             } elseif (is_array($v)) {
    518. 

  518.                                 $tt = $this->isArraySimpleOrStruct($v);
    519. 

  519.                             } else {
    520. 

  520.                                 $tt = gettype($v);
    521. 

  521.                             }
    522. 

  522.                             $array_types[$tt] = 1;
    523. 

  523.                             // TODO: for literal, the name should be $name
    524. 

  524.                             $xml .= $this->serialize_val($v,'item',false,false,false,false,$use);
    525. 

  525.                             ++$i;
    526. 

  526.                         }
    527. 

  527.                         if(count($array_types) > 1){
    528. 

  528.                             $array_typename = 'xsd:anyType';
    529. 

  529.                         } elseif(isset($tt) && isset($this->typemap[$this->XMLSchemaVersion][$tt])) {
    530. 

  530.                             if ($tt == 'integer') {
    531. 

  531.                                 $tt = 'int';
    532. 

  532.                             }
    533. 

  533.                             $array_typename = 'xsd:'.$tt;
    534. 

  534.                         } elseif(isset($tt) && $tt == 'arraySimple'){
    535. 

  535.                             $array_typename = 'SOAP-ENC:Array';
    536. 

  536.                         } elseif(isset($tt) && $tt == 'arrayStruct'){
    537. 

  537.                             $array_typename = 'unnamed_struct_use_soapval';
    538. 

  538.                         } else {
    539. 

  539.                             // if type is prefixed, create type prefix
    540. 

  540.                             if ($tt_ns != '' && $tt_ns == $this->namespaces['xsd']){
    541. 

  541.                                  $array_typename = 'xsd:' . $tt;
    542. 

  542.                             } elseif ($tt_ns) {
    543. 

  543.                                 $tt_prefix = 'ns' . rand(1000, 9999);
    544. 

  544.                                 $array_typename = "$tt_prefix:$tt";
    545. 

  545.                                 $xmlns .= " xmlns:$tt_prefix=\"$tt_ns\"";
    546. 

  546.                             } else {
    547. 

  547.                                 $array_typename = $tt;
    548. 

  548.                             }
    549. 

  549.                         }
    550. 

  550.                         $array_type = $i;
    551. 

  551.                         if ($use == 'literal') {
    552. 

  552.                             $type_str = '';
    553. 

  553.                         } else if (isset($type) && isset($type_prefix)) {
    554. 

  554.                             $type_str = " xsi:type=\"$type_prefix:$type\"";
    555. 

  555.                         } else {
    556. 

  556.                             $type_str = " xsi:type=\"SOAP-ENC:Array\" SOAP-ENC:arrayType=\"".$array_typename."[$array_type]\"";
    557. 

  557.                         }
    558. 

  558.                     // empty array
    559. 

  559.                     } else {
    560. 

  560.                         if ($use == 'literal') {
    561. 

  561.                             $type_str = '';
    562. 

  562.                         } else if (isset($type) && isset($type_prefix)) {
    563. 

  563.                             $type_str = " xsi:type=\"$type_prefix:$type\"";
    564. 

  564.                         } else {
    565. 

  565.                             $type_str = " xsi:type=\"SOAP-ENC:Array\" SOAP-ENC:arrayType=\"xsd:anyType[0]\"";
    566. 

  566.                         }
    567. 

  567.                     }
    568. 

  568.                     // TODO: for array in literal, there is no wrapper here
    569. 

  569.                     $xml = "<$name$xmlns$type_str$atts>".$xml."</$name>";
    570. 

  570.                 } else {
    571. 

  571.                     // got a struct
    572. 

  572.                     if(isset($type) && isset($type_prefix)){
    573. 

  573.                         $type_str = " xsi:type=\"$type_prefix:$type\"";
    574. 

  574.                     } else {
    575. 

  575.                         $type_str = '';
    576. 

  576.                     }
    577. 

  577.                     if ($use == 'literal') {
    578. 

  578.                         $xml .= "<$name$xmlns $atts>";
    579. 

  579.                     } else {
    580. 

  580.                         $xml .= "<$name$xmlns$type_str$atts>";
    581. 

  581.                     }
    582. 

  582.                     foreach($val as $k => $v){
    583. 

  583.                         // Apache Map
    584. 

  584.                         if ($type == 'Map' && $type_ns == 'http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap') {
    585. 

  585.                             $xml .= '<item>';
    586. 

  586.                             $xml .= $this->serialize_val($k,'key',false,false,false,false,$use);
    587. 

  587.                             $xml .= $this->serialize_val($v,'value',false,false,false,false,$use);
    588. 

  588.                             $xml .= '</item>';
    589. 

  589.                         } else {
    590. 

  590.                             $xml .= $this->serialize_val($v,$k,false,false,false,false,$use);
    591. 

  591.                         }
    592. 

  592.                     }
    593. 

  593.                     $xml .= "</$name>";
    594. 

  594.                 }
    595. 

  595.                 break;
    596. 

  596.             default:
    597. 

  597.                 $xml .= 'not detected, got '.gettype($val).' for '.$val;
    598. 

  598.                 break;
    599. 

  599.         }
    600. 

  600.         return $xml;
    601. 

  601.     }
    602. 

  602.  
    603. 

  603.     /**
    604. 

  604.     * serializes a message
    605. 

  605.     *
    606. 

  606.     * @param string $body the XML of the SOAP body
    607. 

  607.     * @param mixed $headers optional string of XML with SOAP header content, or array of soapval objects for SOAP headers
    608. 

  608.     * @param array $namespaces optional the namespaces used in generating the body and headers
    609. 

  609.     * @param string $style optional (rpc|document)
    610. 

  610.     * @param string $use optional (encoded|literal)
    611. 

  611.     * @param string $encodingStyle optional (usually 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/' for encoded)
    612. 

  612.     * @return string the message
    613. 

  613.     * @access public
    614. 

  614.     */
    615. 

  615.     function serializeEnvelope($body,$headers=false,$namespaces=array(),$style='rpc',$use='encoded',$encodingStyle='http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/'){
    616. 

  616.     // TODO: add an option to automatically run utf8_encode on $body and $headers
    617. 

  617.     // if $this->soap_defencoding is UTF-8.  Not doing this automatically allows
    618. 

  618.     // one to send arbitrary UTF-8 characters, not just characters that map to ISO-8859-1
    619. 

  619.  
    620. 

  620.     $this->debug("In serializeEnvelope length=" . strlen($body) . " body (max 1000 characters)=" . substr($body, 0, 1000) . " style=$style use=$use encodingStyle=$encodingStyle");
    621. 

  621.     $this->debug("headers:");
    622. 

  622.     $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($headers));
    623. 

  623.     $this->debug("namespaces:");
    624. 

  624.     $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($namespaces));
    625. 

  625.  
    626. 

  626.     // serialize namespaces
    627. 

  627.     $ns_string = '';
    628. 

  628.     foreach(array_merge($this->namespaces,$namespaces) as $k => $v){
    629. 

  629.         $ns_string .= " xmlns:$k=\"$v\"";
    630. 

  630.     }
    631. 

  631.     if($encodingStyle) {
    632. 

  632.         $ns_string = " SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle=\"$encodingStyle\"$ns_string";
    633. 

  633.     }
    634. 

  634.  
    635. 

  635.     // serialize headers
    636. 

  636.     if($headers){
    637. 

  637.         if (is_array($headers)) {
    638. 

  638.             $xml = '';
    639. 

  639.             foreach ($headers as $header) {
    640. 

  640.                 $xml .= $this->serialize_val($header, false, false, false, false, false, $use);
    641. 

  641.             }
    642. 

  642.             $headers = $xml;
    643. 

  643.             $this->debug("In serializeEnvelope, serialzied array of headers to $headers");
    644. 

  644.         }
    645. 

  645.         $headers = "<SOAP-ENV:Header>".$headers."</SOAP-ENV:Header>";
    646. 

  646.     }
    647. 

  647.     // serialize envelope
    648. 

  648.     return
    649. 

  649.     '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="'.$this->soap_defencoding .'"?'.">".
    650. 

  650.     '<SOAP-ENV:Envelope'.$ns_string.">".
    651. 

  651.     $headers.
    652. 

  652.     "<SOAP-ENV:Body>".
    653. 

  653.         $body.
    654. 

  654.     "</SOAP-ENV:Body>".
    655. 

  655.     "</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>";
    656. 

  656.     }
    657. 

  657.  
    658. 

  658.     /**
    659. 

  659.      * formats a string to be inserted into an HTML stream
    660. 

  660.      *
    661. 

  661.      * @param string $str The string to format
    662. 

  662.      * @return string The formatted string
    663. 

  663.      * @access public
    664. 

  664.      * @deprecated
    665. 

  665.      */
    666. 

  666.     function formatDump($str){
    667. 

  667.         $str = htmlspecialchars($str);
    668. 

  668.         return nl2br($str);
    669. 

  669.     }
    670. 

  670.  
    671. 

  671.     /**
    672. 

  672.     * contracts (changes namespace to prefix) a qualified name
    673. 

  673.     *
    674. 

  674.     * @param    string $qname qname
    675. 

  675.     * @return    string contracted qname
    676. 

  676.     * @access   private
    677. 

  677.     */
    678. 

  678.     function contractQname($qname){
    679. 

  679.         // get element namespace
    680. 

  680.         //$this->xdebug("Contract $qname");
    681. 

  681.         if (strrpos($qname, ':')) {
    682. 

  682.             // get unqualified name
    683. 

  683.             $name = substr($qname, strrpos($qname, ':') + 1);
    684. 

  684.             // get ns
    685. 

  685.             $ns = substr($qname, 0, strrpos($qname, ':'));
    686. 

  686.             $p = $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns);
    687. 

  687.             if ($p) {
    688. 

  688.                 return $p . ':' . $name;
    689. 

  689.             }
    690. 

  690.             return $qname;
    691. 

  691.         } else {
    692. 

  692.             return $qname;
    693. 

  693.         }
    694. 

  694.     }
    695. 

  695.  
    696. 

  696.     /**
    697. 

  697.     * expands (changes prefix to namespace) a qualified name
    698. 

  698.     *
    699. 

  699.     * @param    string $string qname
    700. 

  700.     * @return    string expanded qname
    701. 

  701.     * @access   private
    702. 

  702.     */
    703. 

  703.     function expandQname($qname){
    704. 

  704.         // get element prefix
    705. 

  705.         if(strpos($qname,':') && !ereg('^http://',$qname)){
    706. 

  706.             // get unqualified name
    707. 

  707.             $name = substr(strstr($qname,':'),1);
    708. 

  708.             // get ns prefix
    709. 

  709.             $prefix = substr($qname,0,strpos($qname,':'));
    710. 

  710.             if(isset($this->namespaces[$prefix])){
    711. 

  711.                 return $this->namespaces[$prefix].':'.$name;
    712. 

  712.             } else {
    713. 

  713.                 return $qname;
    714. 

  714.             }
    715. 

  715.         } else {
    716. 

  716.             return $qname;
    717. 

  717.         }
    718. 

  718.     }
    719. 

  719.  
    720. 

  720.     /**
    721. 

  721.     * returns the local part of a prefixed string
    722. 

  722.     * returns the original string, if not prefixed
    723. 

  723.     *
    724. 

  724.     * @param string $str The prefixed string
    725. 

  725.     * @return string The local part
    726. 

  726.     * @access public
    727. 

  727.     */
    728. 

  728.     function getLocalPart($str){
    729. 

  729.         if($sstr = strrchr($str,':')){
    730. 

  730.             // get unqualified name
    731. 

  731.             return substr( $sstr, 1 );
    732. 

  732.         } else {
    733. 

  733.             return $str;
    734. 

  734.         }
    735. 

  735.     }
    736. 

  736.  
    737. 

  737.     /**
    738. 

  738.     * returns the prefix part of a prefixed string
    739. 

  739.     * returns false, if not prefixed
    740. 

  740.     *
    741. 

  741.     * @param string $str The prefixed string
    742. 

  742.     * @return mixed The prefix or false if there is no prefix
    743. 

  743.     * @access public
    744. 

  744.     */
    745. 

  745.     function getPrefix($str){
    746. 

  746.         if($pos = strrpos($str,':')){
    747. 

  747.             // get prefix
    748. 

  748.             return substr($str,0,$pos);
    749. 

  749.         }
    750. 

  750.         return false;
    751. 

  751.     }
    752. 

  752.  
    753. 

  753.     /**
    754. 

  754.     * pass it a prefix, it returns a namespace
    755. 

  755.     *
    756. 

  756.     * @param string $prefix The prefix
    757. 

  757.     * @return mixed The namespace, false if no namespace has the specified prefix
    758. 

  758.     * @access public
    759. 

  759.     */
    760. 

  760.     function getNamespaceFromPrefix($prefix){
    761. 

  761.         if (isset($this->namespaces[$prefix])) {
    762. 

  762.             return $this->namespaces[$prefix];
    763. 

  763.         }
    764. 

  764.         //$this->setError("No namespace registered for prefix '$prefix'");
    765. 

  765.         return false;
    766. 

  766.     }
    767. 

  767.  
    768. 

  768.     /**
    769. 

  769.     * returns the prefix for a given namespace (or prefix)
    770. 

  770.     * or false if no prefixes registered for the given namespace
    771. 

  771.     *
    772. 

  772.     * @param string $ns The namespace
    773. 

  773.     * @return mixed The prefix, false if the namespace has no prefixes
    774. 

  774.     * @access public
    775. 

  775.     */
    776. 

  776.     function getPrefixFromNamespace($ns) {
    777. 

  777.         foreach ($this->namespaces as $p => $n) {
    778. 

  778.             if ($ns == $n || $ns == $p) {
    779. 

  779.                 $this->usedNamespaces[$p] = $n;
    780. 

  780.                 return $p;
    781. 

  781.             }
    782. 

  782.         }
    783. 

  783.         return false;
    784. 

  784.     }
    785. 

  785.  
    786. 

  786.     /**
    787. 

  787.     * returns the time in ODBC canonical form with microseconds
    788. 

  788.     *
    789. 

  789.     * @return string The time in ODBC canonical form with microseconds
    790. 

  790.     * @access public
    791. 

  791.     */
    792. 

  792.     function getmicrotime() {
    793. 

  793.         if (function_exists('gettimeofday')) {
    794. 

  794.             $tod = gettimeofday();
    795. 

  795.             $sec = $tod['sec'];
    796. 

  796.             $usec = $tod['usec'];
    797. 

  797.         } else {
    798. 

  798.             $sec = time();
    799. 

  799.             $usec = 0;
    800. 

  800.         }
    801. 

  801.         return strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', $sec) . '.' . sprintf('%06d', $usec);
    802. 

  802.     }
    803. 

  803.  
    804. 

  804.     /**
    805. 

  805.      * Returns a string with the output of var_dump
    806. 

  806.      *
    807. 

  807.      * @param mixed $data The variable to var_dump
    808. 

  808.      * @return string The output of var_dump
    809. 

  809.      * @access public
    810. 

  810.      */
    811. 

  811.     function varDump($data) {
    812. 

  812.         ob_start();
    813. 

  813.         var_dump($data);
    814. 

  814.         $ret_val = ob_get_contents();
    815. 

  815.         ob_end_clean();
    816. 

  816.         return $ret_val;
    817. 

  817.     }
    818. 

  818. }
    819. 

  819.  
    820. 

  820. // XML Schema Datatype Helper Functions
    821. 

  821. //xsd:dateTime helpers
    822. 

  822.  
    823. 

  823.  
    824. 

  824.  
    825. 

  825. /**
    826. 

  826. * convert unix timestamp to ISO 8601 compliant date string
    827. 

  827. *
    828. 

  828. * @param    string $timestamp Unix time stamp
    829. 

  829. * @access   public
    830. 

  830. */
    831. 

  831. function timestamp_to_iso8601($timestamp,$utc=true){
    832. 

  832.     $datestr = date('Y-m-d\TH:i:sO',$timestamp);
    833. 

  833.     if($utc){
    834. 

  834.         $eregStr =
    835. 

  835.         '([0-9]{4})-'.    // centuries & years CCYY-
    836. 

  836.         '([0-9]{2})-'.    // months MM-
    837. 

  837.         '([0-9]{2})'.    // days DD
    838. 

  838.         'T'.            // separator T
    839. 

  839.         '([0-9]{2}):'.    // hours hh:
    840. 

  840.         '([0-9]{2}):'.    // minutes mm:
    841. 

  841.         '([0-9]{2})(\.[0-9]*)?'. // seconds ss.ss...
    842. 

  842.         '(Z|[+\-][0-9]{2}:?[0-9]{2})?'; // Z to indicate UTC, -/+HH:MM:SS.SS... for local tz's
    843. 

  843.  
    844. 

  844.         if(ereg($eregStr,$datestr,$regs)){
    845. 

  845.             return sprintf('%04d-%02d-%02dT%02d:%02d:%02dZ',$regs[1],$regs[2],$regs[3],$regs[4],$regs[5],$regs[6]);
    846. 

  846.         }
    847. 

  847.         return false;
    848. 

  848.     } else {
    849. 

  849.         return $datestr;
    850. 

  850.     }
    851. 

  851. }
    852. 

  852.  
    853. 

  853. /**
    854. 

  854. * convert ISO 8601 compliant date string to unix timestamp
    855. 

  855. *
    856. 

  856. * @param    string $datestr ISO 8601 compliant date string
    857. 

  857. * @access   public
    858. 

  858. */
    859. 

  859. function iso8601_to_timestamp($datestr){
    860. 

  860.     $eregStr =
    861. 

  861.     '([0-9]{4})-'.    // centuries & years CCYY-
    862. 

  862.     '([0-9]{2})-'.    // months MM-
    863. 

  863.     '([0-9]{2})'.    // days DD
    864. 

  864.     'T'.            // separator T
    865. 

  865.     '([0-9]{2}):'.    // hours hh:
    866. 

  866.     '([0-9]{2}):'.    // minutes mm:
    867. 

  867.     '([0-9]{2})(\.[0-9]+)?'. // seconds ss.ss...
    868. 

  868.     '(Z|[+\-][0-9]{2}:?[0-9]{2})?'; // Z to indicate UTC, -/+HH:MM:SS.SS... for local tz's
    869. 

  869.     if(ereg($eregStr,$datestr,$regs)){
    870. 

  870.         // not utc
    871. 

  871.         if($regs[8] != 'Z'){
    872. 

  872.             $op = substr($regs[8],0,1);
    873. 

  873.             $h = substr($regs[8],1,2);
    874. 

  874.             $m = substr($regs[8],strlen($regs[8])-2,2);
    875. 

  875.             if($op == '-'){
    876. 

  876.                 $regs[4] = $regs[4] + $h;
    877. 

  877.                 $regs[5] = $regs[5] + $m;
    878. 

  878.             } elseif($op == '+'){
    879. 

  879.                 $regs[4] = $regs[4] - $h;
    880. 

  880.                 $regs[5] = $regs[5] - $m;
    881. 

  881.             }
    882. 

  882.         }
    883. 

  883.         return strtotime("$regs[1]-$regs[2]-$regs[3] $regs[4]:$regs[5]:$regs[6]Z");
    884. 

  884.     } else {
    885. 

  885.         return false;
    886. 

  886.     }
    887. 

  887. }
    888. 

  888.  
    889. 

  889. /**
    890. 

  890. * sleeps some number of microseconds
    891. 

  891. *
    892. 

  892. * @param    string $usec the number of microseconds to sleep
    893. 

  893. * @access   public
    894. 

  894. * @deprecated
    895. 

  895. */
    896. 

  896. function usleepWindows($usec)
    897. 

  897. {
    898. 

  898.     $start = gettimeofday();
    899. 

  899.     
    900. 

  900.     do
    901. 

  901.     {
    902. 

  902.         $stop = gettimeofday();
    903. 

  903.         $timePassed = 1000000 * ($stop['sec'] - $start['sec'])
    904. 

  904.         + $stop['usec'] - $start['usec'];
    905. 

  905.     }
    906. 

  906.     while ($timePassed < $usec);
    907. 

  907. }
    908. 

  908.  
    909. 

  909. ?><?php
    910. 

  910.  
    911. 

  911.  
    912. 

  912.  
    913. 

  913. /**
    914. 

  914. * Contains information for a SOAP fault.
    915. 

  915. * Mainly used for returning faults from deployed functions
    916. 

  916. * in a server instance.
    917. 

  917. * @author   Dietrich Ayala <dietrich@ganx4.com>
    918. 

  918. * @version  $Id: nusoap.php,v 1.94 2005/08/04 01:27:42 snichol Exp $
    919. 

  919. * @access public
    920. 

  920. */
    921. 

  921. class soap_fault extends nusoap_base {
    922. 

  922.     /**
    923. 

  923.      * The fault code (client|server)
    924. 

  924.      * @var string 
    925. 

  925.      * @access private
    926. 

  926.      */
    927. 

  927.     var $faultcode;
    928. 

  928.     /**
    929. 

  929.      * The fault actor
    930. 

  930.      * @var string 
    931. 

  931.      * @access private
    932. 

  932.      */
    933. 

  933.     var $faultactor;
    934. 

  934.     /**
    935. 

  935.      * The fault string, a description of the fault
    936. 

  936.      * @var string 
    937. 

  937.      * @access private
    938. 

  938.      */
    939. 

  939.     var $faultstring;
    940. 

  940.     /**
    941. 

  941.      * The fault detail, typically a string or array of string
    942. 

  942.      * @var mixed 
    943. 

  943.      * @access private
    944. 

  944.      */
    945. 

  945.     var $faultdetail;
    946. 

  946.  
    947. 

  947.     /**
    948. 

  948.     * constructor
    949. 

  949.     *
    950. 

  950.     * @param string $faultcode (client | server)
    951. 

  951.     * @param string $faultactor only used when msg routed between multiple actors
    952. 

  952.     * @param string $faultstring human readable error message
    953. 

  953.     * @param mixed $faultdetail detail, typically a string or array of string
    954. 

  954.     */
    955. 

  955.     function soap_fault($faultcode,$faultactor='',$faultstring='',$faultdetail=''){
    956. 

  956.         parent::nusoap_base();
    957. 

  957.         $this->faultcode = $faultcode;
    958. 

  958.         $this->faultactor = $faultactor;
    959. 

  959.         $this->faultstring = $faultstring;
    960. 

  960.         $this->faultdetail = $faultdetail;
    961. 

  961.     }
    962. 

  962.  
    963. 

  963.     /**
    964. 

  964.     * serialize a fault
    965. 

  965.     *
    966. 

  966.     * @return    string    The serialization of the fault instance.
    967. 

  967.     * @access   public
    968. 

  968.     */
    969. 

  969.     function serialize(){
    970. 

  970.         $ns_string = '';
    971. 

  971.         foreach($this->namespaces as $k => $v){
    972. 

  972.             $ns_string .= "\n  xmlns:$k=\"$v\"";
    973. 

  973.         }
    974. 

  974.         $return_msg =
    975. 

  975.             '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="'.$this->soap_defencoding.'"?>'.
    976. 

  976.             '<SOAP-ENV:Envelope SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"'.$ns_string.">\n".
    977. 

  977.                 '<SOAP-ENV:Body>'.
    978. 

  978.                 '<SOAP-ENV:Fault>'.
    979. 

  979.                     $this->serialize_val($this->faultcode, 'faultcode').
    980. 

  980.                     $this->serialize_val($this->faultactor, 'faultactor').
    981. 

  981.                     $this->serialize_val($this->faultstring, 'faultstring').
    982. 

  982.                     $this->serialize_val($this->faultdetail, 'detail').
    983. 

  983.                 '</SOAP-ENV:Fault>'.
    984. 

  984.                 '</SOAP-ENV:Body>'.
    985. 

  985.             '</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>';
    986. 

  986.         return $return_msg;
    987. 

  987.     }
    988. 

  988. }
    989. 

  989.  
    990. 

  990.  
    991. 

  991.  
    992. 

  992. ?><?php
    993. 

  993.  
    994. 

  994.  
    995. 

  995.  
    996. 

  996. /**
    997. 

  997. * parses an XML Schema, allows access to it's data, other utility methods
    998. 

  998. * no validation... yet.
    999. 

  999. * very experimental and limited. As is discussed on XML-DEV, I'm one of the people
    1000. 

  1000. * that just doesn't have time to read the spec(s) thoroughly, and just have a couple of trusty
    1001. 

  1001. * tutorials I refer to :)
    1002. 

  1002. *
    1003. 

  1003. * @author   Dietrich Ayala <dietrich@ganx4.com>
    1004. 

  1004. * @version  $Id: nusoap.php,v 1.94 2005/08/04 01:27:42 snichol Exp $
    1005. 

  1005. * @access   public
    1006. 

  1006. */
    1007. 

  1007. class XMLSchema extends nusoap_base  {
    1008. 

  1008.     
    1009. 

  1009.     // files
    1010. 

  1010.     
    1011. 

  1011.     var $schema = '';
    1012. 

  1012.     var $xml = '';
    1013. 

  1013.     // namespaces
    1014. 

  1014.     
    1015. 

  1015.     var $enclosingNamespaces;
    1016. 

  1016.     // schema info
    1017. 

  1017.     
    1018. 

  1018.     var $schemaInfo = array();
    1019. 

  1019.     var $schemaTargetNamespace = '';
    1020. 

  1020.     // types, elements, attributes defined by the schema
    1021. 

  1021.     
    1022. 

  1022.     var $attributes = array();
    1023. 

  1023.     var $complexTypes = array();
    1024. 

  1024.     var $complexTypeStack = array();
    1025. 

  1025.     var $currentComplexType = null;
    1026. 

  1026.     var $elements = array();
    1027. 

  1027.     var $elementStack = array();
    1028. 

  1028.     var $currentElement = null;
    1029. 

  1029.     var $simpleTypes = array();
    1030. 

  1030.     var $simpleTypeStack = array();
    1031. 

  1031.     var $currentSimpleType = null;
    1032. 

  1032.     // imports
    1033. 

  1033.     
    1034. 

  1034.     var $imports = array();
    1035. 

  1035.     // parser vars
    1036. 

  1036.     
    1037. 

  1037.     var $parser;
    1038. 

  1038.     var $position = 0;
    1039. 

  1039.     var $depth = 0;
    1040. 

  1040.     var $depth_array = array();
    1041. 

  1041.     var $message = array();
    1042. 

  1042.     var $defaultNamespace = array();
    1043. 

  1043.     
    1044. 

  1044.     /**
    1045. 

  1045.     * constructor
    1046. 

  1046.     *
    1047. 

  1047.     * @param    string $schema schema document URI
    1048. 

  1048.     * @param    string $xml xml document URI
    1049. 

  1049.     * @param    string $namespaces namespaces defined in enclosing XML
    1050. 

  1050.     * @access   public
    1051. 

  1051.     */
    1052. 

  1052.     function XMLSchema($schema='',$xml='',$namespaces=array()){
    1053. 

  1053.         parent::nusoap_base();
    1054. 

  1054.         $this->debug('xmlschema class instantiated, inside constructor');
    1055. 

  1055.         // files
    1056. 

  1056.         $this->schema = $schema;
    1057. 

  1057.         $this->xml = $xml;
    1058. 

  1058.  
    1059. 

  1059.         // namespaces
    1060. 

  1060.         $this->enclosingNamespaces = $namespaces;
    1061. 

  1061.         $this->namespaces = array_merge($this->namespaces, $namespaces);
    1062. 

  1062.  
    1063. 

  1063.         // parse schema file
    1064. 

  1064.         if($schema != ''){
    1065. 

  1065.             $this->debug('initial schema file: '.$schema);
    1066. 

  1066.             $this->parseFile($schema, 'schema');
    1067. 

  1067.         }
    1068. 

  1068.  
    1069. 

  1069.         // parse xml file
    1070. 

  1070.         if($xml != ''){
    1071. 

  1071.             $this->debug('initial xml file: '.$xml);
    1072. 

  1072.             $this->parseFile($xml, 'xml');
    1073. 

  1073.         }
    1074. 

  1074.  
    1075. 

  1075.     }
    1076. 

  1076.  
    1077. 

  1077.     /**
    1078. 

  1078.     * parse an XML file
    1079. 

  1079.     *
    1080. 

  1080.     * @param string $xml, path/URL to XML file
    1081. 

  1081.     * @param string $type, (schema | xml)
    1082. 

  1082.     * @return boolean 
    1083. 

  1083.     * @access public
    1084. 

  1084.     */
    1085. 

  1085.     function parseFile($xml,$type){
    1086. 

  1086.         // parse xml file
    1087. 

  1087.         if($xml != ""){
    1088. 

  1088.             $xmlStr = @join("",@file($xml));
    1089. 

  1089.             if($xmlStr == ""){
    1090. 

  1090.                 $msg = 'Error reading XML from '.$xml;
    1091. 

  1091.                 $this->setError($msg);
    1092. 

  1092.                 $this->debug($msg);
    1093. 

  1093.             return false;
    1094. 

  1094.             } else {
    1095. 

  1095.                 $this->debug("parsing $xml");
    1096. 

  1096.                 $this->parseString($xmlStr,$type);
    1097. 

  1097.                 $this->debug("done parsing $xml");
    1098. 

  1098.             return true;
    1099. 

  1099.             }
    1100. 

  1100.         }
    1101. 

  1101.         return false;
    1102. 

  1102.     }
    1103. 

  1103.  
    1104. 

  1104.     /**
    1105. 

  1105.     * parse an XML string
    1106. 

  1106.     *
    1107. 

  1107.     * @param    string $xml path or URL
    1108. 

  1108.     * @param string $type, (schema|xml)
    1109. 

  1109.     * @access   private
    1110. 

  1110.     */
    1111. 

  1111.     function parseString($xml,$type){
    1112. 

  1112.         // parse xml string
    1113. 

  1113.         if($xml != ""){
    1114. 

  1114.  
    1115. 

  1115.             // Create an XML parser.
    1116. 

  1116.             $this->parser = xml_parser_create();
    1117. 

  1117.             // Set the options for parsing the XML data.
    1118. 

  1118.             xml_parser_set_option($this->parser, XML_OPTION_CASE_FOLDING, 0);
    1119. 

  1119.  
    1120. 

  1120.             // Set the object for the parser.
    1121. 

  1121.             xml_set_object($this->parser, $this);
    1122. 

  1122.  
    1123. 

  1123.             // Set the element handlers for the parser.
    1124. 

  1124.             if($type == "schema"){
    1125. 

  1125.                 xml_set_element_handler($this->parser, 'schemaStartElement','schemaEndElement');
    1126. 

  1126.                 xml_set_character_data_handler($this->parser,'schemaCharacterData');
    1127. 

  1127.             } elseif($type == "xml"){
    1128. 

  1128.                 xml_set_element_handler($this->parser, 'xmlStartElement','xmlEndElement');
    1129. 

  1129.                 xml_set_character_data_handler($this->parser,'xmlCharacterData');
    1130. 

  1130.             }
    1131. 

  1131.  
    1132. 

  1132.             // Parse the XML file.
    1133. 

  1133.             if(!xml_parse($this->parser,$xml,true)){
    1134. 

  1134.             // Display an error message.
    1135. 

  1135.                 $errstr = sprintf('XML error parsing XML schema on line %d: %s',
    1136. 

  1136.                 xml_get_current_line_number($this->parser),
    1137. 

  1137.                 xml_error_string(xml_get_error_code($this->parser))
    1138. 

  1138.                 );
    1139. 

  1139.                 $this->debug($errstr);
    1140. 

  1140.                 $this->debug("XML payload:\n" . $xml);
    1141. 

  1141.                 $this->setError($errstr);
    1142. 

  1142.             }
    1143. 

  1143.             
    1144. 

  1144.             xml_parser_free($this->parser);
    1145. 

  1145.         } else{
    1146. 

  1146.             $this->debug('no xml passed to parseString()!!');
    1147. 

  1147.             $this->setError('no xml passed to parseString()!!');
    1148. 

  1148.         }
    1149. 

  1149.     }
    1150. 

  1150.  
    1151. 

  1151.     /**
    1152. 

  1152.     * start-element handler
    1153. 

  1153.     *
    1154. 

  1154.     * @param    string $parser XML parser object
    1155. 

  1155.     * @param    string $name element name
    1156. 

  1156.     * @param    string $attrs associative array of attributes
    1157. 

  1157.     * @access   private
    1158. 

  1158.     */
    1159. 

  1159.     function schemaStartElement($parser, $name, $attrs) {
    1160. 

  1160.         
    1161. 

  1161.         // position in the total number of elements, starting from 0
    1162. 

  1162.         $pos = $this->position++;
    1163. 

  1163.         $depth = $this->depth++;
    1164. 

  1164.         // set self as current value for this depth
    1165. 

  1165.         $this->depth_array[$depth] = $pos;
    1166. 

  1166.         $this->message[$pos] = array('cdata' => ''); 
    1167. 

  1167.         if ($depth > 0) {
    1168. 

  1168.             $this->defaultNamespace[$pos] = $this->defaultNamespace[$this->depth_array[$depth - 1]];
    1169. 

  1169.         } else {
    1170. 

  1170.             $this->defaultNamespace[$pos] = false;
    1171. 

  1171.         }
    1172. 

  1172.  
    1173. 

  1173.         // get element prefix
    1174. 

  1174.         if($prefix = $this->getPrefix($name)){
    1175. 

  1175.             // get unqualified name
    1176. 

  1176.             $name = $this->getLocalPart($name);
    1177. 

  1177.         } else {
    1178. 

  1178.             $prefix = '';
    1179. 

  1179.         }
    1180. 

  1180.         
    1181. 

  1181.         // loop thru attributes, expanding, and registering namespace declarations
    1182. 

  1182.         if(count($attrs) > 0){
    1183. 

  1183.             foreach($attrs as $k => $v){
    1184. 

  1184.                 // if ns declarations, add to class level array of valid namespaces
    1185. 

  1185.                 if(ereg("^xmlns",$k)){
    1186. 

  1186.                     //$this->xdebug("$k: $v");
    1187. 

  1187.                     //$this->xdebug('ns_prefix: '.$this->getPrefix($k));
    1188. 

  1188.                     if($ns_prefix = substr(strrchr($k,':'),1)){
    1189. 

  1189.                         //$this->xdebug("Add namespace[$ns_prefix] = $v");
    1190. 

  1190.                         $this->namespaces[$ns_prefix] = $v;
    1191. 

  1191.                     } else {
    1192. 

  1192.                         $this->defaultNamespace[$pos] = $v;
    1193. 

  1193.                         if (! $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($v)) {
    1194. 

  1194.                             $this->namespaces['ns'.(count($this->namespaces)+1)] = $v;
    1195. 

  1195.                         }
    1196. 

  1196.                     }
    1197. 

  1197.                     if($v == 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' || $v == 'http://www.w3.org/1999/XMLSchema' || $v == 'http://www.w3.org/2000/10/XMLSchema'){
    1198. 

  1198.                         $this->XMLSchemaVersion = $v;
    1199. 

  1199.                         $this->namespaces['xsi'] = $v.'-instance';
    1200. 

  1200.                     }
    1201. 

  1201.                 }
    1202. 

  1202.             }
    1203. 

  1203.             foreach($attrs as $k => $v){
    1204. 

  1204.                 // expand each attribute
    1205. 

  1205.                 $k = strpos($k,':') ? $this->expandQname($k) : $k;
    1206. 

  1206.                 $v = strpos($v,':') ? $this->expandQname($v) : $v;
    1207. 

  1207.                 $eAttrs[$k] = $v;
    1208. 

  1208.             }
    1209. 

  1209.             $attrs = $eAttrs;
    1210. 

  1210.         } else {
    1211. 

  1211.             $attrs = array();
    1212. 

  1212.         }
    1213. 

  1213.         // find status, register data
    1214. 

  1214.         switch($name){
    1215. 

  1215.             case 'all':            // (optional) compositor content for a complexType
    1216. 

  1216.             case 'choice':
    1217. 

  1217.             case 'group':
    1218. 

  1218.             case 'sequence':
    1219. 

  1219.                 //$this->xdebug("compositor $name for currentComplexType: $this->currentComplexType and currentElement: $this->currentElement");
    1220. 

  1220.                 $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['compositor'] = $name;
    1221. 

  1221.                 //if($name == 'all' || $name == 'sequence'){
    1222. 

  1222.                 //    $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['phpType'] = 'struct';
    1223. 

  1223.                 //}
    1224. 

  1224.             break;
    1225. 

  1225.             case 'attribute':    // complexType attribute
    1226. 

  1226.                 //$this->xdebug("parsing attribute $attrs[name] $attrs[ref] of value: ".$attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType']);
    1227. 

  1227.                 $this->xdebug("parsing attribute:");
    1228. 

  1228.                 $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($attrs));
    1229. 

  1229.                 if (!isset($attrs['form'])) {
    1230. 

  1230.                     $attrs['form'] = $this->schemaInfo['attributeFormDefault'];
    1231. 

  1231.                 }
    1232. 

  1232.                 if (isset($attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType'])) {
    1233. 

  1233.                     $v = $attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType'];
    1234. 

  1234.                     if (!strpos($v, ':')) {
    1235. 

  1235.                         // no namespace in arrayType attribute value...
    1236. 

  1236.                         if ($this->defaultNamespace[$pos]) {
    1237. 

  1237.                             // ...so use the default
    1238. 

  1238.                             $attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType'] = $this->defaultNamespace[$pos] . ':' . $attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType'];
    1239. 

  1239.                         }
    1240. 

  1240.                     }
    1241. 

  1241.                 }
    1242. 

  1242.                 if(isset($attrs['name'])){
    1243. 

  1243.                     $this->attributes[$attrs['name']] = $attrs;
    1244. 

  1244.                     $aname = $attrs['name'];
    1245. 

  1245.                 } elseif(isset($attrs['ref']) && $attrs['ref'] == 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/:arrayType'){
    1246. 

  1246.                     if (isset($attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType'])) {
    1247. 

  1247.                         $aname = $attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType'];
    1248. 

  1248.                     } else {
    1249. 

  1249.                         $aname = '';
    1250. 

  1250.                     }
    1251. 

  1251.                 } elseif(isset($attrs['ref'])){
    1252. 

  1252.                     $aname = $attrs['ref'];
    1253. 

  1253.                     $this->attributes[$attrs['ref']] = $attrs;
    1254. 

  1254.                 }
    1255. 

  1255.                 
    1256. 

  1256.                 if($this->currentComplexType){    // This should *always* be
    1257. 

  1257.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['attrs'][$aname] = $attrs;
    1258. 

  1258.                 }
    1259. 

  1259.                 // arrayType attribute
    1260. 

  1260.                 if(isset($attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType']) || $this->getLocalPart($aname) == 'arrayType'){
    1261. 

  1261.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['phpType'] = 'array';
    1262. 

  1262.                     $prefix = $this->getPrefix($aname);
    1263. 

  1263.                     if(isset($attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType'])){
    1264. 

  1264.                         $v = $attrs['http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType'];
    1265. 

  1265.                     } else {
    1266. 

  1266.                         $v = '';
    1267. 

  1267.                     }
    1268. 

  1268.                     if(strpos($v,'[,]')){
    1269. 

  1269.                         $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['multidimensional'] = true;
    1270. 

  1270.                     }
    1271. 

  1271.                     $v = substr($v,0,strpos($v,'[')); // clip the []
    1272. 

  1272.                     if(!strpos($v,':') && isset($this->typemap[$this->XMLSchemaVersion][$v])){
    1273. 

  1273.                         $v = $this->XMLSchemaVersion.':'.$v;
    1274. 

  1274.                     }
    1275. 

  1275.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['arrayType'] = $v;
    1276. 

  1276.                 }
    1277. 

  1277.             break;
    1278. 

  1278.             case 'complexContent':    // (optional) content for a complexType
    1279. 

  1279.             break;
    1280. 

  1280.             case 'complexType':
    1281. 

  1281.                 array_push($this->complexTypeStack, $this->currentComplexType);
    1282. 

  1282.                 if(isset($attrs['name'])){
    1283. 

  1283.                     $this->xdebug('processing named complexType '.$attrs['name']);
    1284. 

  1284.                     //$this->currentElement = false;
    1285. 

  1285.                     $this->currentComplexType = $attrs['name'];
    1286. 

  1286.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType] = $attrs;
    1287. 

  1287.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['typeClass'] = 'complexType';
    1288. 

  1288.                     // This is for constructs like
    1289. 

  1289.                     //           <complexType name="ListOfString" base="soap:Array">
    1290. 

  1290.                     //                <sequence>
    1291. 

  1291.                     //                    <element name="string" type="xsd:string"
    1292. 

  1292.                     //                        minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" />
    1293. 

  1293.                     //                </sequence>
    1294. 

  1294.                     //            </complexType>
    1295. 

  1295.                     if(isset($attrs['base']) && ereg(':Array$',$attrs['base'])){
    1296. 

  1296.                         $this->xdebug('complexType is unusual array');
    1297. 

  1297.                         $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['phpType'] = 'array';
    1298. 

  1298.                     } else {
    1299. 

  1299.                         $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['phpType'] = 'struct';
    1300. 

  1300.                     }
    1301. 

  1301.                 }else{
    1302. 

  1302.                     $this->xdebug('processing unnamed complexType for element '.$this->currentElement);
    1303. 

  1303.                     $this->currentComplexType = $this->currentElement . '_ContainedType';
    1304. 

  1304.                     //$this->currentElement = false;
    1305. 

  1305.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType] = $attrs;
    1306. 

  1306.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['typeClass'] = 'complexType';
    1307. 

  1307.                     // This is for constructs like
    1308. 

  1308.                     //           <complexType name="ListOfString" base="soap:Array">
    1309. 

  1309.                     //                <sequence>
    1310. 

  1310.                     //                    <element name="string" type="xsd:string"
    1311. 

  1311.                     //                        minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" />
    1312. 

  1312.                     //                </sequence>
    1313. 

  1313.                     //            </complexType>
    1314. 

  1314.                     if(isset($attrs['base']) && ereg(':Array$',$attrs['base'])){
    1315. 

  1315.                         $this->xdebug('complexType is unusual array');
    1316. 

  1316.                         $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['phpType'] = 'array';
    1317. 

  1317.                     } else {
    1318. 

  1318.                         $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['phpType'] = 'struct';
    1319. 

  1319.                     }
    1320. 

  1320.                 }
    1321. 

  1321.             break;
    1322. 

  1322.             case 'element':
    1323. 

  1323.                 array_push($this->elementStack, $this->currentElement);
    1324. 

  1324.                 // elements defined as part of a complex type should
    1325. 

  1325.                 // not really be added to $this->elements, but for some
    1326. 

  1326.                 // reason, they are
    1327. 

  1327.                 if (!isset($attrs['form'])) {
    1328. 

  1328.                     $attrs['form'] = $this->schemaInfo['elementFormDefault'];
    1329. 

  1329.                 }
    1330. 

  1330.                 if(isset($attrs['type'])){
    1331. 

  1331.                     $this->xdebug("processing typed element ".$attrs['name']." of type ".$attrs['type']);
    1332. 

  1332.                     if (! $this->getPrefix($attrs['type'])) {
    1333. 

  1333.                         if ($this->defaultNamespace[$pos]) {
    1334. 

  1334.                             $attrs['type'] = $this->defaultNamespace[$pos] . ':' . $attrs['type'];
    1335. 

  1335.                             $this->xdebug('used default namespace to make type ' . $attrs['type']);
    1336. 

  1336.                         }
    1337. 

  1337.                     }
    1338. 

  1338.                     // This is for constructs like
    1339. 

  1339.                     //           <complexType name="ListOfString" base="soap:Array">
    1340. 

  1340.                     //                <sequence>
    1341. 

  1341.                     //                    <element name="string" type="xsd:string"
    1342. 

  1342.                     //                        minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" />
    1343. 

  1343.                     //                </sequence>
    1344. 

  1344.                     //            </complexType>
    1345. 

  1345.                     if ($this->currentComplexType && $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['phpType'] == 'array') {
    1346. 

  1346.                         $this->xdebug('arrayType for unusual array is ' . $attrs['type']);
    1347. 

  1347.                         $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['arrayType'] = $attrs['type'];
    1348. 

  1348.                     }
    1349. 

  1349.                     $this->currentElement = $attrs['name'];
    1350. 

  1350.                     $this->elements[ $attrs['name'] ] = $attrs;
    1351. 

  1351.                     $this->elements[ $attrs['name'] ]['typeClass'] = 'element';
    1352. 

  1352.                     $ename = $attrs['name'];
    1353. 

  1353.                 } elseif(isset($attrs['ref'])){
    1354. 

  1354.                     $this->xdebug("processing element as ref to ".$attrs['ref']);
    1355. 

  1355.                     $this->currentElement = "ref to ".$attrs['ref'];
    1356. 

  1356.                     $ename = $this->getLocalPart($attrs['ref']);
    1357. 

  1357.                 } else {
    1358. 

  1358.                     $this->xdebug("processing untyped element ".$attrs['name']);
    1359. 

  1359.                     $this->currentElement = $attrs['name'];
    1360. 

  1360.                     $this->elements[ $attrs['name'] ] = $attrs;
    1361. 

  1361.                     $this->elements[ $attrs['name'] ]['typeClass'] = 'element';
    1362. 

  1362.                     $attrs['type'] = $this->schemaTargetNamespace . ':' . $attrs['name'] . '_ContainedType';
    1363. 

  1363.                     $this->elements[ $attrs['name'] ]['type'] = $attrs['type'];
    1364. 

  1364.                     $ename = $attrs['name'];
    1365. 

  1365.                 }
    1366. 

  1366.                 if(isset($ename) && $this->currentComplexType){
    1367. 

  1367.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['elements'][$ename] = $attrs;
    1368. 

  1368.                 }
    1369. 

  1369.             break;
    1370. 

  1370.             case 'enumeration':    //    restriction value list member
    1371. 

  1371.                 $this->xdebug('enumeration ' . $attrs['value']);
    1372. 

  1372.                 if ($this->currentSimpleType) {
    1373. 

  1373.                     $this->simpleTypes[$this->currentSimpleType]['enumeration'][] = $attrs['value'];
    1374. 

  1374.                 } elseif ($this->currentComplexType) {
    1375. 

  1375.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['enumeration'][] = $attrs['value'];
    1376. 

  1376.                 }
    1377. 

  1377.             break;
    1378. 

  1378.             case 'extension':    // simpleContent or complexContent type extension
    1379. 

  1379.                 $this->xdebug('extension ' . $attrs['base']);
    1380. 

  1380.                 if ($this->currentComplexType) {
    1381. 

  1381.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['extensionBase'] = $attrs['base'];
    1382. 

  1382.                 }
    1383. 

  1383.             break;
    1384. 

  1384.             case 'import':
    1385. 

  1385.                 if (isset($attrs['schemaLocation'])) {
    1386. 

  1386.                     //$this->xdebug('import namespace ' . $attrs['namespace'] . ' from ' . $attrs['schemaLocation']);
    1387. 

  1387.                     $this->imports[$attrs['namespace']][] = array('location' => $attrs['schemaLocation'], 'loaded' => false);
    1388. 

  1388.                 } else {
    1389. 

  1389.                     //$this->xdebug('import namespace ' . $attrs['namespace']);
    1390. 

  1390.                     $this->imports[$attrs['namespace']][] = array('location' => '', 'loaded' => true);
    1391. 

  1391.                     if (! $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($attrs['namespace'])) {
    1392. 

  1392.                         $this->namespaces['ns'.(count($this->namespaces)+1)] = $attrs['namespace'];
    1393. 

  1393.                     }
    1394. 

  1394.                 }
    1395. 

  1395.             break;
    1396. 

  1396.             case 'list':    // simpleType value list
    1397. 

  1397.             break;
    1398. 

  1398.             case 'restriction':    // simpleType, simpleContent or complexContent value restriction
    1399. 

  1399.                 $this->xdebug('restriction ' . $attrs['base']);
    1400. 

  1400.                 if($this->currentSimpleType){
    1401. 

  1401.                     $this->simpleTypes[$this->currentSimpleType]['type'] = $attrs['base'];
    1402. 

  1402.                 } elseif($this->currentComplexType){
    1403. 

  1403.                     $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['restrictionBase'] = $attrs['base'];
    1404. 

  1404.                     if(strstr($attrs['base'],':') == ':Array'){
    1405. 

  1405.                         $this->complexTypes[$this->currentComplexType]['phpType'] = 'array';
    1406. 

  1406.                     }
    1407. 

  1407.                 }
    1408. 

  1408.             break;
    1409. 

  1409.             case 'schema':
    1410. 

  1410.                 $this->schemaInfo = $attrs;
    1411. 

  1411.                 $this->schemaInfo['schemaVersion'] = $this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($prefix);
    1412. 

  1412.                 if (isset($attrs['targetNamespace'])) {
    1413. 

  1413.                     $this->schemaTargetNamespace = $attrs['targetNamespace'];
    1414. 

  1414.                 }
    1415. 

  1415.                 if (!isset($attrs['elementFormDefault'])) {
    1416. 

  1416.                     $this->schemaInfo['elementFormDefault'] = 'unqualified';
    1417. 

  1417.                 }
    1418. 

  1418.                 if (!isset($attrs['attributeFormDefault'])) {
    1419. 

  1419.                     $this->schemaInfo['attributeFormDefault'] = 'unqualified';
    1420. 

  1420.                 }
    1421. 

  1421.             break;
    1422. 

  1422.             case 'simpleContent':    // (optional) content for a complexType
    1423. 

  1423.             break;
    1424. 

  1424.             case 'simpleType':
    1425. 

  1425.                 array_push($this->simpleTypeStack, $this->currentSimpleType);
    1426. 

  1426.                 if(isset($attrs['name'])){
    1427. 

  1427.                     $this->xdebug("processing simpleType for name " . $attrs['name']);
    1428. 

  1428.                     $this->currentSimpleType = $attrs['name'];
    1429. 

  1429.                     $this->simpleTypes[ $attrs['name'] ] = $attrs;
    1430.
