  1430.                     $this->simpleTypes[ $attrs['name'] ]['typeClass'] = 'simpleType';
    1431. 

  1431.                     $this->simpleTypes[ $attrs['name'] ]['phpType'] = 'scalar';
    1432. 

  1432.                 } else {
    1433. 

  1433.                     $this->xdebug('processing unnamed simpleType for element '.$this->currentElement);
    1434. 

  1434.                     $this->currentSimpleType = $this->currentElement . '_ContainedType';
    1435. 

  1435.                     //$this->currentElement = false;
    1436. 

  1436.                     $this->simpleTypes[$this->currentSimpleType] = $attrs;
    1437. 

  1437.                     $this->simpleTypes[$this->currentSimpleType]['phpType'] = 'scalar';
    1438. 

  1438.                 }
    1439. 

  1439.             break;
    1440. 

  1440.             case 'union':    // simpleType type list
    1441. 

  1441.             break;
    1442. 

  1442.             default:
    1443. 

  1443.                 //$this->xdebug("do not have anything to do for element $name");
    1444. 

  1444.         }
    1445. 

  1445.     }
    1446. 

  1446.  
    1447. 

  1447.     /**
    1448. 

  1448.     * end-element handler
    1449. 

  1449.     *
    1450. 

  1450.     * @param    string $parser XML parser object
    1451. 

  1451.     * @param    string $name element name
    1452. 

  1452.     * @access   private
    1453. 

  1453.     */
    1454. 

  1454.     function schemaEndElement($parser, $name) {
    1455. 

  1455.         // bring depth down a notch
    1456. 

  1456.         $this->depth--;
    1457. 

  1457.         // position of current element is equal to the last value left in depth_array for my depth
    1458. 

  1458.         if(isset($this->depth_array[$this->depth])){
    1459. 

  1459.             $pos = $this->depth_array[$this->depth];
    1460. 

  1460.         }
    1461. 

  1461.         // get element prefix
    1462. 

  1462.         if ($prefix = $this->getPrefix($name)){
    1463. 

  1463.             // get unqualified name
    1464. 

  1464.             $name = $this->getLocalPart($name);
    1465. 

  1465.         } else {
    1466. 

  1466.             $prefix = '';
    1467. 

  1467.         }
    1468. 

  1468.         // move on...
    1469. 

  1469.         if($name == 'complexType'){
    1470. 

  1470.             $this->xdebug('done processing complexType ' . ($this->currentComplexType ? $this->currentComplexType : '(unknown)'));
    1471. 

  1471.             $this->currentComplexType = array_pop($this->complexTypeStack);
    1472. 

  1472.             //$this->currentElement = false;
    1473. 

  1473.         }
    1474. 

  1474.         if($name == 'element'){
    1475. 

  1475.             $this->xdebug('done processing element ' . ($this->currentElement ? $this->currentElement : '(unknown)'));
    1476. 

  1476.             $this->currentElement = array_pop($this->elementStack);
    1477. 

  1477.         }
    1478. 

  1478.         if($name == 'simpleType'){
    1479. 

  1479.             $this->xdebug('done processing simpleType ' . ($this->currentSimpleType ? $this->currentSimpleType : '(unknown)'));
    1480. 

  1480.             $this->currentSimpleType = array_pop($this->simpleTypeStack);
    1481. 

  1481.         }
    1482. 

  1482.     }
    1483. 

  1483.  
    1484. 

  1484.     /**
    1485. 

  1485.     * element content handler
    1486. 

  1486.     *
    1487. 

  1487.     * @param    string $parser XML parser object
    1488. 

  1488.     * @param    string $data element content
    1489. 

  1489.     * @access   private
    1490. 

  1490.     */
    1491. 

  1491.     function schemaCharacterData($parser, $data){
    1492. 

  1492.         $pos = $this->depth_array[$this->depth - 1];
    1493. 

  1493.         $this->message[$pos]['cdata'] .= $data;
    1494. 

  1494.     }
    1495. 

  1495.  
    1496. 

  1496.     /**
    1497. 

  1497.     * serialize the schema
    1498. 

  1498.     *
    1499. 

  1499.     * @access   public
    1500. 

  1500.     */
    1501. 

  1501.     function serializeSchema(){
    1502. 

  1502.  
    1503. 

  1503.         $schemaPrefix = $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($this->XMLSchemaVersion);
    1504. 

  1504.         $xml = '';
    1505. 

  1505.         // imports
    1506. 

  1506.         if (sizeof($this->imports) > 0) {
    1507. 

  1507.             foreach($this->imports as $ns => $list) {
    1508. 

  1508.                 foreach ($list as $ii) {
    1509. 

  1509.                     if ($ii['location'] != '') {
    1510. 

  1510.                         $xml .= " <$schemaPrefix:import location=\"" . $ii['location'] . '" namespace="' . $ns . "\" />\n";
    1511. 

  1511.                     } else {
    1512. 

  1512.                         $xml .= " <$schemaPrefix:import namespace=\"" . $ns . "\" />\n";
    1513. 

  1513.                     }
    1514. 

  1514.                 }
    1515. 

  1515.             } 
    1516. 

  1516.         } 
    1517. 

  1517.         // complex types
    1518. 

  1518.         foreach($this->complexTypes as $typeName => $attrs){
    1519. 

  1519.             $contentStr = '';
    1520. 

  1520.             // serialize child elements
    1521. 

  1521.             if(isset($attrs['elements']) && (count($attrs['elements']) > 0)){
    1522. 

  1522.                 foreach($attrs['elements'] as $element => $eParts){
    1523. 

  1523.                     if(isset($eParts['ref'])){
    1524. 

  1524.                         $contentStr .= "   <$schemaPrefix:element ref=\"$element\"/>\n";
    1525. 

  1525.                     } else {
    1526. 

  1526.                         $contentStr .= "   <$schemaPrefix:element name=\"$element\" type=\"" . $this->contractQName($eParts['type']) . "\"";
    1527. 

  1527.                         foreach ($eParts as $aName => $aValue) {
    1528. 

  1528.                             // handle, e.g., abstract, default, form, minOccurs, maxOccurs, nillable
    1529. 

  1529.                             if ($aName != 'name' && $aName != 'type') {
    1530. 

  1530.                                 $contentStr .= " $aName=\"$aValue\"";
    1531. 

  1531.                             }
    1532. 

  1532.                         }
    1533. 

  1533.                         $contentStr .= "/>\n";
    1534. 

  1534.                     }
    1535. 

  1535.                 }
    1536. 

  1536.                 // compositor wraps elements
    1537. 

  1537.                 if (isset($attrs['compositor']) && ($attrs['compositor'] != '')) {
    1538. 

  1538.                     $contentStr = "  <$schemaPrefix:$attrs[compositor]>\n".$contentStr."  </$schemaPrefix:$attrs[compositor]>\n";
    1539. 

  1539.                 }
    1540. 

  1540.             }
    1541. 

  1541.             // attributes
    1542. 

  1542.             if(isset($attrs['attrs']) && (count($attrs['attrs']) >= 1)){
    1543. 

  1543.                 foreach($attrs['attrs'] as $attr => $aParts){
    1544. 

  1544.                     $contentStr .= "    <$schemaPrefix:attribute";
    1545. 

  1545.                     foreach ($aParts as $a => $v) {
    1546. 

  1546.                         if ($a == 'ref' || $a == 'type') {
    1547. 

  1547.                             $contentStr .= " $a=\"".$this->contractQName($v).'"';
    1548. 

  1548.                         } elseif ($a == 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType') {
    1549. 

  1549.                             $this->usedNamespaces['wsdl'] = $this->namespaces['wsdl'];
    1550. 

  1550.                             $contentStr .= ' wsdl:arrayType="'.$this->contractQName($v).'"';
    1551. 

  1551.                         } else {
    1552. 

  1552.                             $contentStr .= " $a=\"$v\"";
    1553. 

  1553.                         }
    1554. 

  1554.                     }
    1555. 

  1555.                     $contentStr .= "/>\n";
    1556. 

  1556.                 }
    1557. 

  1557.             }
    1558. 

  1558.             // if restriction
    1559. 

  1559.             if (isset($attrs['restrictionBase']) && $attrs['restrictionBase'] != ''){
    1560. 

  1560.                 $contentStr = "   <$schemaPrefix:restriction base=\"".$this->contractQName($attrs['restrictionBase'])."\">\n".$contentStr."   </$schemaPrefix:restriction>\n";
    1561. 

  1561.                 // complex or simple content
    1562. 

  1562.                 if ((isset($attrs['elements']) && count($attrs['elements']) > 0) || (isset($attrs['attrs']) && count($attrs['attrs']) > 0)){
    1563. 

  1563.                     $contentStr = "  <$schemaPrefix:complexContent>\n".$contentStr."  </$schemaPrefix:complexContent>\n";
    1564. 

  1564.                 }
    1565. 

  1565.             }
    1566. 

  1566.             // finalize complex type
    1567. 

  1567.             if($contentStr != ''){
    1568. 

  1568.                 $contentStr = " <$schemaPrefix:complexType name=\"$typeName\">\n".$contentStr." </$schemaPrefix:complexType>\n";
    1569. 

  1569.             } else {
    1570. 

  1570.                 $contentStr = " <$schemaPrefix:complexType name=\"$typeName\"/>\n";
    1571. 

  1571.             }
    1572. 

  1572.             $xml .= $contentStr;
    1573. 

  1573.         }
    1574. 

  1574.         // simple types
    1575. 

  1575.         if(isset($this->simpleTypes) && count($this->simpleTypes) > 0){
    1576. 

  1576.             foreach($this->simpleTypes as $typeName => $eParts){
    1577. 

  1577.                 $xml .= " <$schemaPrefix:simpleType name=\"$typeName\">\n  <$schemaPrefix:restriction base=\"".$this->contractQName($eParts['type'])."\"/>\n";
    1578. 

  1578.                 if (isset($eParts['enumeration'])) {
    1579. 

  1579.                     foreach ($eParts['enumeration'] as $e) {
    1580. 

  1580.                         $xml .= "  <$schemaPrefix:enumeration value=\"$e\"/>\n";
    1581. 

  1581.                     }
    1582. 

  1582.                 }
    1583. 

  1583.                 $xml .= " </$schemaPrefix:simpleType>";
    1584. 

  1584.             }
    1585. 

  1585.         }
    1586. 

  1586.         // elements
    1587. 

  1587.         if(isset($this->elements) && count($this->elements) > 0){
    1588. 

  1588.             foreach($this->elements as $element => $eParts){
    1589. 

  1589.                 $xml .= " <$schemaPrefix:element name=\"$element\" type=\"".$this->contractQName($eParts['type'])."\"/>\n";
    1590. 

  1590.             }
    1591. 

  1591.         }
    1592. 

  1592.         // attributes
    1593. 

  1593.         if(isset($this->attributes) && count($this->attributes) > 0){
    1594. 

  1594.             foreach($this->attributes as $attr => $aParts){
    1595. 

  1595.                 $xml .= " <$schemaPrefix:attribute name=\"$attr\" type=\"".$this->contractQName($aParts['type'])."\"\n/>";
    1596. 

  1596.             }
    1597. 

  1597.         }
    1598. 

  1598.         // finish 'er up
    1599. 

  1599.         $el = "<$schemaPrefix:schema targetNamespace=\"$this->schemaTargetNamespace\"\n";
    1600. 

  1600.         foreach (array_diff($this->usedNamespaces, $this->enclosingNamespaces) as $nsp => $ns) {
    1601. 

  1601.             $el .= " xmlns:$nsp=\"$ns\"\n";
    1602. 

  1602.         }
    1603. 

  1603.         $xml = $el . ">\n".$xml."</$schemaPrefix:schema>\n";
    1604. 

  1604.         return $xml;
    1605. 

  1605.     }
    1606. 

  1606.  
    1607. 

  1607.     /**
    1608. 

  1608.     * adds debug data to the clas level debug string
    1609. 

  1609.     *
    1610. 

  1610.     * @param    string $string debug data
    1611. 

  1611.     * @access   private
    1612. 

  1612.     */
    1613. 

  1613.     function xdebug($string){
    1614. 

  1614.         $this->debug('<' . $this->schemaTargetNamespace . '> '.$string);
    1615. 

  1615.     }
    1616. 

  1616.  
    1617. 

  1617.     /**
    1618. 

  1618.     * get the PHP type of a user defined type in the schema
    1619. 

  1619.     * PHP type is kind of a misnomer since it actually returns 'struct' for assoc. arrays
    1620. 

  1620.     * returns false if no type exists, or not w/ the given namespace
    1621. 

  1621.     * else returns a string that is either a native php type, or 'struct'
    1622. 

  1622.     *
    1623. 

  1623.     * @param string $type, name of defined type
    1624. 

  1624.     * @param string $ns, namespace of type
    1625. 

  1625.     * @return mixed 
    1626. 

  1626.     * @access public
    1627. 

  1627.     * @deprecated
    1628. 

  1628.     */
    1629. 

  1629.     function getPHPType($type,$ns){
    1630. 

  1630.         if(isset($this->typemap[$ns][$type])){
    1631. 

  1631.             //print "found type '$type' and ns $ns in typemap<br>";
    1632. 

  1632.             return $this->typemap[$ns][$type];
    1633. 

  1633.         } elseif(isset($this->complexTypes[$type])){
    1634. 

  1634.             //print "getting type '$type' and ns $ns from complexTypes array<br>";
    1635. 

  1635.             return $this->complexTypes[$type]['phpType'];
    1636. 

  1636.         }
    1637. 

  1637.         return false;
    1638. 

  1638.     }
    1639. 

  1639.  
    1640. 

  1640.     /**
    1641. 

  1641.     * returns an associative array of information about a given type
    1642. 

  1642.     * returns false if no type exists by the given name
    1643. 

  1643.     *
    1644. 

  1644.     *    For a complexType typeDef = array(
    1645. 

  1645.     *    'restrictionBase' => '',
    1646. 

  1646.     *    'phpType' => '',
    1647. 

  1647.     *    'compositor' => '(sequence|all)',
    1648. 

  1648.     *    'elements' => array(), // refs to elements array
    1649. 

  1649.     *    'attrs' => array() // refs to attributes array
    1650. 

  1650.     *    ... and so on (see addComplexType)
    1651. 

  1651.     *    )
    1652. 

  1652.     *
    1653. 

  1653.     *   For simpleType or element, the array has different keys.
    1654. 

  1654.     *
    1655. 

  1655.     * @param string 
    1656. 

  1656.     * @return mixed 
    1657. 

  1657.     * @access public
    1658. 

  1658.     * @see addComplexType
    1659. 

  1659.     * @see addSimpleType
    1660. 

  1660.     * @see addElement
    1661. 

  1661.     */
    1662. 

  1662.     function getTypeDef($type){
    1663. 

  1663.         //$this->debug("in getTypeDef for type $type");
    1664. 

  1664.         if(isset($this->complexTypes[$type])){
    1665. 

  1665.             $this->xdebug("in getTypeDef, found complexType $type");
    1666. 

  1666.             return $this->complexTypes[$type];
    1667. 

  1667.         } elseif(isset($this->simpleTypes[$type])){
    1668. 

  1668.             $this->xdebug("in getTypeDef, found simpleType $type");
    1669. 

  1669.             if (!isset($this->simpleTypes[$type]['phpType'])) {
    1670. 

  1670.                 // get info for type to tack onto the simple type
    1671. 

  1671.                 // TODO: can this ever really apply (i.e. what is a simpleType really?)
    1672. 

  1672.                 $uqType = substr($this->simpleTypes[$type]['type'], strrpos($this->simpleTypes[$type]['type'], ':') + 1);
    1673. 

  1673.                 $ns = substr($this->simpleTypes[$type]['type'], 0, strrpos($this->simpleTypes[$type]['type'], ':'));
    1674. 

  1674.                 $etype = $this->getTypeDef($uqType);
    1675. 

  1675.                 if ($etype) {
    1676. 

  1676.                     $this->xdebug("in getTypeDef, found type for simpleType $type:");
    1677. 

  1677.                     $this->xdebug($this->varDump($etype));
    1678. 

  1678.                     if (isset($etype['phpType'])) {
    1679. 

  1679.                         $this->simpleTypes[$type]['phpType'] = $etype['phpType'];
    1680. 

  1680.                     }
    1681. 

  1681.                     if (isset($etype['elements'])) {
    1682. 

  1682.                         $this->simpleTypes[$type]['elements'] = $etype['elements'];
    1683. 

  1683.                     }
    1684. 

  1684.                 }
    1685. 

  1685.             }
    1686. 

  1686.             return $this->simpleTypes[$type];
    1687. 

  1687.         } elseif(isset($this->elements[$type])){
    1688. 

  1688.             $this->xdebug("in getTypeDef, found element $type");
    1689. 

  1689.             if (!isset($this->elements[$type]['phpType'])) {
    1690. 

  1690.                 // get info for type to tack onto the element
    1691. 

  1691.                 $uqType = substr($this->elements[$type]['type'], strrpos($this->elements[$type]['type'], ':') + 1);
    1692. 

  1692.                 $ns = substr($this->elements[$type]['type'], 0, strrpos($this->elements[$type]['type'], ':'));
    1693. 

  1693.                 $etype = $this->getTypeDef($uqType);
    1694. 

  1694.                 if ($etype) {
    1695. 

  1695.                     $this->xdebug("in getTypeDef, found type for element $type:");
    1696. 

  1696.                     $this->xdebug($this->varDump($etype));
    1697. 

  1697.                     if (isset($etype['phpType'])) {
    1698. 

  1698.                         $this->elements[$type]['phpType'] = $etype['phpType'];
    1699. 

  1699.                     }
    1700. 

  1700.                     if (isset($etype['elements'])) {
    1701. 

  1701.                         $this->elements[$type]['elements'] = $etype['elements'];
    1702. 

  1702.                     }
    1703. 

  1703.                 } elseif ($ns == 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema') {
    1704. 

  1704.                     $this->xdebug("in getTypeDef, element $type is an XSD type");
    1705. 

  1705.                     $this->elements[$type]['phpType'] = 'scalar';
    1706. 

  1706.                 }
    1707. 

  1707.             }
    1708. 

  1708.             return $this->elements[$type];
    1709. 

  1709.         } elseif(isset($this->attributes[$type])){
    1710. 

  1710.             $this->xdebug("in getTypeDef, found attribute $type");
    1711. 

  1711.             return $this->attributes[$type];
    1712. 

  1712.         } elseif (ereg('_ContainedType$', $type)) {
    1713. 

  1713.             $this->xdebug("in getTypeDef, have an untyped element $type");
    1714. 

  1714.             $typeDef['typeClass'] = 'simpleType';
    1715. 

  1715.             $typeDef['phpType'] = 'scalar';
    1716. 

  1716.             $typeDef['type'] = 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string';
    1717. 

  1717.             return $typeDef;
    1718. 

  1718.         }
    1719. 

  1719.         $this->xdebug("in getTypeDef, did not find $type");
    1720. 

  1720.         return false;
    1721. 

  1721.     }
    1722. 

  1722.  
    1723. 

  1723.     /**
    1724. 

  1724.     * returns a sample serialization of a given type, or false if no type by the given name
    1725. 

  1725.     *
    1726. 

  1726.     * @param string $type, name of type
    1727. 

  1727.     * @return mixed 
    1728. 

  1728.     * @access public
    1729. 

  1729.     * @deprecated
    1730. 

  1730.     */
    1731. 

  1731.     function serializeTypeDef($type){
    1732. 

  1732.         //print "in sTD() for type $type<br>";
    1733. 

  1733.     if($typeDef = $this->getTypeDef($type)){
    1734. 

  1734.         $str .= '<'.$type;
    1735. 

  1735.         if(is_array($typeDef['attrs'])){
    1736. 

  1736.         foreach($attrs as $attName => $data){
    1737. 

  1737.             $str .= " $attName=\"{type = ".$data['type']."}\"";
    1738. 

  1738.         }
    1739. 

  1739.         }
    1740. 

  1740.         $str .= " xmlns=\"".$this->schema['targetNamespace']."\"";
    1741. 

  1741.         if(count($typeDef['elements']) > 0){
    1742. 

  1742.         $str .= ">";
    1743. 

  1743.         foreach($typeDef['elements'] as $element => $eData){
    1744. 

  1744.             $str .= $this->serializeTypeDef($element);
    1745. 

  1745.         }
    1746. 

  1746.         $str .= "</$type>";
    1747. 

  1747.         } elseif($typeDef['typeClass'] == 'element') {
    1748. 

  1748.         $str .= "></$type>";
    1749. 

  1749.         } else {
    1750. 

  1750.         $str .= "/>";
    1751. 

  1751.         }
    1752. 

  1752.             return $str;
    1753. 

  1753.     }
    1754. 

  1754.         return false;
    1755. 

  1755.     }
    1756. 

  1756.  
    1757. 

  1757.     /**
    1758. 

  1758.     * returns HTML form elements that allow a user
    1759. 

  1759.     * to enter values for creating an instance of the given type.
    1760. 

  1760.     *
    1761. 

  1761.     * @param string $name, name for type instance
    1762. 

  1762.     * @param string $type, name of type
    1763. 

  1763.     * @return string 
    1764. 

  1764.     * @access public
    1765. 

  1765.     * @deprecated
    1766. 

  1766.     */
    1767. 

  1767.     function typeToForm($name,$type){
    1768. 

  1768.         // get typedef
    1769. 

  1769.         if($typeDef = $this->getTypeDef($type)){
    1770. 

  1770.             // if struct
    1771. 

  1771.             if($typeDef['phpType'] == 'struct'){
    1772. 

  1772.                 $buffer .= '<table>';
    1773. 

  1773.                 foreach($typeDef['elements'] as $child => $childDef){
    1774. 

  1774.                     $buffer .= "
    1775. 

  1775.                     <tr><td align='right'>$childDef[name] (type: ".$this->getLocalPart($childDef['type'])."):</td>
    1776. 

  1776.                     <td><input type='text' name='parameters[".$name."][$childDef[name]]'></td></tr>";
    1777. 

  1777.                 }
    1778. 

  1778.                 $buffer .= '</table>';
    1779. 

  1779.             // if array
    1780. 

  1780.             } elseif($typeDef['phpType'] == 'array'){
    1781. 

  1781.                 $buffer .= '<table>';
    1782. 

  1782.                 for($i=0;$i < 3; $i++){
    1783. 

  1783.                     $buffer .= "
    1784. 

  1784.                     <tr><td align='right'>array item (type: $typeDef[arrayType]):</td>
    1785. 

  1785.                     <td><input type='text' name='parameters[".$name."][]'></td></tr>";
    1786. 

  1786.                 }
    1787. 

  1787.                 $buffer .= '</table>';
    1788. 

  1788.             // if scalar
    1789. 

  1789.             } else {
    1790. 

  1790.                 $buffer .= "<input type='text' name='parameters[$name]'>";
    1791. 

  1791.             }
    1792. 

  1792.         } else {
    1793. 

  1793.             $buffer .= "<input type='text' name='parameters[$name]'>";
    1794. 

  1794.         }
    1795. 

  1795.         return $buffer;
    1796. 

  1796.     }
    1797. 

  1797.     
    1798. 

  1798.     /**
    1799. 

  1799.     * adds a complex type to the schema
    1800. 

  1800.     * 
    1801. 

  1801.     * example: array
    1802. 

  1802.     * 
    1803. 

  1803.     * addType(
    1804. 

  1804.     *     'ArrayOfstring',
    1805. 

  1805.     *     'complexType',
    1806. 

  1806.     *     'array',
    1807. 

  1807.     *     '',
    1808. 

  1808.     *     'SOAP-ENC:Array',
    1809. 

  1809.     *     array('ref'=>'SOAP-ENC:arrayType','wsdl:arrayType'=>'string[]'),
    1810. 

  1810.     *     'xsd:string'
    1811. 

  1811.     * );
    1812. 

  1812.     * 
    1813. 

  1813.     * example: PHP associative array ( SOAP Struct )
    1814. 

  1814.     * 
    1815. 

  1815.     * addType(
    1816. 

  1816.     *     'SOAPStruct',
    1817. 

  1817.     *     'complexType',
    1818. 

  1818.     *     'struct',
    1819. 

  1819.     *     'all',
    1820. 

  1820.     *     array('myVar'=> array('name'=>'myVar','type'=>'string')
    1821. 

  1821.     * );
    1822. 

  1822.     * 
    1823. 

  1823.     * @param name 
    1824. 

  1824.     * @param typeClass (complexType|simpleType|attribute)
    1825. 

  1825.     * @param phpType: currently supported are array and struct (php assoc array)
    1826. 

  1826.     * @param compositor (all|sequence|choice)
    1827. 

  1827.     * @param restrictionBase namespace:name (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/:Array)
    1828. 

  1828.     * @param elements = array ( name = array(name=>'',type=>'') )
    1829. 

  1829.     * @param attrs = array(
    1830. 

  1830.     *      array(
    1831. 

  1831.     *         'ref' => "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/:arrayType",
    1832. 

  1832.     *         "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/:arrayType" => "string[]"
    1833. 

  1833.     *      )
    1834. 

  1834.     *  )
    1835. 

  1835.     * @param arrayType: namespace:name (http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string)
    1836. 

  1836.     * @access public
    1837. 

  1837.     * @see getTypeDef
    1838. 

  1838.     */
    1839. 

  1839.     function addComplexType($name,$typeClass='complexType',$phpType='array',$compositor='',$restrictionBase='',$elements=array(),$attrs=array(),$arrayType=''){
    1840. 

  1840.         $this->complexTypes[$name] = array(
    1841. 

  1841.         'name'        => $name,
    1842. 

  1842.         'typeClass'    => $typeClass,
    1843. 

  1843.         'phpType'    => $phpType,
    1844. 

  1844.         'compositor'=> $compositor,
    1845. 

  1845.         'restrictionBase' => $restrictionBase,
    1846. 

  1846.         'elements'    => $elements,
    1847. 

  1847.         'attrs'        => $attrs,
    1848. 

  1848.         'arrayType'    => $arrayType
    1849. 

  1849.         );
    1850. 

  1850.         
    1851. 

  1851.         $this->xdebug("addComplexType $name:");
    1852. 

  1852.         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($this->complexTypes[$name]));
    1853. 

  1853.     }
    1854. 

  1854.     
    1855. 

  1855.     /**
    1856. 

  1856.     * adds a simple type to the schema
    1857. 

  1857.     *
    1858. 

  1858.     * @param string $name 
    1859. 

  1859.     * @param string $restrictionBase namespace:name (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/:Array)
    1860. 

  1860.     * @param string $typeClass (should always be simpleType)
    1861. 

  1861.     * @param string $phpType (should always be scalar)
    1862. 

  1862.     * @param array $enumeration array of values
    1863. 

  1863.     * @access public
    1864. 

  1864.     * @see xmlschema
    1865. 

  1865.     * @see getTypeDef
    1866. 

  1866.     */
    1867. 

  1867.     function addSimpleType($name, $restrictionBase='', $typeClass='simpleType', $phpType='scalar', $enumeration=array()) {
    1868. 

  1868.         $this->simpleTypes[$name] = array(
    1869. 

  1869.         'name'            => $name,
    1870. 

  1870.         'typeClass'        => $typeClass,
    1871. 

  1871.         'phpType'        => $phpType,
    1872. 

  1872.         'type'            => $restrictionBase,
    1873. 

  1873.         'enumeration'    => $enumeration
    1874. 

  1874.         );
    1875. 

  1875.         
    1876. 

  1876.         $this->xdebug("addSimpleType $name:");
    1877. 

  1877.         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($this->simpleTypes[$name]));
    1878. 

  1878.     }
    1879. 

  1879.  
    1880. 

  1880.     /**
    1881. 

  1881.     * adds an element to the schema
    1882. 

  1882.     *
    1883. 

  1883.     * @param array $attrs attributes that must include name and type
    1884. 

  1884.     * @see xmlschema
    1885. 

  1885.     * @access public
    1886. 

  1886.     */
    1887. 

  1887.     function addElement($attrs) {
    1888. 

  1888.         if (! $this->getPrefix($attrs['type'])) {
    1889. 

  1889.             $attrs['type'] = $this->schemaTargetNamespace . ':' . $attrs['type'];
    1890. 

  1890.         }
    1891. 

  1891.         $this->elements[ $attrs['name'] ] = $attrs;
    1892. 

  1892.         $this->elements[ $attrs['name'] ]['typeClass'] = 'element';
    1893. 

  1893.         
    1894. 

  1894.         $this->xdebug("addElement " . $attrs['name']);
    1895. 

  1895.         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($this->elements[ $attrs['name'] ]));
    1896. 

  1896.     }
    1897. 

  1897. }
    1898. 

  1898.  
    1899. 

  1899.  
    1900. 

  1900.  
    1901. 

  1901. ?><?php
    1902. 

  1902.  
    1903. 

  1903.  
    1904. 

  1904.  
    1905. 

  1905. /**
    1906. 

  1906. * For creating serializable abstractions of native PHP types.  This class
    1907. 

  1907. * allows element name/namespace, XSD type, and XML attributes to be
    1908. 

  1908. * associated with a value.  This is extremely useful when WSDL is not
    1909. 

  1909. * used, but is also useful when WSDL is used with polymorphic types, including
    1910. 

  1910. * xsd:anyType and user-defined types.
    1911. 

  1911. *
    1912. 

  1912. * @author   Dietrich Ayala <dietrich@ganx4.com>
    1913. 

  1913. * @version  $Id: nusoap.php,v 1.94 2005/08/04 01:27:42 snichol Exp $
    1914. 

  1914. * @access   public
    1915. 

  1915. */
    1916. 

  1916. class soapval extends nusoap_base {
    1917. 

  1917.     /**
    1918. 

  1918.      * The XML element name
    1919. 

  1919.      *
    1920. 

  1920.      * @var string 
    1921. 

  1921.      * @access private
    1922. 

  1922.      */
    1923. 

  1923.     var $name;
    1924. 

  1924.     /**
    1925. 

  1925.      * The XML type name (string or false)
    1926. 

  1926.      *
    1927. 

  1927.      * @var mixed 
    1928. 

  1928.      * @access private
    1929. 

  1929.      */
    1930. 

  1930.     var $type;
    1931. 

  1931.     /**
    1932. 

  1932.      * The PHP value
    1933. 

  1933.      *
    1934. 

  1934.      * @var mixed 
    1935. 

  1935.      * @access private
    1936. 

  1936.      */
    1937. 

  1937.     var $value;
    1938. 

  1938.     /**
    1939. 

  1939.      * The XML element namespace (string or false)
    1940. 

  1940.      *
    1941. 

  1941.      * @var mixed 
    1942. 

  1942.      * @access private
    1943. 

  1943.      */
    1944. 

  1944.     var $element_ns;
    1945. 

  1945.     /**
    1946. 

  1946.      * The XML type namespace (string or false)
    1947. 

  1947.      *
    1948. 

  1948.      * @var mixed 
    1949. 

  1949.      * @access private
    1950. 

  1950.      */
    1951. 

  1951.     var $type_ns;
    1952. 

  1952.     /**
    1953. 

  1953.      * The XML element attributes (array or false)
    1954. 

  1954.      *
    1955. 

  1955.      * @var mixed 
    1956. 

  1956.      * @access private
    1957. 

  1957.      */
    1958. 

  1958.     var $attributes;
    1959. 

  1959.  
    1960. 

  1960.     /**
    1961. 

  1961.     * constructor
    1962. 

  1962.     *
    1963. 

  1963.     * @param    string $name optional name
    1964. 

  1964.     * @param    mixed $type optional type name
    1965. 

  1965.     * @param    mixed $value optional value
    1966. 

  1966.     * @param    mixed $element_ns optional namespace of value
    1967. 

  1967.     * @param    mixed $type_ns optional namespace of type
    1968. 

  1968.     * @param    mixed $attributes associative array of attributes to add to element serialization
    1969. 

  1969.     * @access   public
    1970. 

  1970.     */
    1971. 

  1971.       function soapval($name='soapval',$type=false,$value=-1,$element_ns=false,$type_ns=false,$attributes=false) {
    1972. 

  1972.         parent::nusoap_base();
    1973. 

  1973.         $this->name = $name;
    1974. 

  1974.         $this->type = $type;
    1975. 

  1975.         $this->value = $value;
    1976. 

  1976.         $this->element_ns = $element_ns;
    1977. 

  1977.         $this->type_ns = $type_ns;
    1978. 

  1978.         $this->attributes = $attributes;
    1979. 

  1979.     }
    1980. 

  1980.  
    1981. 

  1981.     /**
    1982. 

  1982.     * return serialized value
    1983. 

  1983.     *
    1984. 

  1984.     * @param    string $use The WSDL use value (encoded|literal)
    1985. 

  1985.     * @return    string XML data
    1986. 

  1986.     * @access   public
    1987. 

  1987.     */
    1988. 

  1988.     function serialize($use='encoded') {
    1989. 

  1989.         return $this->serialize_val($this->value,$this->name,$this->type,$this->element_ns,$this->type_ns,$this->attributes,$use);
    1990. 

  1990.     }
    1991. 

  1991.  
    1992. 

  1992.     /**
    1993. 

  1993.     * decodes a soapval object into a PHP native type
    1994. 

  1994.     *
    1995. 

  1995.     * @return    mixed 
    1996. 

  1996.     * @access   public
    1997. 

  1997.     */
    1998. 

  1998.     function decode(){
    1999. 

  1999.         return $this->value;
    2000. 

  2000.     }
    2001. 

  2001. }
    2002. 

  2002.  
    2003. 

  2003.  
    2004. 

  2004.  
    2005. 

  2005. ?><?php
    2006. 

  2006.  
    2007. 

  2007.  
    2008. 

  2008.  
    2009. 

  2009. /**
    2010. 

  2010. * transport class for sending/receiving data via HTTP and HTTPS
    2011. 

  2011. * NOTE: PHP must be compiled with the CURL extension for HTTPS support
    2012. 

  2012. *
    2013. 

  2013. * @author   Dietrich Ayala <dietrich@ganx4.com>
    2014. 

  2014. * @version  $Id: nusoap.php,v 1.94 2005/08/04 01:27:42 snichol Exp $
    2015. 

  2015. * @access public
    2016. 

  2016. */
    2017. 

  2017. class soap_transport_http extends nusoap_base {
    2018. 

  2018.  
    2019. 

  2019.     var $url = '';
    2020. 

  2020.     var $uri = '';
    2021. 

  2021.     var $digest_uri = '';
    2022. 

  2022.     var $scheme = '';
    2023. 

  2023.     var $host = '';
    2024. 

  2024.     var $port = '';
    2025. 

  2025.     var $path = '';
    2026. 

  2026.     var $request_method = 'POST';
    2027. 

  2027.     var $protocol_version = '1.0';
    2028. 

  2028.     var $encoding = '';
    2029. 

  2029.     var $outgoing_headers = array();
    2030. 

  2030.     var $incoming_headers = array();
    2031. 

  2031.     var $incoming_cookies = array();
    2032. 

  2032.     var $outgoing_payload = '';
    2033. 

  2033.     var $incoming_payload = '';
    2034. 

  2034.     var $useSOAPAction = true;
    2035. 

  2035.     var $persistentConnection = false;
    2036. 

  2036.     var $ch = false;    // cURL handle
    2037. 

  2037.     
    2038. 

  2038.     var $username = '';
    2039. 

  2039.     var $password = '';
    2040. 

  2040.     var $authtype = '';
    2041. 

  2041.     var $digestRequest = array();
    2042. 

  2042.     var $certRequest = array();    // keys must be cainfofile (optional), sslcertfile, sslkeyfile, passphrase, verifypeer (optional), verifyhost (optional)
    2043. 

  2043.                                 // cainfofile: certificate authority file, e.g. '$pathToPemFiles/rootca.pem'
    2044. 

  2044.                                 // sslcertfile: SSL certificate file, e.g. '$pathToPemFiles/mycert.pem'
    2045. 

  2045.                                 // sslkeyfile: SSL key file, e.g. '$pathToPemFiles/mykey.pem'
    2046. 

  2046.                                 // passphrase: SSL key password/passphrase
    2047. 

  2047.                                 // verifypeer: default is 1
    2048. 

  2048.                                 // verifyhost: default is 1
    2049. 

  2049.  
    2050. 

  2050.     
    2051. 

  2051.  
    2052. 

  2052.     /**
    2053. 

  2053.     * constructor
    2054. 

  2054.     */
    2055. 

  2055.     function soap_transport_http($url){
    2056. 

  2056.         parent::nusoap_base();
    2057. 

  2057.         $this->setURL($url);
    2058. 

  2058.         ereg('\$Revisio' . 'n: ([^ ]+)', $this->revision, $rev);
    2059. 

  2059.         $this->outgoing_headers['User-Agent'] = $this->title.'/'.$this->version.' ('.$rev[1].')';
    2060. 

  2060.         $this->debug('set User-Agent: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['User-Agent']);
    2061. 

  2061.     }
    2062. 

  2062.  
    2063. 

  2063.     function setURL($url) {
    2064. 

  2064.         $this->url = $url;
    2065. 

  2065.  
    2066. 

  2066.         $u = parse_url($url);
    2067. 

  2067.         foreach($u as $k => $v){
    2068. 

  2068.             $this->debug("$k = $v");
    2069. 

  2069.             $this->$k = $v;
    2070. 

  2070.         }
    2071. 

  2071.         
    2072. 

  2072.         // add any GET params to path
    2073. 

  2073.         if(isset($u['query']) && $u['query'] != ''){
    2074. 

  2074.             $this->path .= '?' . $u['query'];
    2075. 

  2075.         }
    2076. 

  2076.         
    2077. 

  2077.         // set default port
    2078. 

  2078.         if(!isset($u['port'])){
    2079. 

  2079.             if($u['scheme'] == 'https'){
    2080. 

  2080.                 $this->port = 443;
    2081. 

  2081.             } else {
    2082. 

  2082.                 $this->port = 80;
    2083. 

  2083.             }
    2084. 

  2084.         }
    2085. 

  2085.         
    2086. 

  2086.         $this->uri = $this->path;
    2087. 

  2087.         $this->digest_uri = $this->uri;
    2088. 

  2088.         
    2089. 

  2089.         // build headers
    2090. 

  2090.         if (!isset($u['port'])) {
    2091. 

  2091.             $this->outgoing_headers['Host'] = $this->host;
    2092. 

  2092.         } else {
    2093. 

  2093.             $this->outgoing_headers['Host'] = $this->host.':'.$this->port;
    2094. 

  2094.         }
    2095. 

  2095.         $this->debug('set Host: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['Host']);
    2096. 

  2096.  
    2097. 

  2097.         if (isset($u['user']) && $u['user'] != '') {
    2098. 

  2098.             $this->setCredentials(urldecode($u['user']), isset($u['pass']) ? urldecode($u['pass']) : '');
    2099. 

  2099.         }
    2100. 

  2100.     }
    2101. 

  2101.     
    2102. 

  2102.     function connect($connection_timeout=0,$response_timeout=30){
    2103. 

  2103.           // For PHP 4.3 with OpenSSL, change https scheme to ssl, then treat like
    2104. 

  2104.           // "regular" socket.
    2105. 

  2105.           // TODO: disabled for now because OpenSSL must be *compiled* in (not just
    2106. 

  2106.           //       loaded), and until PHP5 stream_get_wrappers is not available.
    2107. 

  2107. //          if ($this->scheme == 'https') {
    2108. 

  2108. //              if (version_compare(phpversion(), '4.3.0') >= 0) {
    2109. 

  2109. //                  if (extension_loaded('openssl')) {
    2110. 

  2110. //                      $this->scheme = 'ssl';
    2111. 

  2111. //                      $this->debug('Using SSL over OpenSSL');
    2112. 

  2112. //                  }
    2113. 

  2113. //              }
    2114. 

  2114. //        }
    2115. 

  2115.         $this->debug("connect connection_timeout $connection_timeout, response_timeout $response_timeout, scheme $this->scheme, host $this->host, port $this->port");
    2116. 

  2116.       if ($this->scheme == 'http' || $this->scheme == 'ssl') {
    2117. 

  2117.         // use persistent connection
    2118. 

  2118.         if($this->persistentConnection && isset($this->fp) && is_resource($this->fp)){
    2119. 

  2119.             if (!feof($this->fp)) {
    2120. 

  2120.                 $this->debug('Re-use persistent connection');
    2121. 

  2121.                 return true;
    2122. 

  2122.             }
    2123. 

  2123.             fclose($this->fp);
    2124. 

  2124.             $this->debug('Closed persistent connection at EOF');
    2125. 

  2125.         }
    2126. 

  2126.  
    2127. 

  2127.         // munge host if using OpenSSL
    2128. 

  2128.         if ($this->scheme == 'ssl') {
    2129. 

  2129.             $host = 'ssl://' . $this->host;
    2130. 

  2130.         } else {
    2131. 

  2131.             $host = $this->host;
    2132. 

  2132.         }
    2133. 

  2133.         $this->debug('calling fsockopen with host ' . $host . ' connection_timeout ' . $connection_timeout);
    2134. 

  2134.  
    2135. 

  2135.         // open socket
    2136. 

  2136.         if($connection_timeout > 0){
    2137. 

  2137.             $this->fp = @fsockopen( $host, $this->port, $this->errno, $this->error_str, $connection_timeout);
    2138. 

  2138.         } else {
    2139. 

  2139.             $this->fp = @fsockopen( $host, $this->port, $this->errno, $this->error_str);
    2140. 

  2140.         }
    2141. 

  2141.         
    2142. 

  2142.         // test pointer
    2143. 

  2143.         if(!$this->fp) {
    2144. 

  2144.             $msg = 'Couldn\'t open socket connection to server ' . $this->url;
    2145. 

  2145.             if ($this->errno) {
    2146. 

  2146.                 $msg .= ', Error ('.$this->errno.'): '.$this->error_str;
    2147. 

  2147.             } else {
    2148. 

  2148.                 $msg .= ' prior to connect().  This is often a problem looking up the host name.';
    2149. 

  2149.             }
    2150. 

  2150.             $this->debug($msg);
    2151. 

  2151.             $this->setError($msg);
    2152. 

  2152.             return false;
    2153. 

  2153.         }
    2154. 

  2154.         
    2155. 

  2155.         // set response timeout
    2156. 

  2156.         $this->debug('set response timeout to ' . $response_timeout);
    2157. 

  2157.         socket_set_timeout( $this->fp, $response_timeout);
    2158. 

  2158.  
    2159. 

  2159.         $this->debug('socket connected');
    2160. 

  2160.         return true;
    2161. 

  2161.       } else if ($this->scheme == 'https') {
    2162. 

  2162.         if (!extension_loaded('curl')) {
    2163. 

  2163.             $this->setError('CURL Extension, or OpenSSL extension w/ PHP version >= 4.3 is required for HTTPS');
    2164. 

  2164.             return false;
    2165. 

  2165.         }
    2166. 

  2166.         $this->debug('connect using https');
    2167. 

  2167.         // init CURL
    2168. 

  2168.         $this->ch = curl_init();
    2169. 

  2169.         // set url
    2170. 

  2170.         $hostURL = ($this->port != '') ? "https://$this->host:$this->port" : "https://$this->host";
    2171. 

  2171.         // add path
    2172. 

  2172.         $hostURL .= $this->path;
    2173. 

  2173.         curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_URL, $hostURL);
    2174. 

  2174.         // follow location headers (re-directs)
    2175. 

  2175.         curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, 1);
    2176. 

  2176.         // ask for headers in the response output
    2177. 

  2177.         curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 1);
    2178. 

  2178.         // ask for the response output as the return value
    2179. 

  2179.         curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
    2180. 

  2180.         // encode
    2181. 

  2181.         // We manage this ourselves through headers and encoding
    2182. 

  2182. //        if(function_exists('gzuncompress')){
    2183. 

  2183. //            curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_ENCODING, 'deflate');
    2184. 

  2184. //        }
    2185. 

  2185.         // persistent connection
    2186. 

  2186.         if ($this->persistentConnection) {
    2187. 

  2187.             // The way we send data, we cannot use persistent connections, since
    2188. 

  2188.             // there will be some "junk" at the end of our request.
    2189. 

  2189.             //curl_setopt($this->ch, CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1, true);
    2190. 

  2190.             $this->persistentConnection = false;
    2191. 

  2191.             $this->outgoing_headers['Connection'] = 'close';
    2192. 

  2192.             $this->debug('set Connection: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['Connection']);
    2193. 

  2193.         }
    2194. 

  2194.         // set timeout
    2195. 

  2195.         if ($connection_timeout != 0) {
    2196. 

  2196.             curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $connection_timeout);
    2197. 

  2197.         }
    2198. 

  2198.         // TODO: cURL has added a connection timeout separate from the response timeout
    2199. 

  2199.         //if ($connection_timeout != 0) {
    2200. 

  2200.         //    curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_CONNECTIONTIMEOUT, $connection_timeout);
    2201. 

  2201.         //}
    2202. 

  2202.         //if ($response_timeout != 0) {
    2203. 

  2203.         //    curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $response_timeout);
    2204. 

  2204.         //}
    2205. 

  2205.  
    2206. 

  2206.         // recent versions of cURL turn on peer/host checking by default,
    2207. 

  2207.         // while PHP binaries are not compiled with a default location for the
    2208. 

  2208.         // CA cert bundle, so disable peer/host checking.
    2209. 

  2209. //curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_CAINFO, 'f:\php-4.3.2-win32\extensions\curl-ca-bundle.crt');        
    2210. 

  2210.         curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, 0);
    2211. 

  2211.         curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 0);
    2212. 

  2212.  
    2213. 

  2213.         // support client certificates (thanks Tobias Boes, Doug Anarino, Eryan Ariobowo)
    2214. 

  2214.         if ($this->authtype == 'certificate') {
    2215. 

  2215.             if (isset($this->certRequest['cainfofile'])) {
    2216. 

  2216.                 curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_CAINFO, $this->certRequest['cainfofile']);
    2217. 

  2217.             }
    2218. 

  2218.             if (isset($this->certRequest['verifypeer'])) {
    2219. 

  2219.                 curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, $this->certRequest['verifypeer']);
    2220. 

  2220.             } else {
    2221. 

  2221.                 curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, 1);
    2222. 

  2222.             }
    2223. 

  2223.             if (isset($this->certRequest['verifyhost'])) {
    2224. 

  2224.                 curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, $this->certRequest['verifyhost']);
    2225. 

  2225.             } else {
    2226. 

  2226.                 curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, 1);
    2227. 

  2227.             }
    2228. 

  2228.             if (isset($this->certRequest['sslcertfile'])) {
    2229. 

  2229.                 curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSLCERT, $this->certRequest['sslcertfile']);
    2230. 

  2230.             }
    2231. 

  2231.             if (isset($this->certRequest['sslkeyfile'])) {
    2232. 

  2232.                 curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSLKEY, $this->certRequest['sslkeyfile']);
    2233. 

  2233.             }
    2234. 

  2234.             if (isset($this->certRequest['passphrase'])) {
    2235. 

  2235.                 curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_SSLKEYPASSWD , $this->certRequest['passphrase']);
    2236. 

  2236.             }
    2237. 

  2237.         }
    2238. 

  2238.         $this->debug('cURL connection set up');
    2239. 

  2239.         return true;
    2240. 

  2240.       } else {
    2241. 

  2241.         $this->setError('Unknown scheme ' . $this->scheme);
    2242. 

  2242.         $this->debug('Unknown scheme ' . $this->scheme);
    2243. 

  2243.         return false;
    2244. 

  2244.       }
    2245. 

  2245.     }
    2246. 

  2246.     
    2247. 

  2247.     /**
    2248. 

  2248.     * send the SOAP message via HTTP
    2249. 

  2249.     *
    2250. 

  2250.     * @param    string $data message data
    2251. 

  2251.     * @param    integer $timeout set connection timeout in seconds
    2252. 

  2252.     * @param    integer $response_timeout set response timeout in seconds
    2253. 

  2253.     * @param    array $cookies cookies to send
    2254. 

  2254.     * @return    string data
    2255. 

  2255.     * @access   public
    2256. 

  2256.     */
    2257. 

  2257.     function send($data, $timeout=0, $response_timeout=30, $cookies=NULL) {
    2258. 

  2258.         
    2259. 

  2259.         $this->debug('entered send() with data of length: '.strlen($data));
    2260. 

  2260.  
    2261. 

  2261.         $this->tryagain = true;
    2262. 

  2262.         $tries = 0;
    2263. 

  2263.         while ($this->tryagain) {
    2264. 

  2264.             $this->tryagain = false;
    2265. 

  2265.             if ($tries++ < 2) {
    2266. 

  2266.                 // make connnection
    2267. 

  2267.                 if (!$this->connect($timeout, $response_timeout)){
    2268. 

  2268.                     return false;
    2269. 

  2269.                 }
    2270. 

  2270.                 
    2271. 

  2271.                 // send request
    2272. 

  2272.                 if (!$this->sendRequest($data, $cookies)){
    2273. 

  2273.                     return false;
    2274. 

  2274.                 }
    2275. 

  2275.                 
    2276. 

  2276.                 // get response
    2277. 

  2277.                 $respdata = $this->getResponse();
    2278. 

  2278.             } else {
    2279. 

  2279.                 $this->setError('Too many tries to get an OK response');
    2280. 

  2280.             }
    2281. 

  2281.         }        
    2282. 

  2282.         $this->debug('end of send()');
    2283. 

  2283.         return $respdata;
    2284. 

  2284.     }
    2285. 

  2285.  
    2286. 

  2286.  
    2287. 

  2287.     /**
    2288. 

  2288.     * send the SOAP message via HTTPS 1.0 using CURL
    2289. 

  2289.     *
    2290. 

  2290.     * @param    string $msg message data
    2291. 

  2291.     * @param    integer $timeout set connection timeout in seconds
    2292. 

  2292.     * @param    integer $response_timeout set response timeout in seconds
    2293. 

  2293.     * @param    array $cookies cookies to send
    2294. 

  2294.     * @return    string data
    2295. 

  2295.     * @access   public
    2296. 

  2296.     */
    2297. 

  2297.     function sendHTTPS($data, $timeout=0, $response_timeout=30, $cookies) {
    2298. 

  2298.         return $this->send($data, $timeout, $response_timeout, $cookies);
    2299. 

  2299.     }
    2300. 

  2300.     
    2301. 

  2301.     /**
    2302. 

  2302.     * if authenticating, set user credentials here
    2303. 

  2303.     *
    2304. 

  2304.     * @param    string $username 
    2305. 

  2305.     * @param    string $password 
    2306. 

  2306.     * @param    string $authtype (basic, digest, certificate)
    2307. 

  2307.     * @param    array $digestRequest (keys must be nonce, nc, realm, qop)
    2308. 

  2308.     * @param    array $certRequest (keys must be cainfofile (optional), sslcertfile, sslkeyfile, passphrase, verifypeer (optional), verifyhost (optional): see corresponding options in cURL docs)
    2309. 

  2309.     * @access   public
    2310. 

  2310.     */
    2311. 

  2311.     function setCredentials($username, $password, $authtype = 'basic', $digestRequest = array(), $certRequest = array()) {
    2312. 

  2312.         $this->debug("Set credentials for authtype $authtype");
    2313. 

  2313.         // cf. RFC 2617
    2314. 

  2314.         if ($authtype == 'basic') {
    2315. 

  2315.             $this->outgoing_headers['Authorization'] = 'Basic '.base64_encode(str_replace(':','',$username).':'.$password);
    2316. 

  2316.         } elseif ($authtype == 'digest') {
    2317. 

  2317.             if (isset($digestRequest['nonce'])) {
    2318. 

  2318.                 $digestRequest['nc'] = isset($digestRequest['nc']) ? $digestRequest['nc']++ : 1;
    2319. 

  2319.                 
    2320. 

  2320.                 // calculate the Digest hashes (calculate code based on digest implementation found at: http://www.rassoc.com/gregr/weblog/stories/2002/07/09/webServicesSecurityHttpDigestAuthenticationWithoutActiveDirectory.html)
    2321. 

  2321.     
    2322. 

  2322.                 // A1 = unq(username-value) ":" unq(realm-value) ":" passwd
    2323. 

  2323.                 $A1 = $username. ':' . (isset($digestRequest['realm']) ? $digestRequest['realm'] : '') . ':' . $password;
    2324. 

  2324.     
    2325. 

  2325.                 // H(A1) = MD5(A1)
    2326. 

  2326.                 $HA1 = md5($A1);
    2327. 

  2327.     
    2328. 

  2328.                 // A2 = Method ":" digest-uri-value
    2329. 

  2329.                 $A2 = 'POST:' . $this->digest_uri;
    2330. 

  2330.     
    2331. 

  2331.                 // H(A2)
    2332. 

  2332.                 $HA2 =  md5($A2);
    2333. 

  2333.     
    2334. 

  2334.                 // KD(secret, data) = H(concat(secret, ":", data))
    2335. 

  2335.                 // if qop == auth:
    2336. 

  2336.                 // request-digest  = <"> < KD ( H(A1),     unq(nonce-value)
    2337. 

  2337.                 //                              ":" nc-value
    2338. 

  2338.                 //                              ":" unq(cnonce-value)
    2339. 

  2339.                 //                              ":" unq(qop-value)
    2340. 

  2340.                 //                              ":" H(A2)
    2341. 

  2341.                 //                            ) <">
    2342. 

  2342.                 // if qop is missing,
    2343. 

  2343.                 // request-digest  = <"> < KD ( H(A1), unq(nonce-value) ":" H(A2) ) > <">
    2344. 

  2344.     
    2345. 

  2345.                 $unhashedDigest = '';
    2346. 

  2346.                 $nonce = isset($digestRequest['nonce']) ? $digestRequest['nonce'] : '';
    2347. 

  2347.                 $cnonce = $nonce;
    2348. 

  2348.                 if ($digestRequest['qop'] != '') {
    2349. 

  2349.                     $unhashedDigest = $HA1 . ':' . $nonce . ':' . sprintf("%08d", $digestRequest['nc']) . ':' . $cnonce . ':' . $digestRequest['qop'] . ':' . $HA2;
    2350. 

  2350.                 } else {
    2351. 

  2351.                     $unhashedDigest = $HA1 . ':' . $nonce . ':' . $HA2;
    2352. 

  2352.                 }
    2353. 

  2353.     
    2354. 

  2354.                 $hashedDigest = md5($unhashedDigest);
    2355. 

  2355.     
    2356. 

  2356.                 $this->outgoing_headers['Authorization'] = 'Digest username="' . $username . '", realm="' . $digestRequest['realm'] . '", nonce="' . $nonce . '", uri="' . $this->digest_uri . '", cnonce="' . $cnonce . '", nc=' . sprintf("%08x", $digestRequest['nc']) . ', qop="' . $digestRequest['qop'] . '", response="' . $hashedDigest . '"';
    2357. 

  2357.             }
    2358. 

  2358.         } elseif ($authtype == 'certificate') {
    2359. 

  2359.             $this->certRequest = $certRequest;
    2360. 

  2360.         }
    2361. 

  2361.         $this->username = $username;
    2362. 

  2362.         $this->password = $password;
    2363. 

  2363.         $this->authtype = $authtype;
    2364. 

  2364.         $this->digestRequest = $digestRequest;
    2365. 

  2365.         
    2366. 

  2366.         if (isset($this->outgoing_headers['Authorization'])) {
    2367. 

  2367.             $this->debug('set Authorization: ' . substr($this->outgoing_headers['Authorization'], 0, 12) . '...');
    2368. 

  2368.         } else {
    2369. 

  2369.             $this->debug('Authorization header not set');
    2370. 

  2370.         }
    2371. 

  2371.     }
    2372. 

  2372.     
    2373. 

  2373.     /**
    2374. 

  2374.     * set the soapaction value
    2375. 

  2375.     *
    2376. 

  2376.     * @param    string $soapaction 
    2377. 

  2377.     * @access   public
    2378. 

  2378.     */
    2379. 

  2379.     function setSOAPAction($soapaction) {
    2380. 

  2380.         $this->outgoing_headers['SOAPAction'] = '"' . $soapaction . '"';
    2381. 

  2381.         $this->debug('set SOAPAction: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['SOAPAction']);
    2382. 

  2382.     }
    2383. 

  2383.     
    2384. 

  2384.     /**
    2385. 

  2385.     * use http encoding
    2386. 

  2386.     *
    2387. 

  2387.     * @param    string $enc encoding style. supported values: gzip, deflate, or both
    2388. 

  2388.     * @access   public
    2389. 

  2389.     */
    2390. 

  2390.     function setEncoding($enc='gzip, deflate') {
    2391. 

  2391.         if (function_exists('gzdeflate')) {
    2392. 

  2392.             $this->protocol_version = '1.1';
    2393. 

  2393.             $this->outgoing_headers['Accept-Encoding'] = $enc;
    2394. 

  2394.             $this->debug('set Accept-Encoding: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['Accept-Encoding']);
    2395. 

  2395.             if (!isset($this->outgoing_headers['Connection'])) {
    2396. 

  2396.                 $this->outgoing_headers['Connection'] = 'close';
    2397. 

  2397.                 $this->persistentConnection = false;
    2398. 

  2398.                 $this->debug('set Connection: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['Connection']);
    2399. 

  2399.             }
    2400. 

  2400.             set_magic_quotes_runtime(0);
    2401. 

  2401.             // deprecated
    2402. 

  2402.             $this->encoding = $enc;
    2403. 

  2403.         }
    2404. 

  2404.     }
    2405. 

  2405.     
    2406. 

  2406.     /**
    2407. 

  2407.     * set proxy info here
    2408. 

  2408.     *
    2409. 

  2409.     * @param    string $proxyhost 
    2410. 

  2410.     * @param    string $proxyport 
    2411. 

  2411.     * @param    string $proxyusername 
    2412. 

  2412.     * @param    string $proxypassword 
    2413. 

  2413.     * @access   public
    2414. 

  2414.     */
    2415. 

  2415.     function setProxy($proxyhost, $proxyport, $proxyusername = '', $proxypassword = '') {
    2416. 

  2416.         $this->uri = $this->url;
    2417. 

  2417.         $this->host = $proxyhost;
    2418. 

  2418.         $this->port = $proxyport;
    2419. 

  2419.         if ($proxyusername != '' && $proxypassword != '') {
    2420. 

  2420.             $this->outgoing_headers['Proxy-Authorization'] = ' Basic '.base64_encode($proxyusername.':'.$proxypassword);
    2421. 

  2421.             $this->debug('set Proxy-Authorization: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['Proxy-Authorization']);
    2422. 

  2422.         }
    2423. 

  2423.     }
    2424. 

  2424.     
    2425. 

  2425.     /**
    2426. 

  2426.     * decode a string that is encoded w/ "chunked' transfer encoding
    2427. 

  2427.      * as defined in RFC2068 19.4.6
    2428. 

  2428.     *
    2429. 

  2429.     * @param    string $buffer 
    2430. 

  2430.     * @param    string $lb 
    2431. 

  2431.     * @returns    string
    2432. 

  2432.     * @access   public
    2433. 

  2433.     * @deprecated
    2434. 

  2434.     */
    2435. 

  2435.     function decodeChunked($buffer, $lb){
    2436. 

  2436.         // length := 0
    2437. 

  2437.         $length = 0;
    2438. 

  2438.         $new = '';
    2439. 

  2439.         
    2440. 

  2440.         // read chunk-size, chunk-extension (if any) and CRLF
    2441. 

  2441.         // get the position of the linebreak
    2442. 

  2442.         $chunkend = strpos($buffer, $lb);
    2443. 

  2443.         if ($chunkend == FALSE) {
    2444. 

  2444.             $this->debug('no linebreak found in decodeChunked');
    2445. 

  2445.             return $new;
    2446. 

  2446.         }
    2447. 

  2447.         $temp = substr($buffer,0,$chunkend);
    2448. 

  2448.         $chunk_size = hexdec( trim($temp) );
    2449. 

  2449.         $chunkstart = $chunkend + strlen($lb);
    2450. 

  2450.         // while (chunk-size > 0) {
    2451. 

  2451.         while ($chunk_size > 0) {
    2452. 

  2452.             $this->debug("chunkstart: $chunkstart chunk_size: $chunk_size");
    2453. 

  2453.             $chunkend = strpos( $buffer, $lb, $chunkstart + $chunk_size);
    2454. 

  2454.               
    2455. 

  2455.             // Just in case we got a broken connection
    2456. 

  2456.               if ($chunkend == FALSE) {
    2457. 

  2457.                   $chunk = substr($buffer,$chunkstart);
    2458. 

  2458.                 // append chunk-data to entity-body
    2459. 

  2459.                 $new .= $chunk;
    2460. 

  2460.                   $length += strlen($chunk);
    2461. 

  2461.                   break;
    2462. 

  2462.             }
    2463. 

  2463.             
    2464. 

  2464.               // read chunk-data and CRLF
    2465. 

  2465.               $chunk = substr($buffer,$chunkstart,$chunkend-$chunkstart);
    2466. 

  2466.               // append chunk-data to entity-body
    2467. 

  2467.               $new .= $chunk;
    2468. 

  2468.               // length := length + chunk-size
    2469. 

  2469.               $length += strlen($chunk);
    2470. 

  2470.               // read chunk-size and CRLF
    2471. 

  2471.               $chunkstart = $chunkend + strlen($lb);
    2472. 

  2472.             
    2473. 

  2473.               $chunkend = strpos($buffer, $lb, $chunkstart) + strlen($lb);
    2474. 

  2474.             if ($chunkend == FALSE) {
    2475. 

  2475.                 break; //Just in case we got a broken connection
    2476. 

  2476.             }
    2477. 

  2477.             $temp = substr($buffer,$chunkstart,$chunkend-$chunkstart);
    2478. 

  2478.             $chunk_size = hexdec( trim($temp) );
    2479. 

  2479.             $chunkstart = $chunkend;
    2480. 

  2480.         }
    2481. 

  2481.         return $new;
    2482. 

  2482.     }
    2483. 

  2483.     
    2484. 

  2484.     /*
    2485. 

  2485.      *    Writes payload, including HTTP headers, to $this->outgoing_payload.
    2486. 

  2486.      */
    2487. 

  2487.     function buildPayload($data, $cookie_str = '') {
    2488. 

  2488.         // add content-length header
    2489. 

  2489.         $this->outgoing_headers['Content-Length'] = strlen($data);
    2490. 

  2490.         $this->debug('set Content-Length: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['Content-Length']);
    2491. 

  2491.  
    2492. 

  2492.         // start building outgoing payload:
    2493. 

  2493.         $req = "$this->request_method $this->uri HTTP/$this->protocol_version";
    2494. 

  2494.         $this->debug("HTTP request: $req");
    2495. 

  2495.         $this->outgoing_payload = "$req\r\n";
    2496. 

  2496.  
    2497. 

  2497.         // loop thru headers, serializing
    2498. 

  2498.         foreach($this->outgoing_headers as $k => $v){
    2499. 

  2499.             $hdr = $k.': '.$v;
    2500. 

  2500.             $this->debug("HTTP header: $hdr");
    2501. 

  2501.             $this->outgoing_payload .= "$hdr\r\n";
    2502. 

  2502.         }
    2503. 

  2503.  
    2504. 

  2504.         // add any cookies
    2505. 

  2505.         if ($cookie_str != '') {
    2506. 

  2506.             $hdr = 'Cookie: '.$cookie_str;
    2507. 

  2507.             $this->debug("HTTP header: $hdr");
    2508. 

  2508.             $this->outgoing_payload .= "$hdr\r\n";
    2509. 

  2509.         }
    2510. 

  2510.  
    2511. 

  2511.         // header/body separator
    2512. 

  2512.         $this->outgoing_payload .= "\r\n";
    2513. 

  2513.         
    2514. 

  2514.         // add data
    2515. 

  2515.         $this->outgoing_payload .= $data;
    2516. 

  2516.     }
    2517. 

  2517.  
    2518. 

  2518.     function sendRequest($data, $cookies = NULL) {
    2519. 

  2519.         // build cookie string
    2520. 

  2520.         $cookie_str = $this->getCookiesForRequest($cookies, (($this->scheme == 'ssl') || ($this->scheme == 'https')));
    2521. 

  2521.  
    2522. 

  2522.         // build payload
    2523. 

  2523.         $this->buildPayload($data, $cookie_str);
    2524. 

  2524.  
    2525. 

  2525.       if ($this->scheme == 'http' || $this->scheme == 'ssl') {
    2526. 

  2526.         // send payload
    2527. 

  2527.         if(!fputs($this->fp, $this->outgoing_payload, strlen($this->outgoing_payload))) {
    2528. 

  2528.             $this->setError('couldn\'t write message data to socket');
    2529. 

  2529.             $this->debug('couldn\'t write message data to socket');
    2530. 

  2530.             return false;
    2531. 

  2531.         }
    2532. 

  2532.         $this->debug('wrote data to socket, length = ' . strlen($this->outgoing_payload));
    2533. 

  2533.         return true;
    2534. 

  2534.       } else if ($this->scheme == 'https') {
    2535. 

  2535.         // set payload
    2536. 

  2536.         // TODO: cURL does say this should only be the verb, and in fact it
    2537. 

  2537.         // turns out that the URI and HTTP version are appended to this, which
    2538. 

  2538.         // some servers refuse to work with
    2539. 

  2539.         //curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, $this->outgoing_payload);
    2540. 

  2540.         foreach($this->outgoing_headers as $k => $v){
    2541. 

  2541.             $curl_headers[] = "$k: $v";
    2542. 

  2542.         }
    2543. 

  2543.         if ($cookie_str != '') {
    2544. 

  2544.             $curl_headers[] = 'Cookie: ' . $cookie_str;
    2545. 

  2545.         }
    2546. 

  2546.         curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $curl_headers);
    2547. 

  2547.         if ($this->request_method == "POST") {
    2548. 

  2548.               curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
    2549. 

  2549.               curl_setopt($this->ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
    2550. 

  2550.           } else {
    2551. 

  2551.           }
    2552. 

  2552.         $this->debug('set cURL payload');
    2553. 

  2553.         return true;
    2554. 

  2554.       }
    2555. 

  2555.     }
    2556. 

  2556.  
    2557. 

  2557.     function getResponse(){
    2558. 

  2558.         $this->incoming_payload = '';
    2559. 

  2559.         
    2560. 

  2560.       if ($this->scheme == 'http' || $this->scheme == 'ssl') {
    2561. 

  2561.         // loop until headers have been retrieved
    2562. 

  2562.         $data = '';
    2563. 

  2563.         while (!isset($lb)){
    2564. 

  2564.  
    2565. 

  2565.             // We might EOF during header read.
    2566. 

  2566.             if(feof($this->fp)) {
    2567. 

  2567.                 $this->incoming_payload = $data;
    2568. 

  2568.                 $this->debug('found no headers before EOF after length ' . strlen($data));
    2569. 

  2569.                 $this->debug("received before EOF:\n" . $data);
    2570. 

  2570.                 $this->setError('server failed to send headers');
    2571. 

  2571.                 return false;
    2572. 

  2572.             }
    2573. 

  2573.  
    2574. 

  2574.             $tmp = fgets($this->fp, 256);
    2575. 

  2575.             $tmplen = strlen($tmp);
    2576. 

  2576.             $this->debug("read line of $tmplen bytes: " . trim($tmp));
    2577. 

  2577.  
    2578. 

  2578.             if ($tmplen == 0) {
    2579. 

  2579.                 $this->incoming_payload = $data;
    2580. 

  2580.                 $this->debug('socket read of headers timed out after length ' . strlen($data));
    2581. 

  2581.                 $this->debug("read before timeout: " . $data);
    2582. 

  2582.                 $this->setError('socket read of headers timed out');
    2583. 

  2583.                 return false;
    2584. 

  2584.             }
    2585. 

  2585.  
    2586. 

  2586.             $data .= $tmp;
    2587. 

  2587.             $pos = strpos($data,"\r\n\r\n");
    2588. 

  2588.             if($pos > 1){
    2589. 

  2589.                 $lb = "\r\n";
    2590. 

  2590.             } else {
    2591. 

  2591.                 $pos = strpos($data,"\n\n");
    2592. 

  2592.                 if($pos > 1){
    2593. 

  2593.                     $lb = "\n";
    2594. 

  2594.                 }
    2595. 

  2595.             }
    2596. 

  2596.             // remove 100 header
    2597. 

  2597.             if(isset($lb) && ereg('^HTTP/1.1 100',$data)){
    2598. 

  2598.                 unset($lb);
    2599. 

  2599.                 $data = '';
    2600. 

  2600.             }//
    2601. 

  2601.         }
    2602. 

  2602.         // store header data
    2603. 

  2603.         $this->incoming_payload .= $data;
    2604. 

  2604.         $this->debug('found end of headers after length ' . strlen($data));
    2605. 

  2605.         // process headers
    2606. 

  2606.         $header_data = trim(substr($data,0,$pos));
    2607. 

  2607.         $header_array = explode($lb,$header_data);
    2608. 

  2608.         $this->incoming_headers = array();
    2609. 

  2609.         $this->incoming_cookies = array();
    2610. 

  2610.         foreach($header_array as $header_line){
    2611. 

  2611.             $arr = explode(':',$header_line, 2);
    2612. 

  2612.             if(count($arr) > 1){
    2613. 

  2613.                 $header_name = strtolower(trim($arr[0]));
    2614. 

  2614.                 $this->incoming_headers[$header_name] = trim($arr[1]);
    2615. 

  2615.                 if ($header_name == 'set-cookie') {
    2616. 

  2616.                     // TODO: allow multiple cookies from parseCookie
    2617. 

  2617.                     $cookie = $this->parseCookie(trim($arr[1]));
    2618. 

  2618.                     if ($cookie) {
    2619. 

  2619.                         $this->incoming_cookies[] = $cookie;
    2620. 

  2620.                         $this->debug('found cookie: ' . $cookie['name'] . ' = ' . $cookie['value']);
    2621. 

  2621.                     } else {
    2622. 

  2622.                         $this->debug('did not find cookie in ' . trim($arr[1]));
    2623. 

  2623.                     }
    2624. 

  2624.                 }
    2625. 

  2625.             } else if (isset($header_name)) {
    2626. 

  2626.                 // append continuation line to previous header
    2627. 

  2627.                 $this->incoming_headers[$header_name] .= $lb . ' ' . $header_line;
    2628. 

  2628.             }
    2629. 

  2629.         }
    2630. 

  2630.         
    2631. 

  2631.         // loop until msg has been received
    2632. 

  2632.         if (isset($this->incoming_headers['transfer-encoding']) && strtolower($this->incoming_headers['transfer-encoding']) == 'chunked') {
    2633. 

  2633.             $content_length =  2147483647;    // ignore any content-length header
    2634. 

  2634.             $chunked = true;
    2635. 

  2635.             $this->debug("want to read chunked content");
    2636. 

  2636.         } elseif (isset($this->incoming_headers['content-length'])) {
    2637. 

  2637.             $content_length = $this->incoming_headers['content-length'];
    2638. 

  2638.             $chunked = false;
    2639. 

  2639.             $this->debug("want to read content of length $content_length");
    2640. 

  2640.         } else {
    2641. 

  2641.             $content_length =  2147483647;
    2642. 

  2642.             $chunked = false;
    2643. 

  2643.             $this->debug("want to read content to EOF");
    2644. 

  2644.         }
    2645. 

  2645.         $data = '';
    2646. 

  2646.         do {
    2647. 

  2647.             if ($chunked) {
    2648. 

  2648.                 $tmp = fgets($this->fp, 256);
    2649. 

  2649.                 $tmplen = strlen($tmp);
    2650. 

  2650.                 $this->debug("read chunk line of $tmplen bytes");
    2651. 

  2651.                 if ($tmplen == 0) {
    2652. 

  2652.                     $this->incoming_payload = $data;
    2653. 

  2653.                     $this->debug('socket read of chunk length timed out after length ' . strlen($data));
    2654. 

  2654.                     $this->debug("read before timeout:\n" . $data);
    2655. 

  2655.                     $this->setError('socket read of chunk length timed out');
    2656. 

  2656.                     return false;
    2657. 

  2657.                 }
    2658. 

  2658.                 $content_length = hexdec(trim($tmp));
    2659. 

  2659.                 $this->debug("chunk length $content_length");
    2660. 

  2660.             }
    2661. 

  2661.             $strlen = 0;
    2662. 

  2662.             while (($strlen < $content_length) && (!feof($this->fp))) {
    2663. 

  2663.                 $readlen = min(8192, $content_length - $strlen);
    2664. 

  2664.                 $tmp = fread($this->fp, $readlen);
    2665. 

  2665.                 $tmplen = strlen($tmp);
    2666. 

  2666.                 $this->debug("read buffer of $tmplen bytes");
    2667. 

  2667.                 if (($tmplen == 0) && (!feof($this->fp))) {
    2668. 

  2668.                     $this->incoming_payload = $data;
    2669. 

  2669.                     $this->debug('socket read of body timed out after length ' . strlen($data));
    2670. 

  2670.                     $this->debug("read before timeout:\n" . $data);
    2671. 

  2671.                     $this->setError('socket read of body timed out');
    2672. 

  2672.                     return false;
    2673. 

  2673.                 }
    2674. 

  2674.                 $strlen += $tmplen;
    2675. 

  2675.                 $data .= $tmp;
    2676. 

  2676.             }
    2677. 

  2677.             if ($chunked && ($content_length > 0)) {
    2678. 

  2678.                 $tmp = fgets($this->fp, 256);
    2679. 

  2679.                 $tmplen = strlen($tmp);
    2680. 

  2680.                 $this->debug("read chunk terminator of $tmplen bytes");
    2681. 

  2681.                 if ($tmplen == 0) {
    2682. 

  2682.                     $this->incoming_payload = $data;
    2683. 

  2683.                     $this->debug('socket read of chunk terminator timed out after length ' . strlen($data));
    2684. 

  2684.                     $this->debug("read before timeout:\n" . $data);
    2685. 

  2685.                     $this->setError('socket read of chunk terminator timed out');
    2686. 

  2686.                     return false;
    2687. 

  2687.                 }
    2688. 

  2688.             }
    2689. 

  2689.         } while ($chunked && ($content_length > 0) && (!feof($this->fp)));
    2690. 

  2690.         if (feof($this->fp)) {
    2691. 

  2691.             $this->debug('read to EOF');
    2692. 

  2692.         }
    2693. 

  2693.         $this->debug('read body of length ' . strlen($data));
    2694. 

  2694.         $this->incoming_payload .= $data;
    2695. 

  2695.         $this->debug('received a total of '.strlen($this->incoming_payload).' bytes of data from server');
    2696. 

  2696.         
    2697. 

  2697.         // close filepointer
    2698. 

  2698.         if(
    2699. 

  2699.             (isset($this->incoming_headers['connection']) && strtolower($this->incoming_headers['connection']) == 'close') || 
    2700. 

  2700.             (! $this->persistentConnection) || feof($this->fp)){
    2701. 

  2701.             fclose($this->fp);
    2702. 

  2702.             $this->fp = false;
    2703. 

  2703.             $this->debug('closed socket');
    2704. 

  2704.         }
    2705. 

  2705.         
    2706. 

  2706.         // connection was closed unexpectedly
    2707. 

  2707.         if($this->incoming_payload == ''){
    2708. 

  2708.             $this->setError('no response from server');
    2709. 

  2709.             return false;
    2710. 

  2710.         }
    2711. 

  2711.         
    2712. 

  2712.         // decode transfer-encoding
    2713. 

  2713. //        if(isset($this->incoming_headers['transfer-encoding']) && strtolower($this->incoming_headers['transfer-encoding']) == 'chunked'){
    2714. 

  2714. //            if(!$data = $this->decodeChunked($data, $lb)){
    2715. 

  2715. //                $this->setError('Decoding of chunked data failed');
    2716. 

  2716. //                return false;
    2717. 

  2717. //            }
    2718. 

  2718.             //print "<pre>\nde-chunked:\n---------------\n$data\n\n---------------\n</pre>";
    2719. 

  2719.             // set decoded payload
    2720. 

  2720. //            $this->incoming_payload = $header_data.$lb.$lb.$data;
    2721. 

  2721. //        }
    2722. 

  2722.     
    2723. 

  2723.       } else if ($this->scheme == 'https') {
    2724. 

  2724.         // send and receive
    2725. 

  2725.         $this->debug('send and receive with cURL');
    2726. 

  2726.         $this->incoming_payload = curl_exec($this->ch);
    2727. 

  2727.         $data = $this->incoming_payload;
    2728. 

  2728.  
    2729. 

  2729.         $cErr = curl_error($this->ch);
    2730. 

  2730.         if ($cErr != '') {
    2731. 

  2731.             $err = 'cURL ERROR: '.curl_errno($this->ch).': '.$cErr.'<br>';
    2732. 

  2732.             // TODO: there is a PHP bug that can cause this to SEGV for CURLINFO_CONTENT_TYPE
    2733. 

  2733.             foreach(curl_getinfo($this->ch) as $k => $v){
    2734. 

  2734.                 $err .= "$k: $v<br>";
    2735. 

  2735.             }
    2736. 

  2736.             $this->debug($err);
    2737. 

  2737.             $this->setError($err);
    2738. 

  2738.             curl_close($this->ch);
    2739. 

  2739.             return false;
    2740. 

  2740.         } else {
    2741. 

  2741.             //echo '<pre>';
    2742. 

  2742.             //var_dump(curl_getinfo($this->ch));
    2743. 

  2743.             //echo '</pre>';
    2744. 

  2744.         }
    2745. 

  2745.         // close curl
    2746. 

  2746.         $this->debug('No cURL error, closing cURL');
    2747. 

  2747.         curl_close($this->ch);
    2748. 

  2748.         
    2749. 

  2749.         // remove 100 header(s)
    2750. 

  2750.         while (ereg('^HTTP/1.1 100',$data)) {
    2751. 

  2751.             if ($pos = strpos($data,"\r\n\r\n")) {
    2752. 

  2752.                 $data = ltrim(substr($data,$pos));
    2753. 

  2753.             } elseif($pos = strpos($data,"\n\n") ) {
    2754. 

  2754.                 $data = ltrim(substr($data,$pos));
    2755. 

  2755.             }
    2756. 

  2756.         }
    2757. 

  2757.         
    2758. 

  2758.         // separate content from HTTP headers
    2759. 

  2759.         if ($pos = strpos($data,"\r\n\r\n")) {
    2760. 

  2760.             $lb = "\r\n";
    2761. 

  2761.         } elseif( $pos = strpos($data,"\n\n")) {
    2762. 

  2762.             $lb = "\n";
    2763. 

  2763.         } else {
    2764. 

  2764.             $this->debug('no proper separation of headers and document');
    2765.
