  2765.             $this->setError('no proper separation of headers and document');
    2766. 

  2766.             return false;
    2767. 

  2767.         }
    2768. 

  2768.         $header_data = trim(substr($data,0,$pos));
    2769. 

  2769.         $header_array = explode($lb,$header_data);
    2770. 

  2770.         $data = ltrim(substr($data,$pos));
    2771. 

  2771.         $this->debug('found proper separation of headers and document');
    2772. 

  2772.         $this->debug('cleaned data, stringlen: '.strlen($data));
    2773. 

  2773.         // clean headers
    2774. 

  2774.         foreach ($header_array as $header_line) {
    2775. 

  2775.             $arr = explode(':',$header_line,2);
    2776. 

  2776.             if(count($arr) > 1){
    2777. 

  2777.                 $header_name = strtolower(trim($arr[0]));
    2778. 

  2778.                 $this->incoming_headers[$header_name] = trim($arr[1]);
    2779. 

  2779.                 if ($header_name == 'set-cookie') {
    2780. 

  2780.                     // TODO: allow multiple cookies from parseCookie
    2781. 

  2781.                     $cookie = $this->parseCookie(trim($arr[1]));
    2782. 

  2782.                     if ($cookie) {
    2783. 

  2783.                         $this->incoming_cookies[] = $cookie;
    2784. 

  2784.                         $this->debug('found cookie: ' . $cookie['name'] . ' = ' . $cookie['value']);
    2785. 

  2785.                     } else {
    2786. 

  2786.                         $this->debug('did not find cookie in ' . trim($arr[1]));
    2787. 

  2787.                     }
    2788. 

  2788.                 }
    2789. 

  2789.             } else if (isset($header_name)) {
    2790. 

  2790.                 // append continuation line to previous header
    2791. 

  2791.                 $this->incoming_headers[$header_name] .= $lb . ' ' . $header_line;
    2792. 

  2792.             }
    2793. 

  2793.         }
    2794. 

  2794.       }
    2795. 

  2795.  
    2796. 

  2796.         $arr = explode(' ', $header_array[0], 3);
    2797. 

  2797.         $http_version = $arr[0];
    2798. 

  2798.         $http_status = intval($arr[1]);
    2799. 

  2799.         $http_reason = count($arr) > 2 ? $arr[2] : '';
    2800. 

  2800.  
    2801. 

  2801.          // see if we need to resend the request with http digest authentication
    2802. 

  2802.          if (isset($this->incoming_headers['location']) && $http_status == 301) {
    2803. 

  2803.              $this->debug("Got 301 $http_reason with Location: " . $this->incoming_headers['location']);
    2804. 

  2804.              $this->setURL($this->incoming_headers['location']);
    2805. 

  2805.             $this->tryagain = true;
    2806. 

  2806.             return false;
    2807. 

  2807.         }
    2808. 

  2808.  
    2809. 

  2809.          // see if we need to resend the request with http digest authentication
    2810. 

  2810.          if (isset($this->incoming_headers['www-authenticate']) && $http_status == 401) {
    2811. 

  2811.              $this->debug("Got 401 $http_reason with WWW-Authenticate: " . $this->incoming_headers['www-authenticate']);
    2812. 

  2812.              if (strstr($this->incoming_headers['www-authenticate'], "Digest ")) {
    2813. 

  2813.                  $this->debug('Server wants digest authentication');
    2814. 

  2814.                  // remove "Digest " from our elements
    2815. 

  2815.                  $digestString = str_replace('Digest ', '', $this->incoming_headers['www-authenticate']);
    2816. 

  2816.                  
    2817. 

  2817.                  // parse elements into array
    2818. 

  2818.                  $digestElements = explode(',', $digestString);
    2819. 

  2819.                  foreach ($digestElements as $val) {
    2820. 

  2820.                      $tempElement = explode('=', trim($val), 2);
    2821. 

  2821.                      $digestRequest[$tempElement[0]] = str_replace("\"", '', $tempElement[1]);
    2822. 

  2822.                  }
    2823. 

  2823.  
    2824. 

  2824.                 // should have (at least) qop, realm, nonce
    2825. 

  2825.                  if (isset($digestRequest['nonce'])) {
    2826. 

  2826.                      $this->setCredentials($this->username, $this->password, 'digest', $digestRequest);
    2827. 

  2827.                      $this->tryagain = true;
    2828. 

  2828.                      return false;
    2829. 

  2829.                  }
    2830. 

  2830.              }
    2831. 

  2831.             $this->debug('HTTP authentication failed');
    2832. 

  2832.             $this->setError('HTTP authentication failed');
    2833. 

  2833.             return false;
    2834. 

  2834.          }
    2835. 

  2835.         
    2836. 

  2836.         if (
    2837. 

  2837.             ($http_status >= 300 && $http_status <= 307) ||
    2838. 

  2838.             ($http_status >= 400 && $http_status <= 417) ||
    2839. 

  2839.             ($http_status >= 501 && $http_status <= 505)
    2840. 

  2840.            ) {
    2841. 

  2841.             $this->setError("Unsupported HTTP response status $http_status $http_reason (soapclient->response has contents of the response)");
    2842. 

  2842.             return false;
    2843. 

  2843.         }
    2844. 

  2844.  
    2845. 

  2845.         // decode content-encoding
    2846. 

  2846.         if(isset($this->incoming_headers['content-encoding']) && $this->incoming_headers['content-encoding'] != ''){
    2847. 

  2847.             if(strtolower($this->incoming_headers['content-encoding']) == 'deflate' || strtolower($this->incoming_headers['content-encoding']) == 'gzip'){
    2848. 

  2848.                 // if decoding works, use it. else assume data wasn't gzencoded
    2849. 

  2849.                 if(function_exists('gzinflate')){
    2850. 

  2850.                     //$timer->setMarker('starting decoding of gzip/deflated content');
    2851. 

  2851.                     // IIS 5 requires gzinflate instead of gzuncompress (similar to IE 5 and gzdeflate v. gzcompress)
    2852. 

  2852.                     // this means there are no Zlib headers, although there should be
    2853. 

  2853.                     $this->debug('The gzinflate function exists');
    2854. 

  2854.                     $datalen = strlen($data);
    2855. 

  2855.                     if ($this->incoming_headers['content-encoding'] == 'deflate') {
    2856. 

  2856.                         if ($degzdata = @gzinflate($data)) {
    2857. 

  2857.                             $data = $degzdata;
    2858. 

  2858.                             $this->debug('The payload has been inflated to ' . strlen($data) . ' bytes');
    2859. 

  2859.                             if (strlen($data) < $datalen) {
    2860. 

  2860.                                 // test for the case that the payload has been compressed twice
    2861. 

  2861.                                 $this->debug('The inflated payload is smaller than the gzipped one; try again');
    2862. 

  2862.                                 if ($degzdata = @gzinflate($data)) {
    2863. 

  2863.                                     $data = $degzdata;
    2864. 

  2864.                                     $this->debug('The payload has been inflated again to ' . strlen($data) . ' bytes');
    2865. 

  2865.                                 }
    2866. 

  2866.                             }
    2867. 

  2867.                         } else {
    2868. 

  2868.                             $this->debug('Error using gzinflate to inflate the payload');
    2869. 

  2869.                             $this->setError('Error using gzinflate to inflate the payload');
    2870. 

  2870.                         }
    2871. 

  2871.                     } elseif ($this->incoming_headers['content-encoding'] == 'gzip') {
    2872. 

  2872.                         if ($degzdata = @gzinflate(substr($data, 10))) {    // do our best
    2873. 

  2873.                             $data = $degzdata;
    2874. 

  2874.                             $this->debug('The payload has been un-gzipped to ' . strlen($data) . ' bytes');
    2875. 

  2875.                             if (strlen($data) < $datalen) {
    2876. 

  2876.                                 // test for the case that the payload has been compressed twice
    2877. 

  2877.                                 $this->debug('The un-gzipped payload is smaller than the gzipped one; try again');
    2878. 

  2878.                                 if ($degzdata = @gzinflate(substr($data, 10))) {
    2879. 

  2879.                                     $data = $degzdata;
    2880. 

  2880.                                     $this->debug('The payload has been un-gzipped again to ' . strlen($data) . ' bytes');
    2881. 

  2881.                                 }
    2882. 

  2882.                             }
    2883. 

  2883.                         } else {
    2884. 

  2884.                             $this->debug('Error using gzinflate to un-gzip the payload');
    2885. 

  2885.                             $this->setError('Error using gzinflate to un-gzip the payload');
    2886. 

  2886.                         }
    2887. 

  2887.                     }
    2888. 

  2888.                     //$timer->setMarker('finished decoding of gzip/deflated content');
    2889. 

  2889.                     //print "<xmp>\nde-inflated:\n---------------\n$data\n-------------\n</xmp>";
    2890. 

  2890.                     // set decoded payload
    2891. 

  2891.                     $this->incoming_payload = $header_data.$lb.$lb.$data;
    2892. 

  2892.                 } else {
    2893. 

  2893.                     $this->debug('The server sent compressed data. Your php install must have the Zlib extension compiled in to support this.');
    2894. 

  2894.                     $this->setError('The server sent compressed data. Your php install must have the Zlib extension compiled in to support this.');
    2895. 

  2895.                 }
    2896. 

  2896.             } else {
    2897. 

  2897.                 $this->debug('Unsupported Content-Encoding ' . $this->incoming_headers['content-encoding']);
    2898. 

  2898.                 $this->setError('Unsupported Content-Encoding ' . $this->incoming_headers['content-encoding']);
    2899. 

  2899.             }
    2900. 

  2900.         } else {
    2901. 

  2901.             $this->debug('No Content-Encoding header');
    2902. 

  2902.         }
    2903. 

  2903.         
    2904. 

  2904.         if(strlen($data) == 0){
    2905. 

  2905.             $this->debug('no data after headers!');
    2906. 

  2906.             $this->setError('no data present after HTTP headers');
    2907. 

  2907.             return false;
    2908. 

  2908.         }
    2909. 

  2909.         
    2910. 

  2910.         return $data;
    2911. 

  2911.     }
    2912. 

  2912.  
    2913. 

  2913.     function setContentType($type, $charset = false) {
    2914. 

  2914.         $this->outgoing_headers['Content-Type'] = $type . ($charset ? '; charset=' . $charset : '');
    2915. 

  2915.         $this->debug('set Content-Type: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['Content-Type']);
    2916. 

  2916.     }
    2917. 

  2917.  
    2918. 

  2918.     function usePersistentConnection(){
    2919. 

  2919.         if (isset($this->outgoing_headers['Accept-Encoding'])) {
    2920. 

  2920.             return false;
    2921. 

  2921.         }
    2922. 

  2922.         $this->protocol_version = '1.1';
    2923. 

  2923.         $this->persistentConnection = true;
    2924. 

  2924.         $this->outgoing_headers['Connection'] = 'Keep-Alive';
    2925. 

  2925.         $this->debug('set Connection: ' . $this->outgoing_headers['Connection']);
    2926. 

  2926.         return true;
    2927. 

  2927.     }
    2928. 

  2928.  
    2929. 

  2929.     /**
    2930. 

  2930.      * parse an incoming Cookie into it's parts
    2931. 

  2931.      *
    2932. 

  2932.      * @param    string $cookie_str content of cookie
    2933. 

  2933.      * @return    array with data of that cookie
    2934. 

  2934.      * @access    private
    2935. 

  2935.      */
    2936. 

  2936.     /*
    2937. 

  2937.      * TODO: allow a Set-Cookie string to be parsed into multiple cookies
    2938. 

  2938.      */
    2939. 

  2939.     function parseCookie($cookie_str) {
    2940. 

  2940.         $cookie_str = str_replace('; ', ';', $cookie_str) . ';';
    2941. 

  2941.         $data = split(';', $cookie_str);
    2942. 

  2942.         $value_str = $data[0];
    2943. 

  2943.  
    2944. 

  2944.         $cookie_param = 'domain=';
    2945. 

  2945.         $start = strpos($cookie_str, $cookie_param);
    2946. 

  2946.         if ($start > 0) {
    2947. 

  2947.             $domain = substr($cookie_str, $start + strlen($cookie_param));
    2948. 

  2948.             $domain = substr($domain, 0, strpos($domain, ';'));
    2949. 

  2949.         } else {
    2950. 

  2950.             $domain = '';
    2951. 

  2951.         }
    2952. 

  2952.  
    2953. 

  2953.         $cookie_param = 'expires=';
    2954. 

  2954.         $start = strpos($cookie_str, $cookie_param);
    2955. 

  2955.         if ($start > 0) {
    2956. 

  2956.             $expires = substr($cookie_str, $start + strlen($cookie_param));
    2957. 

  2957.             $expires = substr($expires, 0, strpos($expires, ';'));
    2958. 

  2958.         } else {
    2959. 

  2959.             $expires = '';
    2960. 

  2960.         }
    2961. 

  2961.  
    2962. 

  2962.         $cookie_param = 'path=';
    2963. 

  2963.         $start = strpos($cookie_str, $cookie_param);
    2964. 

  2964.         if ( $start > 0 ) {
    2965. 

  2965.             $path = substr($cookie_str, $start + strlen($cookie_param));
    2966. 

  2966.             $path = substr($path, 0, strpos($path, ';'));
    2967. 

  2967.         } else {
    2968. 

  2968.             $path = '/';
    2969. 

  2969.         }
    2970. 

  2970.                         
    2971. 

  2971.         $cookie_param = ';secure;';
    2972. 

  2972.         if (strpos($cookie_str, $cookie_param) !== FALSE) {
    2973. 

  2973.             $secure = true;
    2974. 

  2974.         } else {
    2975. 

  2975.             $secure = false;
    2976. 

  2976.         }
    2977. 

  2977.  
    2978. 

  2978.         $sep_pos = strpos($value_str, '=');
    2979. 

  2979.  
    2980. 

  2980.         if ($sep_pos) {
    2981. 

  2981.             $name = substr($value_str, 0, $sep_pos);
    2982. 

  2982.             $value = substr($value_str, $sep_pos + 1);
    2983. 

  2983.             $cookie= array(    'name' => $name,
    2984. 

  2984.                             'value' => $value,
    2985. 

  2985.                             'domain' => $domain,
    2986. 

  2986.                             'path' => $path,
    2987. 

  2987.                             'expires' => $expires,
    2988. 

  2988.                             'secure' => $secure
    2989. 

  2989.                             );        
    2990. 

  2990.             return $cookie;
    2991. 

  2991.         }
    2992. 

  2992.         return false;
    2993. 

  2993.     }
    2994. 

  2994.   
    2995. 

  2995.     /**
    2996. 

  2996.      * sort out cookies for the current request
    2997. 

  2997.      *
    2998. 

  2998.      * @param    array $cookies array with all cookies
    2999. 

  2999.      * @param    boolean $secure is the send-content secure or not?
    3000. 

  3000.      * @return    string for Cookie-HTTP-Header
    3001. 

  3001.      * @access    private
    3002. 

  3002.      */
    3003. 

  3003.     function getCookiesForRequest($cookies, $secure=false) {
    3004. 

  3004.         $cookie_str = '';
    3005. 

  3005.         if ((! is_null($cookies)) && (is_array($cookies))) {
    3006. 

  3006.             foreach ($cookies as $cookie) {
    3007. 

  3007.                 if (! is_array($cookie)) {
    3008. 

  3008.                     continue;
    3009. 

  3009.                 }
    3010. 

  3010.                 $this->debug("check cookie for validity: ".$cookie['name'].'='.$cookie['value']);
    3011. 

  3011.                 if ((isset($cookie['expires'])) && (! empty($cookie['expires']))) {
    3012. 

  3012.                     if (strtotime($cookie['expires']) <= time()) {
    3013. 

  3013.                         $this->debug('cookie has expired');
    3014. 

  3014.                         continue;
    3015. 

  3015.                     }
    3016. 

  3016.                 }
    3017. 

  3017.                 if ((isset($cookie['domain'])) && (! empty($cookie['domain']))) {
    3018. 

  3018.                     $domain = preg_quote($cookie['domain']);
    3019. 

  3019.                     if (! preg_match("'.*$domain$'i", $this->host)) {
    3020. 

  3020.                         $this->debug('cookie has different domain');
    3021. 

  3021.                         continue;
    3022. 

  3022.                     }
    3023. 

  3023.                 }
    3024. 

  3024.                 if ((isset($cookie['path'])) && (! empty($cookie['path']))) {
    3025. 

  3025.                     $path = preg_quote($cookie['path']);
    3026. 

  3026.                     if (! preg_match("'^$path.*'i", $this->path)) {
    3027. 

  3027.                         $this->debug('cookie is for a different path');
    3028. 

  3028.                         continue;
    3029. 

  3029.                     }
    3030. 

  3030.                 }
    3031. 

  3031.                 if ((! $secure) && (isset($cookie['secure'])) && ($cookie['secure'])) {
    3032. 

  3032.                     $this->debug('cookie is secure, transport is not');
    3033. 

  3033.                     continue;
    3034. 

  3034.                 }
    3035. 

  3035.                 $cookie_str .= $cookie['name'] . '=' . $cookie['value'] . '; ';
    3036. 

  3036.                 $this->debug('add cookie to Cookie-String: ' . $cookie['name'] . '=' . $cookie['value']);
    3037. 

  3037.             }
    3038. 

  3038.         }
    3039. 

  3039.         return $cookie_str;
    3040. 

  3040.   }
    3041. 

  3041. }
    3042. 

  3042.  
    3043. 

  3043. ?><?php
    3044. 

  3044.  
    3045. 

  3045.  
    3046. 

  3046.  
    3047. 

  3047. /**
    3048. 

  3048. *
    3049. 

  3049. * soap_server allows the user to create a SOAP server
    3050. 

  3050. * that is capable of receiving messages and returning responses
    3051. 

  3051. *
    3052. 

  3052. * NOTE: WSDL functionality is experimental
    3053. 

  3053. *
    3054. 

  3054. * @author   Dietrich Ayala <dietrich@ganx4.com>
    3055. 

  3055. * @version  $Id: nusoap.php,v 1.94 2005/08/04 01:27:42 snichol Exp $
    3056. 

  3056. * @access   public
    3057. 

  3057. */
    3058. 

  3058. class soap_server extends nusoap_base {
    3059. 

  3059.     /**
    3060. 

  3060.      * HTTP headers of request
    3061. 

  3061.      * @var array 
    3062. 

  3062.      * @access private
    3063. 

  3063.      */
    3064. 

  3064.     var $headers = array();
    3065. 

  3065.     /**
    3066. 

  3066.      * HTTP request
    3067. 

  3067.      * @var string 
    3068. 

  3068.      * @access private
    3069. 

  3069.      */
    3070. 

  3070.     var $request = '';
    3071. 

  3071.     /**
    3072. 

  3072.      * SOAP headers from request (incomplete namespace resolution; special characters not escaped) (text)
    3073. 

  3073.      * @var string 
    3074. 

  3074.      * @access public
    3075. 

  3075.      */
    3076. 

  3076.     var $requestHeaders = '';
    3077. 

  3077.     /**
    3078. 

  3078.      * SOAP body request portion (incomplete namespace resolution; special characters not escaped) (text)
    3079. 

  3079.      * @var string 
    3080. 

  3080.      * @access public
    3081. 

  3081.      */
    3082. 

  3082.     var $document = '';
    3083. 

  3083.     /**
    3084. 

  3084.      * SOAP payload for request (text)
    3085. 

  3085.      * @var string 
    3086. 

  3086.      * @access public
    3087. 

  3087.      */
    3088. 

  3088.     var $requestSOAP = '';
    3089. 

  3089.     /**
    3090. 

  3090.      * requested method namespace URI
    3091. 

  3091.      * @var string 
    3092. 

  3092.      * @access private
    3093. 

  3093.      */
    3094. 

  3094.     var $methodURI = '';
    3095. 

  3095.     /**
    3096. 

  3096.      * name of method requested
    3097. 

  3097.      * @var string 
    3098. 

  3098.      * @access private
    3099. 

  3099.      */
    3100. 

  3100.     var $methodname = '';
    3101. 

  3101.     /**
    3102. 

  3102.      * method parameters from request
    3103. 

  3103.      * @var array 
    3104. 

  3104.      * @access private
    3105. 

  3105.      */
    3106. 

  3106.     var $methodparams = array();
    3107. 

  3107.     /**
    3108. 

  3108.      * SOAP Action from request
    3109. 

  3109.      * @var string 
    3110. 

  3110.      * @access private
    3111. 

  3111.      */
    3112. 

  3112.     var $SOAPAction = '';
    3113. 

  3113.     /**
    3114. 

  3114.      * character set encoding of incoming (request) messages
    3115. 

  3115.      * @var string 
    3116. 

  3116.      * @access public
    3117. 

  3117.      */
    3118. 

  3118.     var $xml_encoding = '';
    3119. 

  3119.     /**
    3120. 

  3120.      * toggles whether the parser decodes element content w/ utf8_decode()
    3121. 

  3121.      * @var boolean 
    3122. 

  3122.      * @access public
    3123. 

  3123.      */
    3124. 

  3124.     var $decode_utf8 = true;
    3125. 

  3125.  
    3126. 

  3126.     /**
    3127. 

  3127.      * HTTP headers of response
    3128. 

  3128.      * @var array 
    3129. 

  3129.      * @access public
    3130. 

  3130.      */
    3131. 

  3131.     var $outgoing_headers = array();
    3132. 

  3132.     /**
    3133. 

  3133.      * HTTP response
    3134. 

  3134.      * @var string 
    3135. 

  3135.      * @access private
    3136. 

  3136.      */
    3137. 

  3137.     var $response = '';
    3138. 

  3138.     /**
    3139. 

  3139.      * SOAP headers for response (text)
    3140. 

  3140.      * @var string 
    3141. 

  3141.      * @access public
    3142. 

  3142.      */
    3143. 

  3143.     var $responseHeaders = '';
    3144. 

  3144.     /**
    3145. 

  3145.      * SOAP payload for response (text)
    3146. 

  3146.      * @var string 
    3147. 

  3147.      * @access private
    3148. 

  3148.      */
    3149. 

  3149.     var $responseSOAP = '';
    3150. 

  3150.     /**
    3151. 

  3151.      * method return value to place in response
    3152. 

  3152.      * @var mixed 
    3153. 

  3153.      * @access private
    3154. 

  3154.      */
    3155. 

  3155.     var $methodreturn = false;
    3156. 

  3156.     /**
    3157. 

  3157.      * whether $methodreturn is a string of literal XML
    3158. 

  3158.      * @var boolean 
    3159. 

  3159.      * @access public
    3160. 

  3160.      */
    3161. 

  3161.     var $methodreturnisliteralxml = false;
    3162. 

  3162.     /**
    3163. 

  3163.      * SOAP fault for response (or false)
    3164. 

  3164.      * @var mixed 
    3165. 

  3165.      * @access private
    3166. 

  3166.      */
    3167. 

  3167.     var $fault = false;
    3168. 

  3168.     /**
    3169. 

  3169.      * text indication of result (for debugging)
    3170. 

  3170.      * @var string 
    3171. 

  3171.      * @access private
    3172. 

  3172.      */
    3173. 

  3173.     var $result = 'successful';
    3174. 

  3174.  
    3175. 

  3175.     /**
    3176. 

  3176.      * assoc array of operations => opData; operations are added by the register()
    3177. 

  3177.      * method or by parsing an external WSDL definition
    3178. 

  3178.      * @var array 
    3179. 

  3179.      * @access private
    3180. 

  3180.      */
    3181. 

  3181.     var $operations = array();
    3182. 

  3182.     /**
    3183. 

  3183.      * wsdl instance (if one)
    3184. 

  3184.      * @var mixed 
    3185. 

  3185.      * @access private
    3186. 

  3186.      */
    3187. 

  3187.     var $wsdl = false;
    3188. 

  3188.     /**
    3189. 

  3189.      * URL for WSDL (if one)
    3190. 

  3190.      * @var mixed 
    3191. 

  3191.      * @access private
    3192. 

  3192.      */
    3193. 

  3193.     var $externalWSDLURL = false;
    3194. 

  3194.     /**
    3195. 

  3195.      * whether to append debug to response as XML comment
    3196. 

  3196.      * @var boolean 
    3197. 

  3197.      * @access public
    3198. 

  3198.      */
    3199. 

  3199.     var $debug_flag = false;
    3200. 

  3200.  
    3201. 

  3201.  
    3202. 

  3202.     /**
    3203. 

  3203.     * constructor
    3204. 

  3204.     * the optional parameter is a path to a WSDL file that you'd like to bind the server instance to.
    3205. 

  3205.     *
    3206. 

  3206.     * @param mixed $wsdl file path or URL (string), or wsdl instance (object)
    3207. 

  3207.     * @access   public
    3208. 

  3208.     */
    3209. 

  3209.     function soap_server($wsdl=false){
    3210. 

  3210.         parent::nusoap_base();
    3211. 

  3211.         // turn on debugging?
    3212. 

  3212.         global $debug;
    3213. 

  3213.         global $HTTP_SERVER_VARS;
    3214. 

  3214.  
    3215. 

  3215.         if (isset($_SERVER)) {
    3216. 

  3216.             $this->debug("_SERVER is defined:");
    3217. 

  3217.             $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($_SERVER));
    3218. 

  3218.         } elseif (isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS)) {
    3219. 

  3219.             $this->debug("HTTP_SERVER_VARS is defined:");
    3220. 

  3220.             $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($HTTP_SERVER_VARS));
    3221. 

  3221.         } else {
    3222. 

  3222.             $this->debug("Neither _SERVER nor HTTP_SERVER_VARS is defined.");
    3223. 

  3223.         }
    3224. 

  3224.  
    3225. 

  3225.         if (isset($debug)) {
    3226. 

  3226.             $this->debug("In soap_server, set debug_flag=$debug based on global flag");
    3227. 

  3227.             $this->debug_flag = $debug;
    3228. 

  3228.         } elseif (isset($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'])) {
    3229. 

  3229.             $qs = explode('&', $_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']);
    3230. 

  3230.             foreach ($qs as $v) {
    3231. 

  3231.                 if (substr($v, 0, 6) == 'debug=') {
    3232. 

  3232.                     $this->debug("In soap_server, set debug_flag=" . substr($v, 6) . " based on query string #1");
    3233. 

  3233.                     $this->debug_flag = substr($v, 6);
    3234. 

  3234.                 }
    3235. 

  3235.             }
    3236. 

  3236.         } elseif (isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS['QUERY_STRING'])) {
    3237. 

  3237.             $qs = explode('&', $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['QUERY_STRING']);
    3238. 

  3238.             foreach ($qs as $v) {
    3239. 

  3239.                 if (substr($v, 0, 6) == 'debug=') {
    3240. 

  3240.                     $this->debug("In soap_server, set debug_flag=" . substr($v, 6) . " based on query string #2");
    3241. 

  3241.                     $this->debug_flag = substr($v, 6);
    3242. 

  3242.                 }
    3243. 

  3243.             }
    3244. 

  3244.         }
    3245. 

  3245.  
    3246. 

  3246.         // wsdl
    3247. 

  3247.         if($wsdl){
    3248. 

  3248.             $this->debug("In soap_server, WSDL is specified");
    3249. 

  3249.             if (is_object($wsdl) && (get_class($wsdl) == 'wsdl')) {
    3250. 

  3250.                 $this->wsdl = $wsdl;
    3251. 

  3251.                 $this->externalWSDLURL = $this->wsdl->wsdl;
    3252. 

  3252.                 $this->debug('Use existing wsdl instance from ' . $this->externalWSDLURL);
    3253. 

  3253.             } else {
    3254. 

  3254.                 $this->debug('Create wsdl from ' . $wsdl);
    3255. 

  3255.                 $this->wsdl = new wsdl($wsdl);
    3256. 

  3256.                 $this->externalWSDLURL = $wsdl;
    3257. 

  3257.             }
    3258. 

  3258.             $this->appendDebug($this->wsdl->getDebug());
    3259. 

  3259.             $this->wsdl->clearDebug();
    3260. 

  3260.             if($err = $this->wsdl->getError()){
    3261. 

  3261.                 die('WSDL ERROR: '.$err);
    3262. 

  3262.             }
    3263. 

  3263.         }
    3264. 

  3264.     }
    3265. 

  3265.  
    3266. 

  3266.     /**
    3267. 

  3267.     * processes request and returns response
    3268. 

  3268.     *
    3269. 

  3269.     * @param    string $data usually is the value of $HTTP_RAW_POST_DATA
    3270. 

  3270.     * @access   public
    3271. 

  3271.     */
    3272. 

  3272.     function service($data){
    3273. 

  3273.         global $HTTP_SERVER_VARS;
    3274. 

  3274.  
    3275. 

  3275.         if (isset($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'])) {
    3276. 

  3276.             $qs = $_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'];
    3277. 

  3277.         } elseif (isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS['QUERY_STRING'])) {
    3278. 

  3278.             $qs = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['QUERY_STRING'];
    3279. 

  3279.         } else {
    3280. 

  3280.             $qs = '';
    3281. 

  3281.         }
    3282. 

  3282.         $this->debug("In service, query string=$qs");
    3283. 

  3283.  
    3284. 

  3284.         if (ereg('wsdl', $qs) ){
    3285. 

  3285.             $this->debug("In service, this is a request for WSDL");
    3286. 

  3286.             if($this->externalWSDLURL){
    3287. 

  3287.               if (strpos($this->externalWSDLURL,"://")!==false) { // assume URL
    3288. 

  3288.                 header('Location: '.$this->externalWSDLURL);
    3289. 

  3289.               } else { // assume file
    3290. 

  3290.                 header("Content-Type: text/xml\r\n");
    3291. 

  3291.                 $fp = fopen($this->externalWSDLURL, 'r');
    3292. 

  3292.                 fpassthru($fp);
    3293. 

  3293.               }
    3294. 

  3294.             } elseif ($this->wsdl) {
    3295. 

  3295.                 header("Content-Type: text/xml; charset=ISO-8859-1\r\n");
    3296. 

  3296.                 print $this->wsdl->serialize($this->debug_flag);
    3297. 

  3297.                 if ($this->debug_flag) {
    3298. 

  3298.                     $this->debug('wsdl:');
    3299. 

  3299.                     $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($this->wsdl));
    3300. 

  3300.                     print $this->getDebugAsXMLComment();
    3301. 

  3301.                 }
    3302. 

  3302.             } else {
    3303. 

  3303.                 header("Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1\r\n");
    3304. 

  3304.                 print "This service does not provide WSDL";
    3305. 

  3305.             }
    3306. 

  3306.         } elseif ($data == '' && $this->wsdl) {
    3307. 

  3307.             $this->debug("In service, there is no data, so return Web description");
    3308. 

  3308.             print $this->wsdl->webDescription();
    3309. 

  3309.         } else {
    3310. 

  3310.             $this->debug("In service, invoke the request");
    3311. 

  3311.             $this->parse_request($data);
    3312. 

  3312.             if (! $this->fault) {
    3313. 

  3313.                 $this->invoke_method();
    3314. 

  3314.             }
    3315. 

  3315.             if (! $this->fault) {
    3316. 

  3316.                 $this->serialize_return();
    3317. 

  3317.             }
    3318. 

  3318.             $this->send_response();
    3319. 

  3319.         }
    3320. 

  3320.     }
    3321. 

  3321.  
    3322. 

  3322.     /**
    3323. 

  3323.     * parses HTTP request headers.
    3324. 

  3324.     *
    3325. 

  3325.     * The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
    3326. 

  3326.     *
    3327. 

  3327.     * headers
    3328. 

  3328.     * request
    3329. 

  3329.     * xml_encoding
    3330. 

  3330.     * SOAPAction
    3331. 

  3331.     *
    3332. 

  3332.     * @access   private
    3333. 

  3333.     */
    3334. 

  3334.     function parse_http_headers() {
    3335. 

  3335.         global $HTTP_SERVER_VARS;
    3336. 

  3336.  
    3337. 

  3337.         $this->request = '';
    3338. 

  3338.         $this->SOAPAction = '';
    3339. 

  3339.         if(function_exists('getallheaders')){
    3340. 

  3340.             $this->debug("In parse_http_headers, use getallheaders");
    3341. 

  3341.             $headers = getallheaders();
    3342. 

  3342.             foreach($headers as $k=>$v){
    3343. 

  3343.                 $k = strtolower($k);
    3344. 

  3344.                 $this->headers[$k] = $v;
    3345. 

  3345.                 $this->request .= "$k: $v\r\n";
    3346. 

  3346.                 $this->debug("$k: $v");
    3347. 

  3347.             }
    3348. 

  3348.             // get SOAPAction header
    3349. 

  3349.             if(isset($this->headers['soapaction'])){
    3350. 

  3350.                 $this->SOAPAction = str_replace('"','',$this->headers['soapaction']);
    3351. 

  3351.             }
    3352. 

  3352.             // get the character encoding of the incoming request
    3353. 

  3353.             if(isset($this->headers['content-type']) && strpos($this->headers['content-type'],'=')){
    3354. 

  3354.                 $enc = str_replace('"','',substr(strstr($this->headers["content-type"],'='),1));
    3355. 

  3355.                 if(eregi('^(ISO-8859-1|US-ASCII|UTF-8)$',$enc)){
    3356. 

  3356.                     $this->xml_encoding = strtoupper($enc);
    3357. 

  3357.                 } else {
    3358. 

  3358.                     $this->xml_encoding = 'US-ASCII';
    3359. 

  3359.                 }
    3360. 

  3360.             } else {
    3361. 

  3361.                 // should be US-ASCII for HTTP 1.0 or ISO-8859-1 for HTTP 1.1
    3362. 

  3362.                 $this->xml_encoding = 'ISO-8859-1';
    3363. 

  3363.             }
    3364. 

  3364.         } elseif(isset($_SERVER) && is_array($_SERVER)){
    3365. 

  3365.             $this->debug("In parse_http_headers, use _SERVER");
    3366. 

  3366.             foreach ($_SERVER as $k => $v) {
    3367. 

  3367.                 if (substr($k, 0, 5) == 'HTTP_') {
    3368. 

  3368.                     $k = str_replace(' ', '-', strtolower(str_replace('_', ' ', substr($k, 5))));                                              $k = strtolower(substr($k, 5));
    3369. 

  3369.                 } else {
    3370. 

  3370.                     $k = str_replace(' ', '-', strtolower(str_replace('_', ' ', $k)));                                              $k = strtolower($k);
    3371. 

  3371.                 }
    3372. 

  3372.                 if ($k == 'soapaction') {
    3373. 

  3373.                     // get SOAPAction header
    3374. 

  3374.                     $k = 'SOAPAction';
    3375. 

  3375.                     $v = str_replace('"', '', $v);
    3376. 

  3376.                     $v = str_replace('\\', '', $v);
    3377. 

  3377.                     $this->SOAPAction = $v;
    3378. 

  3378.                 } else if ($k == 'content-type') {
    3379. 

  3379.                     // get the character encoding of the incoming request
    3380. 

  3380.                     if (strpos($v, '=')) {
    3381. 

  3381.                         $enc = substr(strstr($v, '='), 1);
    3382. 

  3382.                         $enc = str_replace('"', '', $enc);
    3383. 

  3383.                         $enc = str_replace('\\', '', $enc);
    3384. 

  3384.                         if (eregi('^(ISO-8859-1|US-ASCII|UTF-8)$', $enc)) {
    3385. 

  3385.                             $this->xml_encoding = strtoupper($enc);
    3386. 

  3386.                         } else {
    3387. 

  3387.                             $this->xml_encoding = 'US-ASCII';
    3388. 

  3388.                         }
    3389. 

  3389.                     } else {
    3390. 

  3390.                         // should be US-ASCII for HTTP 1.0 or ISO-8859-1 for HTTP 1.1
    3391. 

  3391.                         $this->xml_encoding = 'ISO-8859-1';
    3392. 

  3392.                     }
    3393. 

  3393.                 }
    3394. 

  3394.                 $this->headers[$k] = $v;
    3395. 

  3395.                 $this->request .= "$k: $v\r\n";
    3396. 

  3396.                 $this->debug("$k: $v");
    3397. 

  3397.             }
    3398. 

  3398.         } elseif (is_array($HTTP_SERVER_VARS)) {
    3399. 

  3399.             $this->debug("In parse_http_headers, use HTTP_SERVER_VARS");
    3400. 

  3400.             foreach ($HTTP_SERVER_VARS as $k => $v) {
    3401. 

  3401.                 if (substr($k, 0, 5) == 'HTTP_') {
    3402. 

  3402.                     $k = str_replace(' ', '-', strtolower(str_replace('_', ' ', substr($k, 5))));                                              $k = strtolower(substr($k, 5));
    3403. 

  3403.                 } else {
    3404. 

  3404.                     $k = str_replace(' ', '-', strtolower(str_replace('_', ' ', $k)));                                              $k = strtolower($k);
    3405. 

  3405.                 }
    3406. 

  3406.                 if ($k == 'soapaction') {
    3407. 

  3407.                     // get SOAPAction header
    3408. 

  3408.                     $k = 'SOAPAction';
    3409. 

  3409.                     $v = str_replace('"', '', $v);
    3410. 

  3410.                     $v = str_replace('\\', '', $v);
    3411. 

  3411.                     $this->SOAPAction = $v;
    3412. 

  3412.                 } else if ($k == 'content-type') {
    3413. 

  3413.                     // get the character encoding of the incoming request
    3414. 

  3414.                     if (strpos($v, '=')) {
    3415. 

  3415.                         $enc = substr(strstr($v, '='), 1);
    3416. 

  3416.                         $enc = str_replace('"', '', $enc);
    3417. 

  3417.                         $enc = str_replace('\\', '', $enc);
    3418. 

  3418.                         if (eregi('^(ISO-8859-1|US-ASCII|UTF-8)$', $enc)) {
    3419. 

  3419.                             $this->xml_encoding = strtoupper($enc);
    3420. 

  3420.                         } else {
    3421. 

  3421.                             $this->xml_encoding = 'US-ASCII';
    3422. 

  3422.                         }
    3423. 

  3423.                     } else {
    3424. 

  3424.                         // should be US-ASCII for HTTP 1.0 or ISO-8859-1 for HTTP 1.1
    3425. 

  3425.                         $this->xml_encoding = 'ISO-8859-1';
    3426. 

  3426.                     }
    3427. 

  3427.                 }
    3428. 

  3428.                 $this->headers[$k] = $v;
    3429. 

  3429.                 $this->request .= "$k: $v\r\n";
    3430. 

  3430.                 $this->debug("$k: $v");
    3431. 

  3431.             }
    3432. 

  3432.         } else {
    3433. 

  3433.             $this->debug("In parse_http_headers, HTTP headers not accessible");
    3434. 

  3434.             $this->setError("HTTP headers not accessible");
    3435. 

  3435.         }
    3436. 

  3436.     }
    3437. 

  3437.  
    3438. 

  3438.     /**
    3439. 

  3439.     * parses a request
    3440. 

  3440.     *
    3441. 

  3441.     * The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
    3442. 

  3442.     *
    3443. 

  3443.     * headers
    3444. 

  3444.     * request
    3445. 

  3445.     * xml_encoding
    3446. 

  3446.     * SOAPAction
    3447. 

  3447.     * request
    3448. 

  3448.     * requestSOAP
    3449. 

  3449.     * methodURI
    3450. 

  3450.     * methodname
    3451. 

  3451.     * methodparams
    3452. 

  3452.     * requestHeaders
    3453. 

  3453.     * document
    3454. 

  3454.     *
    3455. 

  3455.     * This sets the fault field on error
    3456. 

  3456.     *
    3457. 

  3457.     * @param    string $data XML string
    3458. 

  3458.     * @access   private
    3459. 

  3459.     */
    3460. 

  3460.     function parse_request($data='') {
    3461. 

  3461.         $this->debug('entering parse_request()');
    3462. 

  3462.         $this->parse_http_headers();
    3463. 

  3463.         $this->debug('got character encoding: '.$this->xml_encoding);
    3464. 

  3464.         // uncompress if necessary
    3465. 

  3465.         if (isset($this->headers['content-encoding']) && $this->headers['content-encoding'] != '') {
    3466. 

  3466.             $this->debug('got content encoding: ' . $this->headers['content-encoding']);
    3467. 

  3467.             if ($this->headers['content-encoding'] == 'deflate' || $this->headers['content-encoding'] == 'gzip') {
    3468. 

  3468.                 // if decoding works, use it. else assume data wasn't gzencoded
    3469. 

  3469.                 if (function_exists('gzuncompress')) {
    3470. 

  3470.                     if ($this->headers['content-encoding'] == 'deflate' && $degzdata = @gzuncompress($data)) {
    3471. 

  3471.                         $data = $degzdata;
    3472. 

  3472.                     } elseif ($this->headers['content-encoding'] == 'gzip' && $degzdata = gzinflate(substr($data, 10))) {
    3473. 

  3473.                         $data = $degzdata;
    3474. 

  3474.                     } else {
    3475. 

  3475.                         $this->fault('Client', 'Errors occurred when trying to decode the data');
    3476. 

  3476.                         return;
    3477. 

  3477.                     }
    3478. 

  3478.                 } else {
    3479. 

  3479.                     $this->fault('Client', 'This Server does not support compressed data');
    3480. 

  3480.                     return;
    3481. 

  3481.                 }
    3482. 

  3482.             }
    3483. 

  3483.         }
    3484. 

  3484.         $this->request .= "\r\n".$data;
    3485. 

  3485.         $data = $this->parseRequest($this->headers, $data);
    3486. 

  3486.         $this->requestSOAP = $data;
    3487. 

  3487.         $this->debug('leaving parse_request');
    3488. 

  3488.     }
    3489. 

  3489.  
    3490. 

  3490.     /**
    3491. 

  3491.     * invokes a PHP function for the requested SOAP method
    3492. 

  3492.     *
    3493. 

  3493.     * The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
    3494. 

  3494.     *
    3495. 

  3495.     * methodreturn
    3496. 

  3496.     *
    3497. 

  3497.     * Note that the PHP function that is called may also set the following
    3498. 

  3498.     * fields to affect the response sent to the client
    3499. 

  3499.     *
    3500. 

  3500.     * responseHeaders
    3501. 

  3501.     * outgoing_headers
    3502. 

  3502.     *
    3503. 

  3503.     * This sets the fault field on error
    3504. 

  3504.     *
    3505. 

  3505.     * @access   private
    3506. 

  3506.     */
    3507. 

  3507.     function invoke_method() {
    3508. 

  3508.         $this->debug('in invoke_method, methodname=' . $this->methodname . ' methodURI=' . $this->methodURI . ' SOAPAction=' . $this->SOAPAction);
    3509. 

  3509.  
    3510. 

  3510.         if ($this->wsdl) {
    3511. 

  3511.             if ($this->opData = $this->wsdl->getOperationData($this->methodname)) {
    3512. 

  3512.                 $this->debug('in invoke_method, found WSDL operation=' . $this->methodname);
    3513. 

  3513.                 $this->appendDebug('opData=' . $this->varDump($this->opData));
    3514. 

  3514.             } elseif ($this->opData = $this->wsdl->getOperationDataForSoapAction($this->SOAPAction)) {
    3515. 

  3515.                 // Note: hopefully this case will only be used for doc/lit, since rpc services should have wrapper element
    3516. 

  3516.                 $this->debug('in invoke_method, found WSDL soapAction=' . $this->SOAPAction . ' for operation=' . $this->opData['name']);
    3517. 

  3517.                 $this->appendDebug('opData=' . $this->varDump($this->opData));
    3518. 

  3518.                 $this->methodname = $this->opData['name'];
    3519. 

  3519.             } else {
    3520. 

  3520.                 $this->debug('in invoke_method, no WSDL for operation=' . $this->methodname);
    3521. 

  3521.                 $this->fault('Client', "Operation '" . $this->methodname . "' is not defined in the WSDL for this service");
    3522. 

  3522.                 return;
    3523. 

  3523.             }
    3524. 

  3524.         } else {
    3525. 

  3525.             $this->debug('in invoke_method, no WSDL to validate method');
    3526. 

  3526.         }
    3527. 

  3527.  
    3528. 

  3528.         // if a . is present in $this->methodname, we see if there is a class in scope,
    3529. 

  3529.         // which could be referred to. We will also distinguish between two deliminators,
    3530. 

  3530.         // to allow methods to be called a the class or an instance
    3531. 

  3531.         $class = '';
    3532. 

  3532.         $method = '';
    3533. 

  3533.         if (strpos($this->methodname, '..') > 0) {
    3534. 

  3534.             $delim = '..';
    3535. 

  3535.         } else if (strpos($this->methodname, '.') > 0) {
    3536. 

  3536.             $delim = '.';
    3537. 

  3537.         } else {
    3538. 

  3538.             $delim = '';
    3539. 

  3539.         }
    3540. 

  3540.  
    3541. 

  3541.         if (strlen($delim) > 0 && substr_count($this->methodname, $delim) == 1 &&
    3542. 

  3542.             class_exists(substr($this->methodname, 0, strpos($this->methodname, $delim)))) {
    3543. 

  3543.             // get the class and method name
    3544. 

  3544.             $class = substr($this->methodname, 0, strpos($this->methodname, $delim));
    3545. 

  3545.             $method = substr($this->methodname, strpos($this->methodname, $delim) + strlen($delim));
    3546. 

  3546.             $this->debug("in invoke_method, class=$class method=$method delim=$delim");
    3547. 

  3547.         }
    3548. 

  3548.  
    3549. 

  3549.         // does method exist?
    3550. 

  3550.         if ($class == '') {
    3551. 

  3551.             if (!function_exists($this->methodname)) {
    3552. 

  3552.                 $this->debug("in invoke_method, function '$this->methodname' not found!");
    3553. 

  3553.                 $this->result = 'fault: method not found';
    3554. 

  3554.                 $this->fault('Client',"method '$this->methodname' not defined in service");
    3555. 

  3555.                 return;
    3556. 

  3556.             }
    3557. 

  3557.         } else {
    3558. 

  3558.             $method_to_compare = (substr(phpversion(), 0, 2) == '4.') ? strtolower($method) : $method;
    3559. 

  3559.             if (!in_array($method_to_compare, get_class_methods($class))) {
    3560. 

  3560.                 $this->debug("in invoke_method, method '$this->methodname' not found in class '$class'!");
    3561. 

  3561.                 $this->result = 'fault: method not found';
    3562. 

  3562.                 $this->fault('Client',"method '$this->methodname' not defined in service");
    3563. 

  3563.                 return;
    3564. 

  3564.             }
    3565. 

  3565.         }
    3566. 

  3566.  
    3567. 

  3567.         // evaluate message, getting back parameters
    3568. 

  3568.         // verify that request parameters match the method's signature
    3569. 

  3569.         if(! $this->verify_method($this->methodname,$this->methodparams)){
    3570. 

  3570.             // debug
    3571. 

  3571.             $this->debug('ERROR: request not verified against method signature');
    3572. 

  3572.             $this->result = 'fault: request failed validation against method signature';
    3573. 

  3573.             // return fault
    3574. 

  3574.             $this->fault('Client',"Operation '$this->methodname' not defined in service.");
    3575. 

  3575.             return;
    3576. 

  3576.         }
    3577. 

  3577.  
    3578. 

  3578.         // if there are parameters to pass
    3579. 

  3579.         $this->debug('in invoke_method, params:');
    3580. 

  3580.         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($this->methodparams));
    3581. 

  3581.         $this->debug("in invoke_method, calling '$this->methodname'");
    3582. 

  3582.         if (!function_exists('call_user_func_array')) {
    3583. 

  3583.             if ($class == '') {
    3584. 

  3584.                 $this->debug('in invoke_method, calling function using eval()');
    3585. 

  3585.                 $funcCall = "\$this->methodreturn = $this->methodname(";
    3586. 

  3586.             } else {
    3587. 

  3587.                 if ($delim == '..') {
    3588. 

  3588.                     $this->debug('in invoke_method, calling class method using eval()');
    3589. 

  3589.                     $funcCall = "\$this->methodreturn = ".$class."::".$method."(";
    3590. 

  3590.                 } else {
    3591. 

  3591.                     $this->debug('in invoke_method, calling instance method using eval()');
    3592. 

  3592.                     // generate unique instance name
    3593. 

  3593.                     $instname = "\$inst_".time();
    3594. 

  3594.                     $funcCall = $instname." = new ".$class."(); ";
    3595. 

  3595.                     $funcCall .= "\$this->methodreturn = ".$instname."->".$method."(";
    3596. 

  3596.                 }
    3597. 

  3597.             }
    3598. 

  3598.             if ($this->methodparams) {
    3599. 

  3599.                 foreach ($this->methodparams as $param) {
    3600. 

  3600.                     if (is_array($param)) {
    3601. 

  3601.                         $this->fault('Client', 'NuSOAP does not handle complexType parameters correctly when using eval; call_user_func_array must be available');
    3602. 

  3602.                         return;
    3603. 

  3603.                     }
    3604. 

  3604.                     $funcCall .= "\"$param\",";
    3605. 

  3605.                 }
    3606. 

  3606.                 $funcCall = substr($funcCall, 0, -1);
    3607. 

  3607.             }
    3608. 

  3608.             $funcCall .= ');';
    3609. 

  3609.             $this->debug('in invoke_method, function call: '.$funcCall);
    3610. 

  3610.             @eval($funcCall);
    3611. 

  3611.         } else {
    3612. 

  3612.             if ($class == '') {
    3613. 

  3613.                 $this->debug('in invoke_method, calling function using call_user_func_array()');
    3614. 

  3614.                 $call_arg = "$this->methodname";    // straight assignment changes $this->methodname to lower case after call_user_func_array()
    3615. 

  3615.             } elseif ($delim == '..') {
    3616. 

  3616.                 $this->debug('in invoke_method, calling class method using call_user_func_array()');
    3617. 

  3617.                 $call_arg = array ($class, $method);
    3618. 

  3618.             } else {
    3619. 

  3619.                 $this->debug('in invoke_method, calling instance method using call_user_func_array()');
    3620. 

  3620.                 $instance = new $class ();
    3621. 

  3621.                 $call_arg = array(&$instance, $method);
    3622. 

  3622.             }
    3623. 

  3623.             $this->methodreturn = call_user_func_array($call_arg, $this->methodparams);
    3624. 

  3624.         }
    3625. 

  3625.         $this->debug('in invoke_method, methodreturn:');
    3626. 

  3626.         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($this->methodreturn));
    3627. 

  3627.         $this->debug("in invoke_method, called method $this->methodname, received $this->methodreturn of type ".gettype($this->methodreturn));
    3628. 

  3628.     }
    3629. 

  3629.  
    3630. 

  3630.     /**
    3631. 

  3631.     * serializes the return value from a PHP function into a full SOAP Envelope
    3632. 

  3632.     *
    3633. 

  3633.     * The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
    3634. 

  3634.     *
    3635. 

  3635.     * responseSOAP
    3636. 

  3636.     *
    3637. 

  3637.     * This sets the fault field on error
    3638. 

  3638.     *
    3639. 

  3639.     * @access   private
    3640. 

  3640.     */
    3641. 

  3641.     function serialize_return() {
    3642. 

  3642.         $this->debug('Entering serialize_return methodname: ' . $this->methodname . ' methodURI: ' . $this->methodURI);
    3643. 

  3643.         // if fault
    3644. 

  3644.         if (isset($this->methodreturn) && (get_class($this->methodreturn) == 'soap_fault')) {
    3645. 

  3645.             $this->debug('got a fault object from method');
    3646. 

  3646.             $this->fault = $this->methodreturn;
    3647. 

  3647.             return;
    3648. 

  3648.         } elseif ($this->methodreturnisliteralxml) {
    3649. 

  3649.             $return_val = $this->methodreturn;
    3650. 

  3650.         // returned value(s)
    3651. 

  3651.         } else {
    3652. 

  3652.             $this->debug('got a(n) '.gettype($this->methodreturn).' from method');
    3653. 

  3653.             $this->debug('serializing return value');
    3654. 

  3654.             if($this->wsdl){
    3655. 

  3655.                 // weak attempt at supporting multiple output params
    3656. 

  3656.                 if(sizeof($this->opData['output']['parts']) > 1){
    3657. 

  3657.                     $opParams = $this->methodreturn;
    3658. 

  3658.                 } else {
    3659. 

  3659.                     // TODO: is this really necessary?
    3660. 

  3660.                     $opParams = array($this->methodreturn);
    3661. 

  3661.                 }
    3662. 

  3662.                 $return_val = $this->wsdl->serializeRPCParameters($this->methodname,'output',$opParams);
    3663. 

  3663.                 $this->appendDebug($this->wsdl->getDebug());
    3664. 

  3664.                 $this->wsdl->clearDebug();
    3665. 

  3665.                 if($errstr = $this->wsdl->getError()){
    3666. 

  3666.                     $this->debug('got wsdl error: '.$errstr);
    3667. 

  3667.                     $this->fault('Server', 'unable to serialize result');
    3668. 

  3668.                     return;
    3669. 

  3669.                 }
    3670. 

  3670.             } else {
    3671. 

  3671.                 if (isset($this->methodreturn)) {
    3672. 

  3672.                     $return_val = $this->serialize_val($this->methodreturn, 'return');
    3673. 

  3673.                 } else {
    3674. 

  3674.                     $return_val = '';
    3675. 

  3675.                     $this->debug('in absence of WSDL, assume void return for backward compatibility');
    3676. 

  3676.                 }
    3677. 

  3677.             }
    3678. 

  3678.         }
    3679. 

  3679.         $this->debug('return value:');
    3680. 

  3680.         $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($return_val));
    3681. 

  3681.  
    3682. 

  3682.         $this->debug('serializing response');
    3683. 

  3683.         if ($this->wsdl) {
    3684. 

  3684.             $this->debug('have WSDL for serialization: style is ' . $this->opData['style']);
    3685. 

  3685.             if ($this->opData['style'] == 'rpc') {
    3686. 

  3686.                 $this->debug('style is rpc for serialization: use is ' . $this->opData['output']['use']);
    3687. 

  3687.                 if ($this->opData['output']['use'] == 'literal') {
    3688. 

  3688.                     $payload = '<'.$this->methodname.'Response xmlns="'.$this->methodURI.'">'.$return_val.'</'.$this->methodname."Response>";
    3689. 

  3689.                 } else {
    3690. 

  3690.                     $payload = '<ns1:'.$this->methodname.'Response xmlns:ns1="'.$this->methodURI.'">'.$return_val.'</ns1:'.$this->methodname."Response>";
    3691. 

  3691.                 }
    3692. 

  3692.             } else {
    3693. 

  3693.                 $this->debug('style is not rpc for serialization: assume document');
    3694. 

  3694.                 $payload = $return_val;
    3695. 

  3695.             }
    3696. 

  3696.         } else {
    3697. 

  3697.             $this->debug('do not have WSDL for serialization: assume rpc/encoded');
    3698. 

  3698.             $payload = '<ns1:'.$this->methodname.'Response xmlns:ns1="'.$this->methodURI.'">'.$return_val.'</ns1:'.$this->methodname."Response>";
    3699. 

  3699.         }
    3700. 

  3700.         $this->result = 'successful';
    3701. 

  3701.         if($this->wsdl){
    3702. 

  3702.             //if($this->debug_flag){
    3703. 

  3703.                 $this->appendDebug($this->wsdl->getDebug());
    3704. 

  3704.             //    }
    3705. 

  3705.             if (isset($opData['output']['encodingStyle'])) {
    3706. 

  3706.                 $encodingStyle = $opData['output']['encodingStyle'];
    3707. 

  3707.             } else {
    3708. 

  3708.                 $encodingStyle = '';
    3709. 

  3709.             }
    3710. 

  3710.             // Added: In case we use a WSDL, return a serialized env. WITH the usedNamespaces.
    3711. 

  3711.             $this->responseSOAP = $this->serializeEnvelope($payload,$this->responseHeaders,$this->wsdl->usedNamespaces,$this->opData['style'],$encodingStyle);
    3712. 

  3712.         } else {
    3713. 

  3713.             $this->responseSOAP = $this->serializeEnvelope($payload,$this->responseHeaders);
    3714. 

  3714.         }
    3715. 

  3715.         $this->debug("Leaving serialize_return");
    3716. 

  3716.     }
    3717. 

  3717.  
    3718. 

  3718.     /**
    3719. 

  3719.     * sends an HTTP response
    3720. 

  3720.     *
    3721. 

  3721.     * The following fields are set by this function (when successful)
    3722. 

  3722.     *
    3723. 

  3723.     * outgoing_headers
    3724. 

  3724.     * response
    3725. 

  3725.     *
    3726. 

  3726.     * @access   private
    3727. 

  3727.     */
    3728. 

  3728.     function send_response() {
    3729. 

  3729.         $this->debug('Enter send_response');
    3730. 

  3730.         if ($this->fault) {
    3731. 

  3731.             $payload = $this->fault->serialize();
    3732. 

  3732.             $this->outgoing_headers[] = "HTTP/1.0 500 Internal Server Error";
    3733. 

  3733.             $this->outgoing_headers[] = "Status: 500 Internal Server Error";
    3734. 

  3734.         } else {
    3735. 

  3735.             $payload = $this->responseSOAP;
    3736. 

  3736.             // Some combinations of PHP+Web server allow the Status
    3737. 

  3737.             // to come through as a header.  Since OK is the default
    3738. 

  3738.             // just do nothing.
    3739. 

  3739.             // $this->outgoing_headers[] = "HTTP/1.0 200 OK";
    3740. 

  3740.             // $this->outgoing_headers[] = "Status: 200 OK";
    3741. 

  3741.         }
    3742. 

  3742.         // add debug data if in debug mode
    3743. 

  3743.         if(isset($this->debug_flag) && $this->debug_flag){
    3744. 

  3744.             $payload .= $this->getDebugAsXMLComment();
    3745. 

  3745.         }
    3746. 

  3746.         $this->outgoing_headers[] = "Server: $this->title Server v$this->version";
    3747. 

  3747.         ereg('\$Revisio' . 'n: ([^ ]+)', $this->revision, $rev);
    3748. 

  3748.         $this->outgoing_headers[] = "X-SOAP-Server: $this->title/$this->version (".$rev[1].")";
    3749. 

  3749.         // Let the Web server decide about this
    3750. 

  3750.         //$this->outgoing_headers[] = "Connection: Close\r\n";
    3751. 

  3751.         $payload = $this->getHTTPBody($payload);
    3752. 

  3752.         $type = $this->getHTTPContentType();
    3753. 

  3753.         $charset = $this->getHTTPContentTypeCharset();
    3754. 

  3754.         $this->outgoing_headers[] = "Content-Type: $type" . ($charset ? '; charset=' . $charset : '');
    3755. 

  3755.         //begin code to compress payload - by John
    3756. 

  3756.         // NOTE: there is no way to know whether the Web server will also compress
    3757. 

  3757.         // this data.
    3758. 

  3758.         if (strlen($payload) > 1024 && isset($this->headers) && isset($this->headers['accept-encoding'])) {    
    3759. 

  3759.             if (strstr($this->headers['accept-encoding'], 'gzip')) {
    3760. 

  3760.                 if (function_exists('gzencode')) {
    3761. 

  3761.                     if (isset($this->debug_flag) && $this->debug_flag) {
    3762. 

  3762.                         $payload .= "<!-- Content being gzipped -->";
    3763. 

  3763.                     }
    3764. 

  3764.                     $this->outgoing_headers[] = "Content-Encoding: gzip";
    3765. 

  3765.                     $payload = gzencode($payload);
    3766. 

  3766.                 } else {
    3767. 

  3767.                     if (isset($this->debug_flag) && $this->debug_flag) {
    3768. 

  3768.                         $payload .= "<!-- Content will not be gzipped: no gzencode -->";
    3769. 

  3769.                     }
    3770. 

  3770.                 }
    3771. 

  3771.             } elseif (strstr($this->headers['accept-encoding'], 'deflate')) {
    3772. 

  3772.                 // Note: MSIE requires gzdeflate output (no Zlib header and checksum),
    3773. 

  3773.                 // instead of gzcompress output,
    3774. 

  3774.                 // which conflicts with HTTP 1.1 spec (http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec3.html#sec3.5)
    3775. 

  3775.                 if (function_exists('gzdeflate')) {
    3776. 

  3776.                     if (isset($this->debug_flag) && $this->debug_flag) {
    3777. 

  3777.                         $payload .= "<!-- Content being deflated -->";
    3778. 

  3778.                     }
    3779. 

  3779.                     $this->outgoing_headers[] = "Content-Encoding: deflate";
    3780. 

  3780.                     $payload = gzdeflate($payload);
    3781. 

  3781.                 } else {
    3782. 

  3782.                     if (isset($this->debug_flag) && $this->debug_flag) {
    3783. 

  3783.                         $payload .= "<!-- Content will not be deflated: no gzcompress -->";
    3784. 

  3784.                     }
    3785. 

  3785.                 }
    3786. 

  3786.             }
    3787. 

  3787.         }
    3788. 

  3788.         //end code
    3789. 

  3789.         $this->outgoing_headers[] = "Content-Length: ".strlen($payload);
    3790. 

  3790.         reset($this->outgoing_headers);
    3791. 

  3791.         foreach($this->outgoing_headers as $hdr){
    3792. 

  3792.             header($hdr, false);
    3793. 

  3793.         }
    3794. 

  3794.         print $payload;
    3795. 

  3795.         $this->response = join("\r\n",$this->outgoing_headers)."\r\n\r\n".$payload;
    3796. 

  3796.     }
    3797. 

  3797.  
    3798. 

  3798.     /**
    3799. 

  3799.     * takes the value that was created by parsing the request
    3800. 

  3800.     * and compares to the method's signature, if available.
    3801. 

  3801.     *
    3802. 

  3802.     * @param    string    $operation    The operation to be invoked
    3803. 

  3803.     * @param    array    $request    The array of parameter values
    3804. 

  3804.     * @return    boolean    Whether the operation was found
    3805. 

  3805.     * @access   private
    3806. 

  3806.     */
    3807. 

  3807.     function verify_method($operation,$request){
    3808. 

  3808.         if(isset($this->wsdl) && is_object($this->wsdl)){
    3809. 

  3809.             if($this->wsdl->getOperationData($operation)){
    3810. 

  3810.                 return true;
    3811. 

  3811.             }
    3812. 

  3812.         } elseif(isset($this->operations[$operation])){
    3813. 

  3813.             return true;
    3814. 

  3814.         }
    3815. 

  3815.         return false;
    3816. 

  3816.     }
    3817. 

  3817.  
    3818. 

  3818.     /**
    3819. 

  3819.     * processes SOAP message received from client
    3820. 

  3820.     *
    3821. 

  3821.     * @param    array    $headers    The HTTP headers
    3822. 

  3822.     * @param    string    $data        unprocessed request data from client
    3823. 

  3823.     * @return    mixed    value of the message, decoded into a PHP type
    3824. 

  3824.     * @access   private
    3825. 

  3825.     */
    3826. 

  3826.     function parseRequest($headers, $data) {
    3827. 

  3827.         $this->debug('Entering parseRequest() for data of length ' . strlen($data) . ' and type ' . $headers['content-type']);
    3828. 

  3828.         if (!strstr($headers['content-type'], 'text/xml')) {
    3829. 

  3829.             $this->setError('Request not of type text/xml');
    3830. 

  3830.             return false;
    3831. 

  3831.         }
    3832. 

  3832.         if (strpos($headers['content-type'], '=')) {
    3833. 

  3833.             $enc = str_replace('"', '', substr(strstr($headers["content-type"], '='), 1));
    3834. 

  3834.             $this->debug('Got response encoding: ' . $enc);
    3835. 

  3835.             if(eregi('^(ISO-8859-1|US-ASCII|UTF-8)$',$enc)){
    3836. 

  3836.                 $this->xml_encoding = strtoupper($enc);
    3837. 

  3837.             } else {
    3838. 

  3838.                 $this->xml_encoding = 'US-ASCII';
    3839. 

  3839.             }
    3840. 

  3840.         } else {
    3841. 

  3841.             // should be US-ASCII for HTTP 1.0 or ISO-8859-1 for HTTP 1.1
    3842. 

  3842.             $this->xml_encoding = 'ISO-8859-1';
    3843. 

  3843.         }
    3844. 

  3844.         $this->debug('Use encoding: ' . $this->xml_encoding . ' when creating soap_parser');
    3845. 

  3845.         // parse response, get soap parser obj
    3846. 

  3846.         $parser = new soap_parser($data,$this->xml_encoding,'',$this->decode_utf8);
    3847. 

  3847.         // parser debug
    3848. 

  3848.         $this->debug("parser debug: \n".$parser->getDebug());
    3849. 

  3849.         // if fault occurred during message parsing
    3850. 

  3850.         if($err = $parser->getError()){
    3851. 

  3851.             $this->result = 'fault: error in msg parsing: '.$err;
    3852. 

  3852.             $this->fault('Client',"error in msg parsing:\n".$err);
    3853. 

  3853.         // else successfully parsed request into soapval object
    3854. 

  3854.         } else {
    3855. 

  3855.             // get/set methodname
    3856. 

  3856.             $this->methodURI = $parser->root_struct_namespace;
    3857. 

  3857.             $this->methodname = $parser->root_struct_name;
    3858. 

  3858.             $this->debug('methodname: '.$this->methodname.' methodURI: '.$this->methodURI);
    3859. 

  3859.             $this->debug('calling parser->get_response()');
    3860. 

  3860.             $this->methodparams = $parser->get_response();
    3861. 

  3861.             // get SOAP headers
    3862. 

  3862.             $this->requestHeaders = $parser->getHeaders();
    3863. 

  3863.             // add document for doclit support
    3864. 

  3864.             $this->document = $parser->document;
    3865. 

  3865.         }
    3866. 

  3866.      }
    3867. 

  3867.  
    3868. 

  3868.     /**
    3869. 

  3869.     * gets the HTTP body for the current response.
    3870. 

  3870.     *
    3871. 

  3871.     * @param string $soapmsg The SOAP payload
    3872. 

  3872.     * @return string The HTTP body, which includes the SOAP payload
    3873. 

  3873.     * @access private
    3874. 

  3874.     */
    3875. 

  3875.     function getHTTPBody($soapmsg) {
    3876. 

  3876.         return $soapmsg;
    3877. 

  3877.     }
    3878. 

  3878.     
    3879. 

  3879.     /**
    3880. 

  3880.     * gets the HTTP content type for the current response.
    3881. 

  3881.     *
    3882. 

  3882.     * Note: getHTTPBody must be called before this.
    3883. 

  3883.     *
    3884. 

  3884.     * @return string the HTTP content type for the current response.
    3885. 

  3885.     * @access private
    3886. 

  3886.     */
    3887. 

  3887.     function getHTTPContentType() {
    3888. 

  3888.         return 'text/xml';
    3889. 

  3889.     }
    3890. 

  3890.     
    3891. 

  3891.     /**
    3892. 

  3892.     * gets the HTTP content type charset for the current response.
    3893. 

  3893.     * returns false for non-text content types.
    3894. 

  3894.     *
    3895. 

  3895.     * Note: getHTTPBody must be called before this.
    3896. 

  3896.     *
    3897. 

  3897.     * @return string the HTTP content type charset for the current response.
    3898. 

  3898.     * @access private
    3899. 

  3899.     */
    3900. 

  3900.     function getHTTPContentTypeCharset() {
    3901. 

  3901.         return $this->soap_defencoding;
    3902. 

  3902.     }
    3903. 

  3903.  
    3904. 

  3904.     /**
    3905. 

  3905.     * add a method to the dispatch map (this has been replaced by the register method)
    3906. 

  3906.     *
    3907. 

  3907.     * @param    string $methodname 
    3908. 

  3908.     * @param    string $in array of input values
    3909. 

  3909.     * @param    string $out array of output values
    3910. 

  3910.     * @access   public
    3911. 

  3911.     * @deprecated
    3912. 

  3912.     */
    3913. 

  3913.     function add_to_map($methodname,$in,$out){
    3914. 

  3914.             $this->operations[$methodname] = array('name' => $methodname,'in' => $in,'out' => $out);
    3915. 

  3915.     }
    3916. 

  3916.  
    3917. 

  3917.     /**
    3918. 

  3918.     * register a service function with the server
    3919. 

  3919.     *
    3920. 

  3920.     * @param    string $name the name of the PHP function, class.method or class..method
    3921. 

  3921.     * @param    array $in assoc array of input values: key = param name, value = param type
    3922. 

  3922.     * @param    array $out assoc array of output values: key = param name, value = param type
    3923. 

  3923.     * @param    mixed $namespace the element namespace for the method or false
    3924. 

  3924.     * @param    mixed $soapaction the soapaction for the method or false
    3925. 

  3925.     * @param    mixed $style optional (rpc|document) or false Note: when 'document' is specified, parameter and return wrappers are created for you automatically
    3926. 

  3926.     * @param    mixed $use optional (encoded|literal) or false
    3927. 

  3927.     * @param    string $documentation optional Description to include in WSDL
    3928. 

  3928.     * @param    string $encodingStyle optional (usually 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/' for encoded)
    3929. 

  3929.     * @access   public
    3930. 

  3930.     */
    3931. 

  3931.     function register($name,$in=array(),$out=array(),$namespace=false,$soapaction=false,$style=false,$use=false,$documentation='',$encodingStyle=''){
    3932. 

  3932.         global $HTTP_SERVER_VARS;
    3933. 

  3933.  
    3934. 

  3934.         if($this->externalWSDLURL){
    3935. 

  3935.             die('You cannot bind to an external WSDL file, and register methods outside of it! Please choose either WSDL or no WSDL.');
    3936. 

  3936.         }
    3937. 

  3937.         if (! $name) {
    3938. 

  3938.             die('You must specify a name when you register an operation');
    3939. 

  3939.         }
    3940. 

  3940.         if (!is_array($in)) {
    3941. 

  3941.             die('You must provide an array for operation inputs');
    3942. 

  3942.         }
    3943. 

  3943.         if (!is_array($out)) {
    3944. 

  3944.             die('You must provide an array for operation outputs');
    3945. 

  3945.         }
    3946. 

  3946.         if(false == $namespace) {
    3947. 

  3947.         }
    3948. 

  3948.         if(false == $soapaction) {
    3949. 

  3949.             if (isset($_SERVER)) {
    3950. 

  3950.                 $SERVER_NAME = $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
    3951. 

  3951.                 $SCRIPT_NAME = isset($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) ? $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] : $_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'];
    3952. 

  3952.             } elseif (isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS)) {
    3953. 

  3953.                 $SERVER_NAME = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['SERVER_NAME'];
    3954. 

  3954.                 $SCRIPT_NAME = isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS['PHP_SELF']) ? $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['PHP_SELF'] : $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['SCRIPT_NAME'];
    3955. 

  3955.             } else {
    3956. 

  3956.                 $this->setError("Neither _SERVER nor HTTP_SERVER_VARS is available");
    3957. 

  3957.             }
    3958. 

  3958.             $soapaction = "http://$SERVER_NAME$SCRIPT_NAME/$name";
    3959. 

  3959.         }
    3960. 

  3960.         if(false == $style) {
    3961. 

  3961.             $style = "rpc";
    3962. 

  3962.         }
    3963. 

  3963.         if(false == $use) {
    3964. 

  3964.             $use = "encoded";
    3965. 

  3965.         }
    3966. 

  3966.         if ($use == 'encoded' && $encodingStyle = '') {
    3967. 

  3967.             $encodingStyle = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/';
    3968. 

  3968.         }
    3969. 

  3969.  
    3970. 

  3970.         $this->operations[$name] = array(
    3971. 

  3971.         'name' => $name,
    3972. 

  3972.         'in' => $in,
    3973. 

  3973.         'out' => $out,
    3974. 

  3974.         'namespace' => $namespace,
    3975. 

  3975.         'soapaction' => $soapaction,
    3976. 

  3976.         'style' => $style);
    3977. 

  3977.         if($this->wsdl){
    3978. 

  3978.             $this->wsdl->addOperation($name,$in,$out,$namespace,$soapaction,$style,$use,$documentation,$encodingStyle);
    3979. 

  3979.         }
    3980. 

  3980.         return true;
    3981. 

  3981.     }
    3982. 

  3982.  
    3983. 

  3983.     /**
    3984. 

  3984.     * Specify a fault to be returned to the client.
    3985. 

  3985.     * This also acts as a flag to the server that a fault has occured.
    3986. 

  3986.     *
    3987. 

  3987.     * @param    string $faultcode 
    3988. 

  3988.     * @param    string $faultstring 
    3989. 

  3989.     * @param    string $faultactor 
    3990. 

  3990.     * @param    string $faultdetail 
    3991. 

  3991.     * @access   public
    3992. 

  3992.     */
    3993. 

  3993.     function fault($faultcode,$faultstring,$faultactor='',$faultdetail=''){
    3994. 

  3994.         if ($faultdetail == '' && $this->debug_flag) {
    3995. 

  3995.             $faultdetail = $this->getDebug();
    3996. 

  3996.         }
    3997. 

  3997.         $this->fault = new soap_fault($faultcode,$faultactor,$faultstring,$faultdetail);
    3998. 

  3998.         $this->fault->soap_defencoding = $this->soap_defencoding;
    3999. 

  3999.     }
    4000. 

  4000.  
    4001. 

  4001.     /**
    4002. 

  4002.     * Sets up wsdl object.
    4003. 

  4003.     * Acts as a flag to enable internal WSDL generation
    4004. 

  4004.     *
    4005. 

  4005.     * @param string $serviceName, name of the service
    4006. 

  4006.     * @param mixed $namespace optional 'tns' service namespace or false
    4007. 

  4007.     * @param mixed $endpoint optional URL of service endpoint or false
    4008. 

  4008.     * @param string $style optional (rpc|document) WSDL style (also specified by operation)
    4009. 

  4009.     * @param string $transport optional SOAP transport
    4010. 

  4010.     * @param mixed $schemaTargetNamespace optional 'types' targetNamespace for service schema or false
    4011. 

  4011.     */
    4012. 

  4012.     function configureWSDL($serviceName,$namespace = false,$endpoint = false,$style='rpc', $transport = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http', $schemaTargetNamespace = false)
    4013. 

  4013.     {
    4014. 

  4014.         global $HTTP_SERVER_VARS;
    4015. 

  4015.  
    4016. 

  4016.         if (isset($_SERVER)) {
    4017. 

  4017.             $SERVER_NAME = $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'];
    4018. 

  4018.             $SERVER_PORT = $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
    4019. 

  4019.             $SCRIPT_NAME = isset($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']) ? $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] : $_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'];
    4020. 

  4020.             $HTTPS = $_SERVER['HTTPS'];
    4021. 

  4021.         } elseif (isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS)) {
    4022. 

  4022.             $SERVER_NAME = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['SERVER_NAME'];
    4023. 

  4023.             $SERVER_PORT = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['SERVER_PORT'];
    4024. 

  4024.             $SCRIPT_NAME = isset($HTTP_SERVER_VARS['PHP_SELF']) ? $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['PHP_SELF'] : $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['SCRIPT_NAME'];
    4025. 

  4025.             $HTTPS = $HTTP_SERVER_VARS['HTTPS'];
    4026. 

  4026.         } else {
    4027. 

  4027.             $this->setError("Neither _SERVER nor HTTP_SERVER_VARS is available");
    4028. 

  4028.         }
    4029. 

  4029.         if ($SERVER_PORT == 80) {
    4030. 

  4030.             $SERVER_PORT = '';
    4031. 

  4031.         } else {
    4032. 

  4032.             $SERVER_PORT = ':' . $SERVER_PORT;
    4033. 

  4033.         }
    4034. 

  4034.         if(false == $namespace) {
    4035. 

  4035.             $namespace = "http://$SERVER_NAME/soap/$serviceName";
    4036. 

  4036.         }
    4037. 

  4037.         
    4038. 

  4038.         if(false == $endpoint) {
    4039. 

  4039.             if ($HTTPS == '1' || $HTTPS == 'on') {
    4040. 

  4040.                 $SCHEME = 'https';
    4041. 

  4041.             } else {
    4042. 

  4042.                 $SCHEME = 'http';
    4043. 

  4043.             }
    4044. 

  4044.             $endpoint = "$SCHEME://$SERVER_NAME$SERVER_PORT$SCRIPT_NAME";
    4045. 

  4045.         }
    4046. 

  4046.         
    4047. 

  4047.         if(false == $schemaTargetNamespace) {
    4048. 

  4048.             $schemaTargetNamespace = $namespace;
    4049. 

  4049.         }
    4050. 

  4050.         
    4051. 

  4051.         $this->wsdl = new wsdl;
    4052. 

  4052.         $this->wsdl->serviceName = $serviceName;
