  5223.                     $value['!' . $n] = $v;
    5224. 

  5224.                 }
    5225. 

  5225.                 $this->debug("in serializeType: soapval provides attributes");
    5226. 

  5226.             }
    5227. 

  5227.         } else {
    5228. 

  5228.             $forceType = false;
    5229. 

  5229.         }
    5230. 

  5230.  
    5231. 

  5231.         $xml = '';
    5232. 

  5232.         if (strpos($type, ':')) {
    5233. 

  5233.             $uqType = substr($type, strrpos($type, ':') + 1);
    5234. 

  5234.             $ns = substr($type, 0, strrpos($type, ':'));
    5235. 

  5235.             $this->debug("in serializeType: got a prefixed type: $uqType, $ns");
    5236. 

  5236.             if ($this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($ns)) {
    5237. 

  5237.                 $ns = $this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($ns);
    5238. 

  5238.                 $this->debug("in serializeType: expanded prefixed type: $uqType, $ns");
    5239. 

  5239.             }
    5240. 

  5240.  
    5241. 

  5241.             if($ns == $this->XMLSchemaVersion || $ns == 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/'){
    5242. 

  5242.                 $this->debug('in serializeType: type namespace indicates XML Schema or SOAP Encoding type');
    5243. 

  5243.                 if ($unqualified  && $use == 'literal') {
    5244. 

  5244.                     $elementNS = " xmlns=\"\"";
    5245. 

  5245.                 } else {
    5246. 

  5246.                     $elementNS = '';
    5247. 

  5247.                 }
    5248. 

  5248.                 if (is_null($value)) {
    5249. 

  5249.                     if ($use == 'literal') {
    5250. 

  5250.                         // TODO: depends on minOccurs
    5251. 

  5251.                         $xml = "<$name$elementNS/>";
    5252. 

  5252.                     } else {
    5253. 

  5253.                         // TODO: depends on nillable, which should be checked before calling this method
    5254. 

  5254.                         $xml = "<$name$elementNS xsi:nil=\"true\" xsi:type=\"" . $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns) . ":$uqType\"/>";
    5255. 

  5255.                     }
    5256. 

  5256.                     $this->debug("in serializeType: returning: $xml");
    5257. 

  5257.                     return $xml;
    5258. 

  5258.                 }
    5259. 

  5259.                 if ($uqType == 'boolean') {
    5260. 

  5260.                     if ((is_string($value) && $value == 'false') || (! $value)) {
    5261. 

  5261.                         $value = 'false';
    5262. 

  5262.                     } else {
    5263. 

  5263.                         $value = 'true';
    5264. 

  5264.                     }
    5265. 

  5265.                 } 
    5266. 

  5266.                 if ($uqType == 'string' && gettype($value) == 'string') {
    5267. 

  5267.                     $value = $this->expandEntities($value);
    5268. 

  5268.                 }
    5269. 

  5269.                 if (($uqType == 'long' || $uqType == 'unsignedLong') && gettype($value) == 'double') {
    5270. 

  5270.                     $value = sprintf("%.0lf", $value);
    5271. 

  5271.                 }
    5272. 

  5272.                 // it's a scalar
    5273. 

  5273.                 // TODO: what about null/nil values?
    5274. 

  5274.                 // check type isn't a custom type extending xmlschema namespace
    5275. 

  5275.                 if (!$this->getTypeDef($uqType, $ns)) {
    5276. 

  5276.                     if ($use == 'literal') {
    5277. 

  5277.                         if ($forceType) {
    5278. 

  5278.                             $xml = "<$name$elementNS xsi:type=\"" . $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns) . ":$uqType\">$value</$name>";
    5279. 

  5279.                         } else {
    5280. 

  5280.                             $xml = "<$name$elementNS>$value</$name>";
    5281. 

  5281.                         }
    5282. 

  5282.                     } else {
    5283. 

  5283.                         $xml = "<$name$elementNS xsi:type=\"" . $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns) . ":$uqType\"$encodingStyle>$value</$name>";
    5284. 

  5284.                     }
    5285. 

  5285.                     $this->debug("in serializeType: returning: $xml");
    5286. 

  5286.                     return $xml;
    5287. 

  5287.                 }
    5288. 

  5288.                 $this->debug('custom type extends XML Schema or SOAP Encoding namespace (yuck)');
    5289. 

  5289.             } else if ($ns == 'http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap') {
    5290. 

  5290.                 $this->debug('in serializeType: appears to be Apache SOAP type');
    5291. 

  5291.                 if ($uqType == 'Map') {
    5292. 

  5292.                     $tt_prefix = $this->getPrefixFromNamespace('http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap');
    5293. 

  5293.                     if (! $tt_prefix) {
    5294. 

  5294.                         $this->debug('in serializeType: Add namespace for Apache SOAP type');
    5295. 

  5295.                         $tt_prefix = 'ns' . rand(1000, 9999);
    5296. 

  5296.                         $this->namespaces[$tt_prefix] = 'http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap';
    5297. 

  5297.                         // force this to be added to usedNamespaces
    5298. 

  5298.                         $tt_prefix = $this->getPrefixFromNamespace('http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap');
    5299. 

  5299.                     }
    5300. 

  5300.                     $contents = '';
    5301. 

  5301.                     foreach($value as $k => $v) {
    5302. 

  5302.                         $this->debug("serializing map element: key $k, value $v");
    5303. 

  5303.                         $contents .= '<item>';
    5304. 

  5304.                         $contents .= $this->serialize_val($k,'key',false,false,false,false,$use);
    5305. 

  5305.                         $contents .= $this->serialize_val($v,'value',false,false,false,false,$use);
    5306. 

  5306.                         $contents .= '</item>';
    5307. 

  5307.                     }
    5308. 

  5308.                     if ($use == 'literal') {
    5309. 

  5309.                         if ($forceType) {
    5310. 

  5310.                             $xml = "<$name xsi:type=\"" . $tt_prefix . ":$uqType\">$contents</$name>";
    5311. 

  5311.                         } else {
    5312. 

  5312.                             $xml = "<$name>$contents</$name>";
    5313. 

  5313.                         }
    5314. 

  5314.                     } else {
    5315. 

  5315.                         $xml = "<$name xsi:type=\"" . $tt_prefix . ":$uqType\"$encodingStyle>$contents</$name>";
    5316. 

  5316.                     }
    5317. 

  5317.                     $this->debug("in serializeType: returning: $xml");
    5318. 

  5318.                     return $xml;
    5319. 

  5319.                 }
    5320. 

  5320.                 $this->debug('in serializeType: Apache SOAP type, but only support Map');
    5321. 

  5321.             }
    5322. 

  5322.         } else {
    5323. 

  5323.             // TODO: should the type be compared to types in XSD, and the namespace
    5324. 

  5324.             // set to XSD if the type matches?
    5325. 

  5325.             $this->debug("in serializeType: No namespace for type $type");
    5326. 

  5326.             $ns = '';
    5327. 

  5327.             $uqType = $type;
    5328. 

  5328.         }
    5329. 

  5329.         if(!$typeDef = $this->getTypeDef($uqType, $ns)){
    5330. 

  5330.             $this->setError("$type ($uqType) is not a supported type.");
    5331. 

  5331.             $this->debug("in serializeType: $type ($uqType) is not a supported type.");
    5332. 

  5332.             return false;
    5333. 

  5333.         } else {
    5334. 

  5334.             $this->debug("in serializeType: found typeDef");
    5335. 

  5335.             $this->appendDebug('typeDef=' . $this->varDump($typeDef));
    5336. 

  5336.         }
    5337. 

  5337.         $phpType = $typeDef['phpType'];
    5338. 

  5338.         $this->debug("in serializeType: uqType: $uqType, ns: $ns, phptype: $phpType, arrayType: " . (isset($typeDef['arrayType']) ? $typeDef['arrayType'] : '') ); 
    5339. 

  5339.         // if php type == struct, map value to the <all> element names
    5340. 

  5340.         if ($phpType == 'struct') {
    5341. 

  5341.             if (isset($typeDef['typeClass']) && $typeDef['typeClass'] == 'element') {
    5342. 

  5342.                 $elementName = $uqType;
    5343. 

  5343.                 if (isset($typeDef['form']) && ($typeDef['form'] == 'qualified')) {
    5344. 

  5344.                     $elementNS = " xmlns=\"$ns\"";
    5345. 

  5345.                 } else {
    5346. 

  5346.                     $elementNS = " xmlns=\"\"";
    5347. 

  5347.                 }
    5348. 

  5348.             } else {
    5349. 

  5349.                 $elementName = $name;
    5350. 

  5350.                 if ($unqualified) {
    5351. 

  5351.                     $elementNS = " xmlns=\"\"";
    5352. 

  5352.                 } else {
    5353. 

  5353.                     $elementNS = '';
    5354. 

  5354.                 }
    5355. 

  5355.             }
    5356. 

  5356.             if (is_null($value)) {
    5357. 

  5357.                 if ($use == 'literal') {
    5358. 

  5358.                     // TODO: depends on minOccurs
    5359. 

  5359.                     $xml = "<$elementName$elementNS/>";
    5360. 

  5360.                 } else {
    5361. 

  5361.                     $xml = "<$elementName$elementNS xsi:nil=\"true\" xsi:type=\"" . $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns) . ":$uqType\"/>";
    5362. 

  5362.                 }
    5363. 

  5363.                 $this->debug("in serializeType: returning: $xml");
    5364. 

  5364.                 return $xml;
    5365. 

  5365.             }
    5366. 

  5366.             if (is_object($value)) {
    5367. 

  5367.                 $value = get_object_vars($value);
    5368. 

  5368.             }
    5369. 

  5369.             if (is_array($value)) {
    5370. 

  5370.                 $elementAttrs = $this->serializeComplexTypeAttributes($typeDef, $value, $ns, $uqType);
    5371. 

  5371.                 if ($use == 'literal') {
    5372. 

  5372.                     if ($forceType) {
    5373. 

  5373.                         $xml = "<$elementName$elementNS$elementAttrs xsi:type=\"" . $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns) . ":$uqType\">";
    5374. 

  5374.                     } else {
    5375. 

  5375.                         $xml = "<$elementName$elementNS$elementAttrs>";
    5376. 

  5376.                     }
    5377. 

  5377.                 } else {
    5378. 

  5378.                     $xml = "<$elementName$elementNS$elementAttrs xsi:type=\"" . $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns) . ":$uqType\"$encodingStyle>";
    5379. 

  5379.                 }
    5380. 

  5380.     
    5381. 

  5381.                 $xml .= $this->serializeComplexTypeElements($typeDef, $value, $ns, $uqType, $use, $encodingStyle);
    5382. 

  5382.                 $xml .= "</$elementName>";
    5383. 

  5383.             } else {
    5384. 

  5384.                 $this->debug("in serializeType: phpType is struct, but value is not an array");
    5385. 

  5385.                 $this->setError("phpType is struct, but value is not an array: see debug output for details");
    5386. 

  5386.                 $xml = '';
    5387. 

  5387.             }
    5388. 

  5388.         } elseif ($phpType == 'array') {
    5389. 

  5389.             if (isset($typeDef['form']) && ($typeDef['form'] == 'qualified')) {
    5390. 

  5390.                 $elementNS = " xmlns=\"$ns\"";
    5391. 

  5391.             } else {
    5392. 

  5392.                 if ($unqualified) {
    5393. 

  5393.                     $elementNS = " xmlns=\"\"";
    5394. 

  5394.                 } else {
    5395. 

  5395.                     $elementNS = '';
    5396. 

  5396.                 }
    5397. 

  5397.             }
    5398. 

  5398.             if (is_null($value)) {
    5399. 

  5399.                 if ($use == 'literal') {
    5400. 

  5400.                     // TODO: depends on minOccurs
    5401. 

  5401.                     $xml = "<$name$elementNS/>";
    5402. 

  5402.                 } else {
    5403. 

  5403.                     $xml = "<$name$elementNS xsi:nil=\"true\" xsi:type=\"" .
    5404. 

  5404.                         $this->getPrefixFromNamespace('http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/') .
    5405. 

  5405.                         ":Array\" " .
    5406. 

  5406.                         $this->getPrefixFromNamespace('http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/') .
    5407. 

  5407.                         ':arrayType="' .
    5408. 

  5408.                         $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($this->getPrefix($typeDef['arrayType'])) .
    5409. 

  5409.                         ':' .
    5410. 

  5410.                         $this->getLocalPart($typeDef['arrayType'])."[0]\"/>";
    5411. 

  5411.                 }
    5412. 

  5412.                 $this->debug("in serializeType: returning: $xml");
    5413. 

  5413.                 return $xml;
    5414. 

  5414.             }
    5415. 

  5415.             if (isset($typeDef['multidimensional'])) {
    5416. 

  5416.                 $nv = array();
    5417. 

  5417.                 foreach($value as $v) {
    5418. 

  5418.                     $cols = ',' . sizeof($v);
    5419. 

  5419.                     $nv = array_merge($nv, $v);
    5420. 

  5420.                 } 
    5421. 

  5421.                 $value = $nv;
    5422. 

  5422.             } else {
    5423. 

  5423.                 $cols = '';
    5424. 

  5424.             } 
    5425. 

  5425.             if (is_array($value) && sizeof($value) >= 1) {
    5426. 

  5426.                 $rows = sizeof($value);
    5427. 

  5427.                 $contents = '';
    5428. 

  5428.                 foreach($value as $k => $v) {
    5429. 

  5429.                     $this->debug("serializing array element: $k, $v of type: $typeDef[arrayType]");
    5430. 

  5430.                     //if (strpos($typeDef['arrayType'], ':') ) {
    5431. 

  5431.                     if (!in_array($typeDef['arrayType'],$this->typemap['http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'])) {
    5432. 

  5432.                         $contents .= $this->serializeType('item', $typeDef['arrayType'], $v, $use);
    5433. 

  5433.                     } else {
    5434. 

  5434.                         $contents .= $this->serialize_val($v, 'item', $typeDef['arrayType'], null, $this->XMLSchemaVersion, false, $use);
    5435. 

  5435.                     } 
    5436. 

  5436.                 }
    5437. 

  5437.             } else {
    5438. 

  5438.                 $rows = 0;
    5439. 

  5439.                 $contents = null;
    5440. 

  5440.             }
    5441. 

  5441.             // TODO: for now, an empty value will be serialized as a zero element
    5442. 

  5442.             // array.  Revisit this when coding the handling of null/nil values.
    5443. 

  5443.             if ($use == 'literal') {
    5444. 

  5444.                 $xml = "<$name$elementNS>"
    5445. 

  5445.                     .$contents
    5446. 

  5446.                     ."</$name>";
    5447. 

  5447.             } else {
    5448. 

  5448.                 $xml = "<$name$elementNS xsi:type=\"".$this->getPrefixFromNamespace('http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/').':Array" '.
    5449. 

  5449.                     $this->getPrefixFromNamespace('http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/')
    5450. 

  5450.                     .':arrayType="'
    5451. 

  5451.                     .$this->getPrefixFromNamespace($this->getPrefix($typeDef['arrayType']))
    5452. 

  5452.                     .":".$this->getLocalPart($typeDef['arrayType'])."[$rows$cols]\">"
    5453. 

  5453.                     .$contents
    5454. 

  5454.                     ."</$name>";
    5455. 

  5455.             }
    5456. 

  5456.         } elseif ($phpType == 'scalar') {
    5457. 

  5457.             if (isset($typeDef['form']) && ($typeDef['form'] == 'qualified')) {
    5458. 

  5458.                 $elementNS = " xmlns=\"$ns\"";
    5459. 

  5459.             } else {
    5460. 

  5460.                 if ($unqualified) {
    5461. 

  5461.                     $elementNS = " xmlns=\"\"";
    5462. 

  5462.                 } else {
    5463. 

  5463.                     $elementNS = '';
    5464. 

  5464.                 }
    5465. 

  5465.             }
    5466. 

  5466.             if ($use == 'literal') {
    5467. 

  5467.                 if ($forceType) {
    5468. 

  5468.                     $xml = "<$name$elementNS xsi:type=\"" . $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns) . ":$uqType\">$value</$name>";
    5469. 

  5469.                 } else {
    5470. 

  5470.                     $xml = "<$name$elementNS>$value</$name>";
    5471. 

  5471.                 }
    5472. 

  5472.             } else {
    5473. 

  5473.                 $xml = "<$name$elementNS xsi:type=\"" . $this->getPrefixFromNamespace($ns) . ":$uqType\"$encodingStyle>$value</$name>";
    5474. 

  5474.             }
    5475. 

  5475.         }
    5476. 

  5476.         $this->debug("in serializeType: returning: $xml");
    5477. 

  5477.         return $xml;
    5478. 

  5478.     }
    5479. 

  5479.     
    5480. 

  5480.     /**
    5481. 

  5481.      * serializes the attributes for a complexType
    5482. 

  5482.      *
    5483. 

  5483.      * @param array $typeDef our internal representation of an XML schema type (or element)
    5484. 

  5484.      * @param mixed $value a native PHP value (parameter value)
    5485. 

  5485.      * @param string $ns the namespace of the type
    5486. 

  5486.      * @param string $uqType the local part of the type
    5487. 

  5487.      * @return string value serialized as an XML string
    5488. 

  5488.      * @access private
    5489. 

  5489.      */
    5490. 

  5490.     function serializeComplexTypeAttributes($typeDef, $value, $ns, $uqType) {
    5491. 

  5491.         $xml = '';
    5492. 

  5492.         if (isset($typeDef['attrs']) && is_array($typeDef['attrs'])) {
    5493. 

  5493.             $this->debug("serialize attributes for XML Schema type $ns:$uqType");
    5494. 

  5494.             if (is_array($value)) {
    5495. 

  5495.                 $xvalue = $value;
    5496. 

  5496.             } elseif (is_object($value)) {
    5497. 

  5497.                 $xvalue = get_object_vars($value);
    5498. 

  5498.             } else {
    5499. 

  5499.                 $this->debug("value is neither an array nor an object for XML Schema type $ns:$uqType");
    5500. 

  5500.                 $xvalue = array();
    5501. 

  5501.             }
    5502. 

  5502.             foreach ($typeDef['attrs'] as $aName => $attrs) {
    5503. 

  5503.                 if (isset($xvalue['!' . $aName])) {
    5504. 

  5504.                     $xname = '!' . $aName;
    5505. 

  5505.                     $this->debug("value provided for attribute $aName with key $xname");
    5506. 

  5506.                 } elseif (isset($xvalue[$aName])) {
    5507. 

  5507.                     $xname = $aName;
    5508. 

  5508.                     $this->debug("value provided for attribute $aName with key $xname");
    5509. 

  5509.                 } elseif (isset($attrs['default'])) {
    5510. 

  5510.                     $xname = '!' . $aName;
    5511. 

  5511.                     $xvalue[$xname] = $attrs['default'];
    5512. 

  5512.                     $this->debug('use default value of ' . $xvalue[$aName] . ' for attribute ' . $aName);
    5513. 

  5513.                 } else {
    5514. 

  5514.                     $xname = '';
    5515. 

  5515.                     $this->debug("no value provided for attribute $aName");
    5516. 

  5516.                 }
    5517. 

  5517.                 if ($xname) {
    5518. 

  5518.                     $xml .=  " $aName=\"" . $this->expandEntities($xvalue[$xname]) . "\"";
    5519. 

  5519.                 }
    5520. 

  5520.             } 
    5521. 

  5521.         } else {
    5522. 

  5522.             $this->debug("no attributes to serialize for XML Schema type $ns:$uqType");
    5523. 

  5523.         }
    5524. 

  5524.         if (isset($typeDef['extensionBase'])) {
    5525. 

  5525.             $ns = $this->getPrefix($typeDef['extensionBase']);
    5526. 

  5526.             $uqType = $this->getLocalPart($typeDef['extensionBase']);
    5527. 

  5527.             if ($this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($ns)) {
    5528. 

  5528.                 $ns = $this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($ns);
    5529. 

  5529.             }
    5530. 

  5530.             if ($typeDef = $this->getTypeDef($uqType, $ns)) {
    5531. 

  5531.                 $this->debug("serialize attributes for extension base $ns:$uqType");
    5532. 

  5532.                 $xml .= $this->serializeComplexTypeAttributes($typeDef, $value, $ns, $uqType);
    5533. 

  5533.             } else {
    5534. 

  5534.                 $this->debug("extension base $ns:$uqType is not a supported type");
    5535. 

  5535.             }
    5536. 

  5536.         }
    5537. 

  5537.         return $xml;
    5538. 

  5538.     }
    5539. 

  5539.  
    5540. 

  5540.     /**
    5541. 

  5541.      * serializes the elements for a complexType
    5542. 

  5542.      *
    5543. 

  5543.      * @param array $typeDef our internal representation of an XML schema type (or element)
    5544. 

  5544.      * @param mixed $value a native PHP value (parameter value)
    5545. 

  5545.      * @param string $ns the namespace of the type
    5546. 

  5546.      * @param string $uqType the local part of the type
    5547. 

  5547.      * @param string $use use for part (encoded|literal)
    5548. 

  5548.      * @param string $encodingStyle SOAP encoding style for the value (if different than the enclosing style)
    5549. 

  5549.      * @return string value serialized as an XML string
    5550. 

  5550.      * @access private
    5551. 

  5551.      */
    5552. 

  5552.     function serializeComplexTypeElements($typeDef, $value, $ns, $uqType, $use='encoded', $encodingStyle=false) {
    5553. 

  5553.         $xml = '';
    5554. 

  5554.         if (isset($typeDef['elements']) && is_array($typeDef['elements'])) {
    5555. 

  5555.             $this->debug("in serializeComplexTypeElements, serialize elements for XML Schema type $ns:$uqType");
    5556. 

  5556.             if (is_array($value)) {
    5557. 

  5557.                 $xvalue = $value;
    5558. 

  5558.             } elseif (is_object($value)) {
    5559. 

  5559.                 $xvalue = get_object_vars($value);
    5560. 

  5560.             } else {
    5561. 

  5561.                 $this->debug("value is neither an array nor an object for XML Schema type $ns:$uqType");
    5562. 

  5562.                 $xvalue = array();
    5563. 

  5563.             }
    5564. 

  5564.             // toggle whether all elements are present - ideally should validate against schema
    5565. 

  5565.             if (count($typeDef['elements']) != count($xvalue)){
    5566. 

  5566.                 $optionals = true;
    5567. 

  5567.             }
    5568. 

  5568.             foreach ($typeDef['elements'] as $eName => $attrs) {
    5569. 

  5569.                 if (!isset($xvalue[$eName])) {
    5570. 

  5570.                     if (isset($attrs['default'])) {
    5571. 

  5571.                         $xvalue[$eName] = $attrs['default'];
    5572. 

  5572.                         $this->debug('use default value of ' . $xvalue[$eName] . ' for element ' . $eName);
    5573. 

  5573.                     }
    5574. 

  5574.                 }
    5575. 

  5575.                 // if user took advantage of a minOccurs=0, then only serialize named parameters
    5576. 

  5576.                 if (isset($optionals)
    5577. 

  5577.                     && (!isset($xvalue[$eName])) 
    5578. 

  5578.                     && ( (!isset($attrs['nillable'])) || $attrs['nillable'] != 'true')
    5579. 

  5579.                     ){
    5580. 

  5580.                     if (isset($attrs['minOccurs']) && $attrs['minOccurs'] <> '0') {
    5581. 

  5581.                         $this->debug("apparent error: no value provided for element $eName with minOccurs=" . $attrs['minOccurs']);
    5582. 

  5582.                     }
    5583. 

  5583.                     // do nothing
    5584. 

  5584.                     $this->debug("no value provided for complexType element $eName and element is not nillable, so serialize nothing");
    5585. 

  5585.                 } else {
    5586. 

  5586.                     // get value
    5587. 

  5587.                     if (isset($xvalue[$eName])) {
    5588. 

  5588.                         $v = $xvalue[$eName];
    5589. 

  5589.                     } else {
    5590. 

  5590.                         $v = null;
    5591. 

  5591.                     }
    5592. 

  5592.                     if (isset($attrs['form'])) {
    5593. 

  5593.                         $unqualified = ($attrs['form'] == 'unqualified');
    5594. 

  5594.                     } else {
    5595. 

  5595.                         $unqualified = false;
    5596. 

  5596.                     }
    5597. 

  5597.                     if (isset($attrs['maxOccurs']) && ($attrs['maxOccurs'] == 'unbounded' || $attrs['maxOccurs'] > 1) && isset($v) && is_array($v) && $this->isArraySimpleOrStruct($v) == 'arraySimple') {
    5598. 

  5598.                         $vv = $v;
    5599. 

  5599.                         foreach ($vv as $k => $v) {
    5600. 

  5600.                             if (isset($attrs['type']) || isset($attrs['ref'])) {
    5601. 

  5601.                                 // serialize schema-defined type
    5602. 

  5602.                                 $xml .= $this->serializeType($eName, isset($attrs['type']) ? $attrs['type'] : $attrs['ref'], $v, $use, $encodingStyle, $unqualified);
    5603. 

  5603.                             } else {
    5604. 

  5604.                                 // serialize generic type (can this ever really happen?)
    5605. 

  5605.                                 $this->debug("calling serialize_val() for $v, $eName, false, false, false, false, $use");
    5606. 

  5606.                                 $xml .= $this->serialize_val($v, $eName, false, false, false, false, $use);
    5607. 

  5607.                             }
    5608. 

  5608.                         }
    5609. 

  5609.                     } else {
    5610. 

  5610.                         if (isset($attrs['type']) || isset($attrs['ref'])) {
    5611. 

  5611.                             // serialize schema-defined type
    5612. 

  5612.                             $xml .= $this->serializeType($eName, isset($attrs['type']) ? $attrs['type'] : $attrs['ref'], $v, $use, $encodingStyle, $unqualified);
    5613. 

  5613.                         } else {
    5614. 

  5614.                             // serialize generic type (can this ever really happen?)
    5615. 

  5615.                             $this->debug("calling serialize_val() for $v, $eName, false, false, false, false, $use");
    5616. 

  5616.                             $xml .= $this->serialize_val($v, $eName, false, false, false, false, $use);
    5617. 

  5617.                         }
    5618. 

  5618.                     }
    5619. 

  5619.                 }
    5620. 

  5620.             } 
    5621. 

  5621.         } else {
    5622. 

  5622.             $this->debug("no elements to serialize for XML Schema type $ns:$uqType");
    5623. 

  5623.         }
    5624. 

  5624.         if (isset($typeDef['extensionBase'])) {
    5625. 

  5625.             $ns = $this->getPrefix($typeDef['extensionBase']);
    5626. 

  5626.             $uqType = $this->getLocalPart($typeDef['extensionBase']);
    5627. 

  5627.             if ($this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($ns)) {
    5628. 

  5628.                 $ns = $this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($ns);
    5629. 

  5629.             }
    5630. 

  5630.             if ($typeDef = $this->getTypeDef($uqType, $ns)) {
    5631. 

  5631.                 $this->debug("serialize elements for extension base $ns:$uqType");
    5632. 

  5632.                 $xml .= $this->serializeComplexTypeElements($typeDef, $value, $ns, $uqType, $use, $encodingStyle);
    5633. 

  5633.             } else {
    5634. 

  5634.                 $this->debug("extension base $ns:$uqType is not a supported type");
    5635. 

  5635.             }
    5636. 

  5636.         }
    5637. 

  5637.         return $xml;
    5638. 

  5638.     }
    5639. 

  5639.  
    5640. 

  5640.     /**
    5641. 

  5641.     * adds an XML Schema complex type to the WSDL types
    5642. 

  5642.     *
    5643. 

  5643.     * @param string    name
    5644. 

  5644.     * @param string typeClass (complexType|simpleType|attribute)
    5645. 

  5645.     * @param string phpType: currently supported are array and struct (php assoc array)
    5646. 

  5646.     * @param string compositor (all|sequence|choice)
    5647. 

  5647.     * @param string restrictionBase namespace:name (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/:Array)
    5648. 

  5648.     * @param array elements = array ( name => array(name=>'',type=>'') )
    5649. 

  5649.     * @param array attrs =     array(array('ref'=>'SOAP-ENC:arrayType','wsdl:arrayType'=>'xsd:string[]'))
    5650. 

  5650.     * @param string arrayType: namespace:name (xsd:string)
    5651. 

  5651.     * @see xmlschema
    5652. 

  5652.     * @access public
    5653. 

  5653.     */
    5654. 

  5654.     function addComplexType($name,$typeClass='complexType',$phpType='array',$compositor='',$restrictionBase='',$elements=array(),$attrs=array(),$arrayType='') {
    5655. 

  5655.         if (count($elements) > 0) {
    5656. 

  5656.             foreach($elements as $n => $e){
    5657. 

  5657.                 // expand each element
    5658. 

  5658.                 foreach ($e as $k => $v) {
    5659. 

  5659.                     $k = strpos($k,':') ? $this->expandQname($k) : $k;
    5660. 

  5660.                     $v = strpos($v,':') ? $this->expandQname($v) : $v;
    5661. 

  5661.                     $ee[$k] = $v;
    5662. 

  5662.                 }
    5663. 

  5663.                 $eElements[$n] = $ee;
    5664. 

  5664.             }
    5665. 

  5665.             $elements = $eElements;
    5666. 

  5666.         }
    5667. 

  5667.         
    5668. 

  5668.         if (count($attrs) > 0) {
    5669. 

  5669.             foreach($attrs as $n => $a){
    5670. 

  5670.                 // expand each attribute
    5671. 

  5671.                 foreach ($a as $k => $v) {
    5672. 

  5672.                     $k = strpos($k,':') ? $this->expandQname($k) : $k;
    5673. 

  5673.                     $v = strpos($v,':') ? $this->expandQname($v) : $v;
    5674. 

  5674.                     $aa[$k] = $v;
    5675. 

  5675.                 }
    5676. 

  5676.                 $eAttrs[$n] = $aa;
    5677. 

  5677.             }
    5678. 

  5678.             $attrs = $eAttrs;
    5679. 

  5679.         }
    5680. 

  5680.  
    5681. 

  5681.         $restrictionBase = strpos($restrictionBase,':') ? $this->expandQname($restrictionBase) : $restrictionBase;
    5682. 

  5682.         $arrayType = strpos($arrayType,':') ? $this->expandQname($arrayType) : $arrayType;
    5683. 

  5683.  
    5684. 

  5684.         $typens = isset($this->namespaces['types']) ? $this->namespaces['types'] : $this->namespaces['tns'];
    5685. 

  5685.         $this->schemas[$typens][0]->addComplexType($name,$typeClass,$phpType,$compositor,$restrictionBase,$elements,$attrs,$arrayType);
    5686. 

  5686.     }
    5687. 

  5687.  
    5688. 

  5688.     /**
    5689. 

  5689.     * adds an XML Schema simple type to the WSDL types
    5690. 

  5690.     *
    5691. 

  5691.     * @param string $name 
    5692. 

  5692.     * @param string $restrictionBase namespace:name (http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/:Array)
    5693. 

  5693.     * @param string $typeClass (should always be simpleType)
    5694. 

  5694.     * @param string $phpType (should always be scalar)
    5695. 

  5695.     * @param array $enumeration array of values
    5696. 

  5696.     * @see xmlschema
    5697. 

  5697.     * @access public
    5698. 

  5698.     */
    5699. 

  5699.     function addSimpleType($name, $restrictionBase='', $typeClass='simpleType', $phpType='scalar', $enumeration=array()) {
    5700. 

  5700.         $restrictionBase = strpos($restrictionBase,':') ? $this->expandQname($restrictionBase) : $restrictionBase;
    5701. 

  5701.  
    5702. 

  5702.         $typens = isset($this->namespaces['types']) ? $this->namespaces['types'] : $this->namespaces['tns'];
    5703. 

  5703.         $this->schemas[$typens][0]->addSimpleType($name, $restrictionBase, $typeClass, $phpType, $enumeration);
    5704. 

  5704.     }
    5705. 

  5705.  
    5706. 

  5706.     /**
    5707. 

  5707.     * adds an element to the WSDL types
    5708. 

  5708.     *
    5709. 

  5709.     * @param array $attrs attributes that must include name and type
    5710. 

  5710.     * @see xmlschema
    5711. 

  5711.     * @access public
    5712. 

  5712.     */
    5713. 

  5713.     function addElement($attrs) {
    5714. 

  5714.         $typens = isset($this->namespaces['types']) ? $this->namespaces['types'] : $this->namespaces['tns'];
    5715. 

  5715.         $this->schemas[$typens][0]->addElement($attrs);
    5716. 

  5716.     }
    5717. 

  5717.  
    5718. 

  5718.     /**
    5719. 

  5719.     * register an operation with the server
    5720. 

  5720.     * 
    5721. 

  5721.     * @param string $name operation (method) name
    5722. 

  5722.     * @param array $in assoc array of input values: key = param name, value = param type
    5723. 

  5723.     * @param array $out assoc array of output values: key = param name, value = param type
    5724. 

  5724.     * @param string $namespace optional The namespace for the operation
    5725. 

  5725.     * @param string $soapaction optional The soapaction for the operation
    5726. 

  5726.     * @param string $style (rpc|document) optional The style for the operation Note: when 'document' is specified, parameter and return wrappers are created for you automatically
    5727. 

  5727.     * @param string $use (encoded|literal) optional The use for the parameters (cannot mix right now)
    5728. 

  5728.     * @param string $documentation optional The description to include in the WSDL
    5729. 

  5729.     * @param string $encodingStyle optional (usually 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/' for encoded)
    5730. 

  5730.     * @access public
    5731. 

  5731.     */
    5732. 

  5732.     function addOperation($name, $in = false, $out = false, $namespace = false, $soapaction = false, $style = 'rpc', $use = 'encoded', $documentation = '', $encodingStyle = ''){
    5733. 

  5733.         if ($use == 'encoded' && $encodingStyle == '') {
    5734. 

  5734.             $encodingStyle = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/';
    5735. 

  5735.         }
    5736. 

  5736.  
    5737. 

  5737.         if ($style == 'document') {
    5738. 

  5738.             $elements = array();
    5739. 

  5739.             foreach ($in as $n => $t) {
    5740. 

  5740.                 $elements[$n] = array('name' => $n, 'type' => $t);
    5741. 

  5741.             }
    5742. 

  5742.             $this->addComplexType($name . 'RequestType', 'complexType', 'struct', 'all', '', $elements);
    5743. 

  5743.             $this->addElement(array('name' => $name, 'type' => $name . 'RequestType'));
    5744. 

  5744.             $in = array('parameters' => 'tns:' . $name);
    5745. 

  5745.  
    5746. 

  5746.             $elements = array();
    5747. 

  5747.             foreach ($out as $n => $t) {
    5748. 

  5748.                 $elements[$n] = array('name' => $n, 'type' => $t);
    5749. 

  5749.             }
    5750. 

  5750.             $this->addComplexType($name . 'ResponseType', 'complexType', 'struct', 'all', '', $elements);
    5751. 

  5751.             $this->addElement(array('name' => $name . 'Response', 'type' => $name . 'ResponseType'));
    5752. 

  5752.             $out = array('parameters' => 'tns:' . $name . 'Response');
    5753. 

  5753.         }
    5754. 

  5754.  
    5755. 

  5755.         // get binding
    5756. 

  5756.         $this->bindings[ $this->serviceName . 'Binding' ]['operations'][$name] =
    5757. 

  5757.         array(
    5758. 

  5758.         'name' => $name,
    5759. 

  5759.         'binding' => $this->serviceName . 'Binding',
    5760. 

  5760.         'endpoint' => $this->endpoint,
    5761. 

  5761.         'soapAction' => $soapaction,
    5762. 

  5762.         'style' => $style,
    5763. 

  5763.         'input' => array(
    5764. 

  5764.             'use' => $use,
    5765. 

  5765.             'namespace' => $namespace,
    5766. 

  5766.             'encodingStyle' => $encodingStyle,
    5767. 

  5767.             'message' => $name . 'Request',
    5768. 

  5768.             'parts' => $in),
    5769. 

  5769.         'output' => array(
    5770. 

  5770.             'use' => $use,
    5771. 

  5771.             'namespace' => $namespace,
    5772. 

  5772.             'encodingStyle' => $encodingStyle,
    5773. 

  5773.             'message' => $name . 'Response',
    5774. 

  5774.             'parts' => $out),
    5775. 

  5775.         'namespace' => $namespace,
    5776. 

  5776.         'transport' => 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http',
    5777. 

  5777.         'documentation' => $documentation); 
    5778. 

  5778.         // add portTypes
    5779. 

  5779.         // add messages
    5780. 

  5780.         if($in)
    5781. 

  5781.         {
    5782. 

  5782.             foreach($in as $pName => $pType)
    5783. 

  5783.             {
    5784. 

  5784.                 if(strpos($pType,':')) {
    5785. 

  5785.                     $pType = $this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($this->getPrefix($pType)).":".$this->getLocalPart($pType);
    5786. 

  5786.                 }
    5787. 

  5787.                 $this->messages[$name.'Request'][$pName] = $pType;
    5788. 

  5788.             }
    5789. 

  5789.         } else {
    5790. 

  5790.             $this->messages[$name.'Request']= '0';
    5791. 

  5791.         }
    5792. 

  5792.         if($out)
    5793. 

  5793.         {
    5794. 

  5794.             foreach($out as $pName => $pType)
    5795. 

  5795.             {
    5796. 

  5796.                 if(strpos($pType,':')) {
    5797. 

  5797.                     $pType = $this->getNamespaceFromPrefix($this->getPrefix($pType)).":".$this->getLocalPart($pType);
    5798. 

  5798.                 }
    5799. 

  5799.                 $this->messages[$name.'Response'][$pName] = $pType;
    5800. 

  5800.             }
    5801. 

  5801.         } else {
    5802. 

  5802.             $this->messages[$name.'Response']= '0';
    5803. 

  5803.         }
    5804. 

  5804.         return true;
    5805. 

  5805.     } 
    5806. 

  5806. }
    5807. 

  5807. ?><?php
    5808. 

  5808.  
    5809. 

  5809.  
    5810. 

  5810.  
    5811. 

  5811. /**
    5812. 

  5812. *
    5813. 

  5813. * soap_parser class parses SOAP XML messages into native PHP values
    5814. 

  5814. *
    5815. 

  5815. * @author   Dietrich Ayala <dietrich@ganx4.com>
    5816. 

  5816. * @version  $Id: nusoap.php,v 1.94 2005/08/04 01:27:42 snichol Exp $
    5817. 

  5817. * @access   public
    5818. 

  5818. */
    5819. 

  5819. class soap_parser extends nusoap_base {
    5820. 

  5820.  
    5821. 

  5821.     var $xml = '';
    5822. 

  5822.     var $xml_encoding = '';
    5823. 

  5823.     var $method = '';
    5824. 

  5824.     var $root_struct = '';
    5825. 

  5825.     var $root_struct_name = '';
    5826. 

  5826.     var $root_struct_namespace = '';
    5827. 

  5827.     var $root_header = '';
    5828. 

  5828.     var $document = '';            // incoming SOAP body (text)
    5829. 

  5829.     // determines where in the message we are (envelope,header,body,method)
    5830. 

  5830.     
    5831. 

  5831.     var $status = '';
    5832. 

  5832.     var $position = 0;
    5833. 

  5833.     var $depth = 0;
    5834. 

  5834.     var $default_namespace = '';
    5835. 

  5835.     var $namespaces = array();
    5836. 

  5836.     var $message = array();
    5837. 

  5837.     var $parent = '';
    5838. 

  5838.     var $fault = false;
    5839. 

  5839.     var $fault_code = '';
    5840. 

  5840.     var $fault_str = '';
    5841. 

  5841.     var $fault_detail = '';
    5842. 

  5842.     var $depth_array = array();
    5843. 

  5843.     var $debug_flag = true;
    5844. 

  5844.     var $soapresponse = NULL;
    5845. 

  5845.     var $responseHeaders = '';    // incoming SOAP headers (text)
    5846. 

  5846.     
    5847. 

  5847.     var $body_position = 0;
    5848. 

  5848.     // for multiref parsing:
    5849. 

  5849.     // array of id => pos
    5850. 

  5850.     
    5851. 

  5851.     var $ids = array();
    5852. 

  5852.     // array of id => hrefs => pos
    5853. 

  5853.     
    5854. 

  5854.     var $multirefs = array();
    5855. 

  5855.     // toggle for auto-decoding element content
    5856. 

  5856.     
    5857. 

  5857.     var $decode_utf8 = true;
    5858. 

  5858.  
    5859. 

  5859.     /**
    5860. 

  5860.     * constructor that actually does the parsing
    5861. 

  5861.     *
    5862. 

  5862.     * @param    string $xml SOAP message
    5863. 

  5863.     * @param    string $encoding character encoding scheme of message
    5864. 

  5864.     * @param    string $method method for which XML is parsed (unused?)
    5865. 

  5865.     * @param    string $decode_utf8 whether to decode UTF-8 to ISO-8859-1
    5866. 

  5866.     * @access   public
    5867. 

  5867.     */
    5868. 

  5868.     function soap_parser($xml,$encoding='UTF-8',$method='',$decode_utf8=true){
    5869. 

  5869.         parent::nusoap_base();
    5870. 

  5870.         $this->xml = $xml;
    5871. 

  5871.         $this->xml_encoding = $encoding;
    5872. 

  5872.         $this->method = $method;
    5873. 

  5873.         $this->decode_utf8 = $decode_utf8;
    5874. 

  5874.  
    5875. 

  5875.         // Check whether content has been read.
    5876. 

  5876.         if(!empty($xml)){
    5877. 

  5877.             // Check XML encoding
    5878. 

  5878.             $pos_xml = strpos($xml, '<?xml');
    5879. 

  5879.             if ($pos_xml !== FALSE) {
    5880. 

  5880.                 $xml_decl = substr($xml, $pos_xml, strpos($xml, '?>', $pos_xml + 2) - $pos_xml + 1);
    5881. 

  5881.                 if (preg_match("/encoding=[\"']([^\"']*)[\"']/", $xml_decl, $res)) {
    5882. 

  5882.                     $xml_encoding = $res[1];
    5883. 

  5883.                     if (strtoupper($xml_encoding) != $encoding) {
    5884. 

  5884.                         $err = "Charset from HTTP Content-Type '" . $encoding . "' does not match encoding from XML declaration '" . $xml_encoding . "'";
    5885. 

  5885.                         $this->debug($err);
    5886. 

  5886.                         if ($encoding != 'ISO-8859-1' || strtoupper($xml_encoding) != 'UTF-8') {
    5887. 

  5887.                             $this->setError($err);
    5888. 

  5888.                             return;
    5889. 

  5889.                         }
    5890. 

  5890.                         // when HTTP says ISO-8859-1 (the default) and XML says UTF-8 (the typical), assume the other endpoint is just sloppy and proceed
    5891. 

  5891.                     } else {
    5892. 

  5892.                         $this->debug('Charset from HTTP Content-Type matches encoding from XML declaration');
    5893. 

  5893.                     }
    5894. 

  5894.                 } else {
    5895. 

  5895.                     $this->debug('No encoding specified in XML declaration');
    5896. 

  5896.                 }
    5897. 

  5897.             } else {
    5898. 

  5898.                 $this->debug('No XML declaration');
    5899. 

  5899.             }
    5900. 

  5900.             $this->debug('Entering soap_parser(), length='.strlen($xml).', encoding='.$encoding);
    5901. 

  5901.             // Create an XML parser - why not xml_parser_create_ns?
    5902. 

  5902.             $this->parser = xml_parser_create($this->xml_encoding);
    5903. 

  5903.             // Set the options for parsing the XML data.
    5904. 

  5904.             //xml_parser_set_option($parser, XML_OPTION_SKIP_WHITE, 1);
    5905. 

  5905.             xml_parser_set_option($this->parser, XML_OPTION_CASE_FOLDING, 0);
    5906. 

  5906.             xml_parser_set_option($this->parser, XML_OPTION_TARGET_ENCODING, $this->xml_encoding);
    5907. 

  5907.             // Set the object for the parser.
    5908. 

  5908.             xml_set_object($this->parser, $this);
    5909. 

  5909.             // Set the element handlers for the parser.
    5910. 

  5910.             xml_set_element_handler($this->parser, 'start_element','end_element');
    5911. 

  5911.             xml_set_character_data_handler($this->parser,'character_data');
    5912. 

  5912.  
    5913. 

  5913.             // Parse the XML file.
    5914. 

  5914.             if(!xml_parse($this->parser,$xml,true)){
    5915. 

  5915.                 // Display an error message.
    5916. 

  5916.                 $err = sprintf('XML error parsing SOAP payload on line %d: %s',
    5917. 

  5917.                 xml_get_current_line_number($this->parser),
    5918. 

  5918.                 xml_error_string(xml_get_error_code($this->parser)));
    5919. 

  5919.                 $this->debug($err);
    5920. 

  5920.                 $this->debug("XML payload:\n" . $xml);
    5921. 

  5921.                 $this->setError($err);
    5922. 

  5922.             } else {
    5923. 

  5923.                 $this->debug('parsed successfully, found root struct: '.$this->root_struct.' of name '.$this->root_struct_name);
    5924. 

  5924.                 // get final value
    5925. 

  5925.                 $this->soapresponse = $this->message[$this->root_struct]['result'];
    5926. 

  5926.                 // get header value: no, because this is documented as XML string
    5927. 

  5927. //                if($this->root_header != '' && isset($this->message[$this->root_header]['result'])){
    5928. 

  5928. //                    $this->responseHeaders = $this->message[$this->root_header]['result'];
    5929. 

  5929. //                }
    5930. 

  5930.                 // resolve hrefs/ids
    5931. 

  5931.                 if(sizeof($this->multirefs) > 0){
    5932. 

  5932.                     foreach($this->multirefs as $id => $hrefs){
    5933. 

  5933.                         $this->debug('resolving multirefs for id: '.$id);
    5934. 

  5934.                         $idVal = $this->buildVal($this->ids[$id]);
    5935. 

  5935.                         if (is_array($idVal) && isset($idVal['!id'])) {
    5936. 

  5936.                             unset($idVal['!id']);
    5937. 

  5937.                         }
    5938. 

  5938.                         foreach($hrefs as $refPos => $ref){
    5939. 

  5939.                             $this->debug('resolving href at pos '.$refPos);
    5940. 

  5940.                             $this->multirefs[$id][$refPos] = $idVal;
    5941. 

  5941.                         }
    5942. 

  5942.                     }
    5943. 

  5943.                 }
    5944. 

  5944.             }
    5945. 

  5945.             xml_parser_free($this->parser);
    5946. 

  5946.         } else {
    5947. 

  5947.             $this->debug('xml was empty, didn\'t parse!');
    5948. 

  5948.             $this->setError('xml was empty, didn\'t parse!');
    5949. 

  5949.         }
    5950. 

  5950.     }
    5951. 

  5951.  
    5952. 

  5952.     /**
    5953. 

  5953.     * start-element handler
    5954. 

  5954.     *
    5955. 

  5955.     * @param    resource $parser XML parser object
    5956. 

  5956.     * @param    string $name element name
    5957. 

  5957.     * @param    array $attrs associative array of attributes
    5958. 

  5958.     * @access   private
    5959. 

  5959.     */
    5960. 

  5960.     function start_element($parser, $name, $attrs) {
    5961. 

  5961.         // position in a total number of elements, starting from 0
    5962. 

  5962.         // update class level pos
    5963. 

  5963.         $pos = $this->position++;
    5964. 

  5964.         // and set mine
    5965. 

  5965.         $this->message[$pos] = array('pos' => $pos,'children'=>'','cdata'=>'');
    5966. 

  5966.         // depth = how many levels removed from root?
    5967. 

  5967.         // set mine as current global depth and increment global depth value
    5968. 

  5968.         $this->message[$pos]['depth'] = $this->depth++;
    5969. 

  5969.  
    5970. 

  5970.         // else add self as child to whoever the current parent is
    5971. 

  5971.         if($pos != 0){
    5972. 

  5972.             $this->message[$this->parent]['children'] .= '|'.$pos;
    5973. 

  5973.         }
    5974. 

  5974.         // set my parent
    5975. 

  5975.         $this->message[$pos]['parent'] = $this->parent;
    5976. 

  5976.         // set self as current parent
    5977. 

  5977.         $this->parent = $pos;
    5978. 

  5978.         // set self as current value for this depth
    5979. 

  5979.         $this->depth_array[$this->depth] = $pos;
    5980. 

  5980.         // get element prefix
    5981. 

  5981.         if(strpos($name,':')){
    5982. 

  5982.             // get ns prefix
    5983. 

  5983.             $prefix = substr($name,0,strpos($name,':'));
    5984. 

  5984.             // get unqualified name
    5985. 

  5985.             $name = substr(strstr($name,':'),1);
    5986. 

  5986.         }
    5987. 

  5987.         // set status
    5988. 

  5988.         if($name == 'Envelope'){
    5989. 

  5989.             $this->status = 'envelope';
    5990. 

  5990.         } elseif($name == 'Header'){
    5991. 

  5991.             $this->root_header = $pos;
    5992. 

  5992.             $this->status = 'header';
    5993. 

  5993.         } elseif($name == 'Body'){
    5994. 

  5994.             $this->status = 'body';
    5995. 

  5995.             $this->body_position = $pos;
    5996. 

  5996.         // set method
    5997. 

  5997.         } elseif($this->status == 'body' && $pos == ($this->body_position+1)){
    5998. 

  5998.             $this->status = 'method';
    5999. 

  5999.             $this->root_struct_name = $name;
    6000. 

  6000.             $this->root_struct = $pos;
    6001. 

  6001.             $this->message[$pos]['type'] = 'struct';
    6002. 

  6002.             $this->debug("found root struct $this->root_struct_name, pos $this->root_struct");
    6003. 

  6003.         }
    6004. 

  6004.         // set my status
    6005. 

  6005.         $this->message[$pos]['status'] = $this->status;
    6006. 

  6006.         // set name
    6007. 

  6007.         $this->message[$pos]['name'] = htmlspecialchars($name);
    6008. 

  6008.         // set attrs
    6009. 

  6009.         $this->message[$pos]['attrs'] = $attrs;
    6010. 

  6010.  
    6011. 

  6011.         // loop through atts, logging ns and type declarations
    6012. 

  6012.         $attstr = '';
    6013. 

  6013.         foreach($attrs as $key => $value){
    6014. 

  6014.             $key_prefix = $this->getPrefix($key);
    6015. 

  6015.             $key_localpart = $this->getLocalPart($key);
    6016. 

  6016.             // if ns declarations, add to class level array of valid namespaces
    6017. 

  6017.             if($key_prefix == 'xmlns'){
    6018. 

  6018.                 if(ereg('^http://www.w3.org/[0-9]{4}/XMLSchema$',$value)){
    6019. 

  6019.                     $this->XMLSchemaVersion = $value;
    6020. 

  6020.                     $this->namespaces['xsd'] = $this->XMLSchemaVersion;
    6021. 

  6021.                     $this->namespaces['xsi'] = $this->XMLSchemaVersion.'-instance';
    6022. 

  6022.                 }
    6023. 

  6023.                 $this->namespaces[$key_localpart] = $value;
    6024. 

  6024.                 // set method namespace
    6025. 

  6025.                 if($name == $this->root_struct_name){
    6026. 

  6026.                     $this->methodNamespace = $value;
    6027. 

  6027.                 }
    6028. 

  6028.             // if it's a type declaration, set type
    6029. 

  6029.             } elseif($key_localpart == 'type'){
    6030. 

  6030.                 $value_prefix = $this->getPrefix($value);
    6031. 

  6031.                 $value_localpart = $this->getLocalPart($value);
    6032. 

  6032.                 $this->message[$pos]['type'] = $value_localpart;
    6033. 

  6033.                 $this->message[$pos]['typePrefix'] = $value_prefix;
    6034. 

  6034.                 if(isset($this->namespaces[$value_prefix])){
    6035. 

  6035.                     $this->message[$pos]['type_namespace'] = $this->namespaces[$value_prefix];
    6036. 

  6036.                 } else if(isset($attrs['xmlns:'.$value_prefix])) {
    6037. 

  6037.                     $this->message[$pos]['type_namespace'] = $attrs['xmlns:'.$value_prefix];
    6038. 

  6038.                 }
    6039. 

  6039.                 // should do something here with the namespace of specified type?
    6040. 

  6040.             } elseif($key_localpart == 'arrayType'){
    6041. 

  6041.                 $this->message[$pos]['type'] = 'array';
    6042. 

  6042.                 /* do arrayType ereg here
    6043. 

  6043.                 [1]    arrayTypeValue    ::=    atype asize
    6044. 

  6044.                 [2]    atype    ::=    QName rank*
    6045. 

  6045.                 [3]    rank    ::=    '[' (',')* ']'
    6046. 

  6046.                 [4]    asize    ::=    '[' length~ ']'
    6047. 

  6047.                 [5]    length    ::=    nextDimension* Digit+
    6048. 

  6048.                 [6]    nextDimension    ::=    Digit+ ','
    6049. 

  6049.                 */
    6050. 

  6050.                 $expr = '([A-Za-z0-9_]+):([A-Za-z]+[A-Za-z0-9_]+)\[([0-9]+),?([0-9]*)\]';
    6051. 

  6051.                 if(ereg($expr,$value,$regs)){
    6052. 

  6052.                     $this->message[$pos]['typePrefix'] = $regs[1];
    6053. 

  6053.                     $this->message[$pos]['arrayTypePrefix'] = $regs[1];
    6054. 

  6054.                     if (isset($this->namespaces[$regs[1]])) {
    6055. 

  6055.                         $this->message[$pos]['arrayTypeNamespace'] = $this->namespaces[$regs[1]];
    6056. 

  6056.                     } else if (isset($attrs['xmlns:'.$regs[1]])) {
    6057. 

  6057.                         $this->message[$pos]['arrayTypeNamespace'] = $attrs['xmlns:'.$regs[1]];
    6058. 

  6058.                     }
    6059. 

  6059.                     $this->message[$pos]['arrayType'] = $regs[2];
    6060. 

  6060.                     $this->message[$pos]['arraySize'] = $regs[3];
    6061. 

  6061.                     $this->message[$pos]['arrayCols'] = $regs[4];
    6062. 

  6062.                 }
    6063. 

  6063.             // specifies nil value (or not)
    6064. 

  6064.             } elseif ($key_localpart == 'nil'){
    6065. 

  6065.                 $this->message[$pos]['nil'] = ($value == 'true' || $value == '1');
    6066. 

  6066.             // some other attribute
    6067. 

  6067.             } elseif ($key != 'href' && $key != 'xmlns' && $key_localpart != 'encodingStyle' && $key_localpart != 'root') {
    6068. 

  6068.                 $this->message[$pos]['xattrs']['!' . $key] = $value;
    6069. 

  6069.             }
    6070. 

  6070.  
    6071. 

  6071.             if ($key == 'xmlns') {
    6072. 

  6072.                 $this->default_namespace = $value;
    6073. 

  6073.             }
    6074. 

  6074.             // log id
    6075. 

  6075.             if($key == 'id'){
    6076. 

  6076.                 $this->ids[$value] = $pos;
    6077. 

  6077.             }
    6078. 

  6078.             // root
    6079. 

  6079.             if($key_localpart == 'root' && $value == 1){
    6080. 

  6080.                 $this->status = 'method';
    6081. 

  6081.                 $this->root_struct_name = $name;
    6082. 

  6082.                 $this->root_struct = $pos;
    6083. 

  6083.                 $this->debug("found root struct $this->root_struct_name, pos $pos");
    6084. 

  6084.             }
    6085. 

  6085.             // for doclit
    6086. 

  6086.             $attstr .= " $key=\"$value\"";
    6087. 

  6087.         }
    6088. 

  6088.         // get namespace - must be done after namespace atts are processed
    6089. 

  6089.         if(isset($prefix)){
    6090. 

  6090.             $this->message[$pos]['namespace'] = $this->namespaces[$prefix];
    6091. 

  6091.             $this->default_namespace = $this->namespaces[$prefix];
    6092. 

  6092.         } else {
    6093. 

  6093.             $this->message[$pos]['namespace'] = $this->default_namespace;
    6094. 

  6094.         }
    6095. 

  6095.         if($this->status == 'header'){
    6096. 

  6096.             if ($this->root_header != $pos) {
    6097. 

  6097.                 $this->responseHeaders .= "<" . (isset($prefix) ? $prefix . ':' : '') . "$name$attstr>";
    6098. 

  6098.             }
    6099. 

  6099.         } elseif($this->root_struct_name != ''){
    6100. 

  6100.             $this->document .= "<" . (isset($prefix) ? $prefix . ':' : '') . "$name$attstr>";
    6101. 

  6101.         }
    6102. 

  6102.     }
    6103. 

  6103.  
    6104. 

  6104.     /**
    6105. 

  6105.     * end-element handler
    6106. 

  6106.     *
    6107. 

  6107.     * @param    resource $parser XML parser object
    6108. 

  6108.     * @param    string $name element name
    6109. 

  6109.     * @access   private
    6110. 

  6110.     */
    6111. 

  6111.     function end_element($parser, $name) {
    6112. 

  6112.         // position of current element is equal to the last value left in depth_array for my depth
    6113. 

  6113.         $pos = $this->depth_array[$this->depth--];
    6114. 

  6114.  
    6115. 

  6115.         // get element prefix
    6116. 

  6116.         if(strpos($name,':')){
    6117. 

  6117.             // get ns prefix
    6118. 

  6118.             $prefix = substr($name,0,strpos($name,':'));
    6119. 

  6119.             // get unqualified name
    6120. 

  6120.             $name = substr(strstr($name,':'),1);
    6121. 

  6121.         }
    6122. 

  6122.         
    6123. 

  6123.         // build to native type
    6124. 

  6124.         if(isset($this->body_position) && $pos > $this->body_position){
    6125. 

  6125.             // deal w/ multirefs
    6126. 

  6126.             if(isset($this->message[$pos]['attrs']['href'])){
    6127. 

  6127.                 // get id
    6128. 

  6128.                 $id = substr($this->message[$pos]['attrs']['href'],1);
    6129. 

  6129.                 // add placeholder to href array
    6130. 

  6130.                 $this->multirefs[$id][$pos] = 'placeholder';
    6131. 

  6131.                 // add set a reference to it as the result value
    6132. 

  6132.                 $this->message[$pos]['result'] =& $this->multirefs[$id][$pos];
    6133. 

  6133.             // build complexType values
    6134. 

  6134.             } elseif($this->message[$pos]['children'] != ''){
    6135. 

  6135.                 // if result has already been generated (struct/array)
    6136. 

  6136.                 if(!isset($this->message[$pos]['result'])){
    6137. 

  6137.                     $this->message[$pos]['result'] = $this->buildVal($pos);
    6138. 

  6138.                 }
    6139. 

  6139.             // build complexType values of attributes and possibly simpleContent
    6140. 

  6140.             } elseif (isset($this->message[$pos]['xattrs'])) {
    6141. 

  6141.                 if (isset($this->message[$pos]['nil']) && $this->message[$pos]['nil']) {
    6142. 

  6142.                     $this->message[$pos]['xattrs']['!'] = null;
    6143. 

  6143.                 } elseif (isset($this->message[$pos]['cdata']) && trim($this->message[$pos]['cdata']) != '') {
    6144. 

  6144.                     if (isset($this->message[$pos]['type'])) {
    6145. 

  6145.                         $this->message[$pos]['xattrs']['!'] = $this->decodeSimple($this->message[$pos]['cdata'], $this->message[$pos]['type'], isset($this->message[$pos]['type_namespace']) ? $this->message[$pos]['type_namespace'] : '');
    6146. 

  6146.                     } else {
    6147. 

  6147.                         $parent = $this->message[$pos]['parent'];
    6148. 

  6148.                         if (isset($this->message[$parent]['type']) && ($this->message[$parent]['type'] == 'array') && isset($this->message[$parent]['arrayType'])) {
    6149. 

  6149.                             $this->message[$pos]['xattrs']['!'] = $this->decodeSimple($this->message[$pos]['cdata'], $this->message[$parent]['arrayType'], isset($this->message[$parent]['arrayTypeNamespace']) ? $this->message[$parent]['arrayTypeNamespace'] : '');
    6150. 

  6150.                         } else {
    6151. 

  6151.                             $this->message[$pos]['xattrs']['!'] = $this->message[$pos]['cdata'];
    6152. 

  6152.                         }
    6153. 

  6153.                     }
    6154. 

  6154.                 }
    6155. 

  6155.                 $this->message[$pos]['result'] = $this->message[$pos]['xattrs'];
    6156. 

  6156.             // set value of simpleType (or nil complexType)
    6157. 

  6157.             } else {
    6158. 

  6158.                 //$this->debug('adding data for scalar value '.$this->message[$pos]['name'].' of value '.$this->message[$pos]['cdata']);
    6159. 

  6159.                 if (isset($this->message[$pos]['nil']) && $this->message[$pos]['nil']) {
    6160. 

  6160.                     $this->message[$pos]['xattrs']['!'] = null;
    6161. 

  6161.                 } elseif (isset($this->message[$pos]['type'])) {
    6162. 

  6162.                     $this->message[$pos]['result'] = $this->decodeSimple($this->message[$pos]['cdata'], $this->message[$pos]['type'], isset($this->message[$pos]['type_namespace']) ? $this->message[$pos]['type_namespace'] : '');
    6163. 

  6163.                 } else {
    6164. 

  6164.                     $parent = $this->message[$pos]['parent'];
    6165. 

  6165.                     if (isset($this->message[$parent]['type']) && ($this->message[$parent]['type'] == 'array') && isset($this->message[$parent]['arrayType'])) {
    6166. 

  6166.                         $this->message[$pos]['result'] = $this->decodeSimple($this->message[$pos]['cdata'], $this->message[$parent]['arrayType'], isset($this->message[$parent]['arrayTypeNamespace']) ? $this->message[$parent]['arrayTypeNamespace'] : '');
    6167. 

  6167.                     } else {
    6168. 

  6168.                         $this->message[$pos]['result'] = $this->message[$pos]['cdata'];
    6169. 

  6169.                     }
    6170. 

  6170.                 }
    6171. 

  6171.  
    6172. 

  6172.                 /* add value to parent's result, if parent is struct/array
    6173. 

  6173.                 $parent = $this->message[$pos]['parent'];
    6174. 

  6174.                 if($this->message[$parent]['type'] != 'map'){
    6175. 

  6175.                     if(strtolower($this->message[$parent]['type']) == 'array'){
    6176. 

  6176.                         $this->message[$parent]['result'][] = $this->message[$pos]['result'];
    6177. 

  6177.                     } else {
    6178. 

  6178.                         $this->message[$parent]['result'][$this->message[$pos]['name']] = $this->message[$pos]['result'];
    6179. 

  6179.                     }
    6180. 

  6180.                 }
    6181. 

  6181.                 */
    6182. 

  6182.             }
    6183. 

  6183.         }
    6184. 

  6184.         
    6185. 

  6185.         // for doclit
    6186. 

  6186.         if($this->status == 'header'){
    6187. 

  6187.             if ($this->root_header != $pos) {
    6188. 

  6188.                 $this->responseHeaders .= "</" . (isset($prefix) ? $prefix . ':' : '') . "$name>";
    6189. 

  6189.             }
    6190. 

  6190.         } elseif($pos >= $this->root_struct){
    6191. 

  6191.             $this->document .= "</" . (isset($prefix) ? $prefix . ':' : '') . "$name>";
    6192. 

  6192.         }
    6193. 

  6193.         // switch status
    6194. 

  6194.         if($pos == $this->root_struct){
    6195. 

  6195.             $this->status = 'body';
    6196. 

  6196.             $this->root_struct_namespace = $this->message[$pos]['namespace'];
    6197. 

  6197.         } elseif($name == 'Body'){
    6198. 

  6198.             $this->status = 'envelope';
    6199. 

  6199.          } elseif($name == 'Header'){
    6200. 

  6200.             $this->status = 'envelope';
    6201. 

  6201.         } elseif($name == 'Envelope'){
    6202. 

  6202.             //
    6203. 

  6203.         }
    6204. 

  6204.         // set parent back to my parent
    6205. 

  6205.         $this->parent = $this->message[$pos]['parent'];
    6206. 

  6206.     }
    6207. 

  6207.  
    6208. 

  6208.     /**
    6209. 

  6209.     * element content handler
    6210. 

  6210.     *
    6211. 

  6211.     * @param    resource $parser XML parser object
    6212. 

  6212.     * @param    string $data element content
    6213. 

  6213.     * @access   private
    6214. 

  6214.     */
    6215. 

  6215.     function character_data($parser, $data){
    6216. 

  6216.         $pos = $this->depth_array[$this->depth];
    6217. 

  6217.         if ($this->xml_encoding=='UTF-8'){
    6218. 

  6218.             // TODO: add an option to disable this for folks who want
    6219. 

  6219.             // raw UTF-8 that, e.g., might not map to iso-8859-1
    6220. 

  6220.             // TODO: this can also be handled with xml_parser_set_option($this->parser, XML_OPTION_TARGET_ENCODING, "ISO-8859-1");
    6221. 

  6221.             if($this->decode_utf8){
    6222. 

  6222.                 $data = utf8_decode($data);
    6223. 

  6223.             }
    6224. 

  6224.         }
    6225. 

  6225.         $this->message[$pos]['cdata'] .= $data;
    6226. 

  6226.         // for doclit
    6227. 

  6227.         if($this->status == 'header'){
    6228. 

  6228.             $this->responseHeaders .= $data;
    6229. 

  6229.         } else {
    6230. 

  6230.             $this->document .= $data;
    6231. 

  6231.         }
    6232. 

  6232.     }
    6233. 

  6233.  
    6234. 

  6234.     /**
    6235. 

  6235.     * get the parsed message
    6236. 

  6236.     *
    6237. 

  6237.     * @return    mixed 
    6238. 

  6238.     * @access   public
    6239. 

  6239.     */
    6240. 

  6240.     function get_response(){
    6241. 

  6241.         return $this->soapresponse;
    6242. 

  6242.     }
    6243. 

  6243.  
    6244. 

  6244.     /**
    6245. 

  6245.     * get the parsed headers
    6246. 

  6246.     *
    6247. 

  6247.     * @return    string XML or empty if no headers
    6248. 

  6248.     * @access   public
    6249. 

  6249.     */
    6250. 

  6250.     function getHeaders(){
    6251. 

  6251.         return $this->responseHeaders;
    6252. 

  6252.     }
    6253. 

  6253.  
    6254. 

  6254.     /**
    6255. 

  6255.     * decodes simple types into PHP variables
    6256. 

  6256.     *
    6257. 

  6257.     * @param    string $value value to decode
    6258. 

  6258.     * @param    string $type XML type to decode
    6259. 

  6259.     * @param    string $typens XML type namespace to decode
    6260. 

  6260.     * @return    mixed PHP value
    6261. 

  6261.     * @access   private
    6262. 

  6262.     */
    6263. 

  6263.     function decodeSimple($value, $type, $typens) {
    6264. 

  6264.         // TODO: use the namespace!
    6265. 

  6265.         if ((!isset($type)) || $type == 'string' || $type == 'long' || $type == 'unsignedLong') {
    6266. 

  6266.             return (string) $value;
    6267. 

  6267.         }
    6268. 

  6268.         if ($type == 'int' || $type == 'integer' || $type == 'short' || $type == 'byte') {
    6269. 

  6269.             return (int) $value;
    6270. 

  6270.         }
    6271. 

  6271.         if ($type == 'float' || $type == 'double' || $type == 'decimal') {
    6272. 

  6272.             return (double) $value;
    6273. 

  6273.         }
    6274. 

  6274.         if ($type == 'boolean') {
    6275. 

  6275.             if (strtolower($value) == 'false' || strtolower($value) == 'f') {
    6276. 

  6276.                 return false;
    6277. 

  6277.             }
    6278. 

  6278.             return (boolean) $value;
    6279. 

  6279.         }
    6280. 

  6280.         if ($type == 'base64' || $type == 'base64Binary') {
    6281. 

  6281.             $this->debug('Decode base64 value');
    6282. 

  6282.             return base64_decode($value);
    6283. 

  6283.         }
    6284. 

  6284.         // obscure numeric types
    6285. 

  6285.         if ($type == 'nonPositiveInteger' || $type == 'negativeInteger'
    6286. 

  6286.             || $type == 'nonNegativeInteger' || $type == 'positiveInteger'
    6287. 

  6287.             || $type == 'unsignedInt'
    6288. 

  6288.             || $type == 'unsignedShort' || $type == 'unsignedByte') {
    6289. 

  6289.             return (int) $value;
    6290. 

  6290.         }
    6291. 

  6291.         // bogus: parser treats array with no elements as a simple type
    6292. 

  6292.         if ($type == 'array') {
    6293. 

  6293.             return array();
    6294. 

  6294.         }
    6295. 

  6295.         // everything else
    6296. 

  6296.         return (string) $value;
    6297. 

  6297.     }
    6298. 

  6298.  
    6299. 

  6299.     /**
    6300. 

  6300.     * builds response structures for compound values (arrays/structs)
    6301. 

  6301.     * and scalars
    6302. 

  6302.     *
    6303. 

  6303.     * @param    integer $pos position in node tree
    6304. 

  6304.     * @return    mixed    PHP value
    6305. 

  6305.     * @access   private
    6306. 

  6306.     */
    6307. 

  6307.     function buildVal($pos){
    6308. 

  6308.         if(!isset($this->message[$pos]['type'])){
    6309. 

  6309.             $this->message[$pos]['type'] = '';
    6310. 

  6310.         }
    6311. 

  6311.         $this->debug('in buildVal() for '.$this->message[$pos]['name']."(pos $pos) of type ".$this->message[$pos]['type']);
    6312. 

  6312.         // if there are children...
    6313. 

  6313.         if($this->message[$pos]['children'] != ''){
    6314. 

  6314.             $this->debug('in buildVal, there are children');
    6315. 

  6315.             $children = explode('|',$this->message[$pos]['children']);
    6316. 

  6316.             array_shift($children); // knock off empty
    6317. 

  6317.             // md array
    6318. 

  6318.             if(isset($this->message[$pos]['arrayCols']) && $this->message[$pos]['arrayCols'] != ''){
    6319. 

  6319.                 $r=0; // rowcount
    6320. 

  6320.                 $c=0; // colcount
    6321. 

  6321.                 foreach($children as $child_pos){
    6322. 

  6322.                     $this->debug("in buildVal, got an MD array element: $r, $c");
    6323. 

  6323.                     $params[$r][] = $this->message[$child_pos]['result'];
    6324. 

  6324.                     $c++;
    6325. 

  6325.                     if($c == $this->message[$pos]['arrayCols']){
    6326. 

  6326.                         $c = 0;
    6327. 

  6327.                         $r++;
    6328. 

  6328.                     }
    6329. 

  6329.                 }
    6330. 

  6330.             // array
    6331. 

  6331.             } elseif($this->message[$pos]['type'] == 'array' || $this->message[$pos]['type'] == 'Array'){
    6332. 

  6332.                 $this->debug('in buildVal, adding array '.$this->message[$pos]['name']);
    6333. 

  6333.                 foreach($children as $child_pos){
    6334. 

  6334.                     $params[] = &$this->message[$child_pos]['result'];
    6335. 

  6335.                 }
    6336. 

  6336.             // apache Map type: java hashtable
    6337. 

  6337.             } elseif($this->message[$pos]['type'] == 'Map' && $this->message[$pos]['type_namespace'] == 'http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap'){
    6338. 

  6338.                 $this->debug('in buildVal, Java Map '.$this->message[$pos]['name']);
    6339. 

  6339.                 foreach($children as $child_pos){
    6340. 

  6340.                     $kv = explode("|",$this->message[$child_pos]['children']);
    6341. 

  6341.                        $params[$this->message[$kv[1]]['result']] = &$this->message[$kv[2]]['result'];
    6342. 

  6342.                 }
    6343. 

  6343.             // generic compound type
    6344. 

  6344.             //} elseif($this->message[$pos]['type'] == 'SOAPStruct' || $this->message[$pos]['type'] == 'struct') {
    6345. 

  6345.             } else {
    6346. 

  6346.                 // Apache Vector type: treat as an array
    6347. 

  6347.                 $this->debug('in buildVal, adding Java Vector '.$this->message[$pos]['name']);
    6348. 

  6348.                 if ($this->message[$pos]['type'] == 'Vector' && $this->message[$pos]['type_namespace'] == 'http://xml.apache.org/xml-soap') {
    6349. 

  6349.                     $notstruct = 1;
    6350. 

  6350.                 } else {
    6351. 

  6351.                     $notstruct = 0;
    6352. 

  6352.                 }
    6353. 

  6353.                 //
    6354. 

  6354.                 foreach($children as $child_pos){
    6355. 

  6355.                     if($notstruct){
    6356. 

  6356.                         $params[] = &$this->message[$child_pos]['result'];
    6357. 

  6357.                     } else {
    6358. 

  6358.                         if (isset($params[$this->message[$child_pos]['name']])) {
    6359. 

  6359.                             // de-serialize repeated element name into an array
    6360. 

  6360.                             if ((!is_array($params[$this->message[$child_pos]['name']])) || (!isset($params[$this->message[$child_pos]['name']][0]))) {
    6361. 

  6361.                                 $params[$this->message[$child_pos]['name']] = array($params[$this->message[$child_pos]['name']]);
    6362. 

  6362.                             }
    6363. 

  6363.                             $params[$this->message[$child_pos]['name']][] = &$this->message[$child_pos]['result'];
    6364. 

  6364.                         } else {
    6365. 

  6365.                             $params[$this->message[$child_pos]['name']] = &$this->message[$child_pos]['result'];
    6366. 

  6366.                         }
    6367. 

  6367.                     }
    6368. 

  6368.                 }
    6369. 

  6369.             }
    6370. 

  6370.             if (isset($this->message[$pos]['xattrs'])) {
    6371. 

  6371.                 $this->debug('in buildVal, handling attributes');
    6372. 

  6372.                 foreach ($this->message[$pos]['xattrs'] as $n => $v) {
    6373. 

  6373.                     $params[$n] = $v;
    6374. 

  6374.                 }
    6375. 

  6375.             }
    6376. 

  6376.             // handle simpleContent
    6377. 

  6377.             if (isset($this->message[$pos]['cdata']) && trim($this->message[$pos]['cdata']) != '') {
    6378. 

  6378.                 $this->debug('in buildVal, handling simpleContent');
    6379. 

  6379.                 if (isset($this->message[$pos]['type'])) {
    6380. 

  6380.                     $params['!'] = $this->decodeSimple($this->message[$pos]['cdata'], $this->message[$pos]['type'], isset($this->message[$pos]['type_namespace']) ? $this->message[$pos]['type_namespace'] : '');
    6381. 

  6381.                 } else {
    6382. 

  6382.                     $parent = $this->message[$pos]['parent'];
    6383. 

  6383.                     if (isset($this->message[$parent]['type']) && ($this->message[$parent]['type'] == 'array') && isset($this->message[$parent]['arrayType'])) {
    6384. 

  6384.                         $params['!'] = $this->decodeSimple($this->message[$pos]['cdata'], $this->message[$parent]['arrayType'], isset($this->message[$parent]['arrayTypeNamespace']) ? $this->message[$parent]['arrayTypeNamespace'] : '');
    6385. 

  6385.                     } else {
    6386. 

  6386.                         $params['!'] = $this->message[$pos]['cdata'];
    6387. 

  6387.                     }
    6388. 

  6388.                 }
    6389. 

  6389.             }
    6390. 

  6390.             return is_array($params) ? $params : array();
    6391. 

  6391.         } else {
    6392. 

  6392.             $this->debug('in buildVal, no children, building scalar');
    6393. 

  6393.             $cdata = isset($this->message[$pos]['cdata']) ? $this->message[$pos]['cdata'] : '';
    6394. 

  6394.             if (isset($this->message[$pos]['type'])) {
    6395. 

  6395.                 return $this->decodeSimple($cdata, $this->message[$pos]['type'], isset($this->message[$pos]['type_namespace']) ? $this->message[$pos]['type_namespace'] : '');
    6396. 

  6396.             }
    6397. 

  6397.             $parent = $this->message[$pos]['parent'];
    6398. 

  6398.             if (isset($this->message[$parent]['type']) && ($this->message[$parent]['type'] == 'array') && isset($this->message[$parent]['arrayType'])) {
    6399.
