  6399.                 return $this->decodeSimple($cdata, $this->message[$parent]['arrayType'], isset($this->message[$parent]['arrayTypeNamespace']) ? $this->message[$parent]['arrayTypeNamespace'] : '');
    6400. 

  6400.             }
    6401. 

  6401.                return $this->message[$pos]['cdata'];
    6402. 

  6402.         }
    6403. 

  6403.     }
    6404. 

  6404. }
    6405. 

  6405.  
    6406. 

  6406.  
    6407. 

  6407.  
    6408. 

  6408. ?><?php
    6409. 

  6409.  
    6410. 

  6410.  
    6411. 

  6411.  
    6412. 

  6412. /**
    6413. 

  6413. *
    6414. 

  6414. * soapclient higher level class for easy usage.
    6415. 

  6415. *
    6416. 

  6416. * usage:
    6417. 

  6417. *
    6418. 

  6418. * // instantiate client with server info
    6419. 

  6419. * $soapclient = new soapclient( string path [ ,boolean wsdl] );
    6420. 

  6420. *
    6421. 

  6421. * // call method, get results
    6422. 

  6422. * echo $soapclient->call( string methodname [ ,array parameters] );
    6423. 

  6423. *
    6424. 

  6424. * // bye bye client
    6425. 

  6425. * unset($soapclient);
    6426. 

  6426. *
    6427. 

  6427. * @author   Dietrich Ayala <dietrich@ganx4.com>
    6428. 

  6428. * @version  $Id: nusoap.php,v 1.94 2005/08/04 01:27:42 snichol Exp $
    6429. 

  6429. * @access   public
    6430. 

  6430. */
    6431. 

  6431. class soapclient extends nusoap_base  {
    6432. 

  6432.  
    6433. 

  6433.     var $username = '';
    6434. 

  6434.     var $password = '';
    6435. 

  6435.     var $authtype = '';
    6436. 

  6436.     var $certRequest = array();
    6437. 

  6437.     var $requestHeaders = false;    // SOAP headers in request (text)
    6438. 

  6438.     
    6439. 

  6439.     var $responseHeaders = '';        // SOAP headers from response (incomplete namespace resolution) (text)
    6440. 

  6440.     
    6441. 

  6441.     var $document = '';                // SOAP body response portion (incomplete namespace resolution) (text)
    6442. 

  6442.     
    6443. 

  6443.     var $endpoint;
    6444. 

  6444.     var $forceEndpoint = '';        // overrides WSDL endpoint
    6445. 

  6445.     
    6446. 

  6446.     var $proxyhost = '';
    6447. 

  6447.     var $proxyport = '';
    6448. 

  6448.     var $proxyusername = '';
    6449. 

  6449.     var $proxypassword = '';
    6450. 

  6450.     var $xml_encoding = '';            // character set encoding of incoming (response) messages
    6451. 

  6451.     
    6452. 

  6452.     var $http_encoding = false;
    6453. 

  6453.     var $timeout = 0;                // HTTP connection timeout
    6454. 

  6454.     
    6455. 

  6455.     var $response_timeout = 30;        // HTTP response timeout
    6456. 

  6456.     
    6457. 

  6457.     var $endpointType = '';            // soap|wsdl, empty for WSDL initialization error
    6458. 

  6458.     
    6459. 

  6459.     var $persistentConnection = false;
    6460. 

  6460.     var $defaultRpcParams = false;    // This is no longer used
    6461. 

  6461.     
    6462. 

  6462.     var $request = '';                // HTTP request
    6463. 

  6463.     
    6464. 

  6464.     var $response = '';                // HTTP response
    6465. 

  6465.     
    6466. 

  6466.     var $responseData = '';            // SOAP payload of response
    6467. 

  6467.     
    6468. 

  6468.     var $cookies = array();            // Cookies from response or for request
    6469. 

  6469.     
    6470. 

  6470.     var $decode_utf8 = true;        // toggles whether the parser decodes element content w/ utf8_decode()
    6471. 

  6471.     
    6472. 

  6472.     var $operations = array();        // WSDL operations, empty for WSDL initialization error
    6473. 

  6473.     
    6474. 

  6474.     /*
    6475. 

  6475.      * fault related variables
    6476. 

  6476.      */
    6477. 

  6477.     /**
    6478. 

  6478.      * @var      fault 
    6479. 

  6479.      * @access   public
    6480. 

  6480.      */
    6481. 

  6481.     var $fault;
    6482. 

  6482.     /**
    6483. 

  6483.      * @var      faultcode 
    6484. 

  6484.      * @access   public
    6485. 

  6485.      */
    6486. 

  6486.     var $faultcode;
    6487. 

  6487.     /**
    6488. 

  6488.      * @var      faultstring 
    6489. 

  6489.      * @access   public
    6490. 

  6490.      */
    6491. 

  6491.     var $faultstring;
    6492. 

  6492.     /**
    6493. 

  6493.      * @var      faultdetail 
    6494. 

  6494.      * @access   public
    6495. 

  6495.      */
    6496. 

  6496.     var $faultdetail;
    6497. 

  6497.  
    6498. 

  6498.     /**
    6499. 

  6499.     * constructor
    6500. 

  6500.     *
    6501. 

  6501.     * @param    mixed $endpoint SOAP server or WSDL URL (string), or wsdl instance (object)
    6502. 

  6502.     * @param    bool $wsdl optional, set to true if using WSDL
    6503. 

  6503.     * @param    int $portName optional portName in WSDL document
    6504. 

  6504.     * @param    string $proxyhost 
    6505. 

  6505.     * @param    string $proxyport 
    6506. 

  6506.     * @param    string $proxyusername 
    6507. 

  6507.     * @param    string $proxypassword 
    6508. 

  6508.     * @param    integer $timeout set the connection timeout
    6509. 

  6509.     * @param    integer $response_timeout set the response timeout
    6510. 

  6510.     * @access   public
    6511. 

  6511.     */
    6512. 

  6512.     function soapclient($endpoint,$wsdl = false,$proxyhost = false,$proxyport = false,$proxyusername = false, $proxypassword = false, $timeout = 0, $response_timeout = 30){
    6513. 

  6513.         parent::nusoap_base();
    6514. 

  6514.         $this->endpoint = $endpoint;
    6515. 

  6515.         $this->proxyhost = $proxyhost;
    6516. 

  6516.         $this->proxyport = $proxyport;
    6517. 

  6517.         $this->proxyusername = $proxyusername;
    6518. 

  6518.         $this->proxypassword = $proxypassword;
    6519. 

  6519.         $this->timeout = $timeout;
    6520. 

  6520.         $this->response_timeout = $response_timeout;
    6521. 

  6521.  
    6522. 

  6522.         // make values
    6523. 

  6523.         if($wsdl){
    6524. 

  6524.             if (is_object($endpoint) && (get_class($endpoint) == 'wsdl')) {
    6525. 

  6525.                 $this->wsdl = $endpoint;
    6526. 

  6526.                 $this->endpoint = $this->wsdl->wsdl;
    6527. 

  6527.                 $this->wsdlFile = $this->endpoint;
    6528. 

  6528.                 $this->debug('existing wsdl instance created from ' . $this->endpoint);
    6529. 

  6529.             } else {
    6530. 

  6530.                 $this->wsdlFile = $this->endpoint;
    6531. 

  6531.                 
    6532. 

  6532.                 // instantiate wsdl object and parse wsdl file
    6533. 

  6533.                 $this->debug('instantiating wsdl class with doc: '.$endpoint);
    6534. 

  6534.                 $this->wsdl =& new wsdl($this->wsdlFile,$this->proxyhost,$this->proxyport,$this->proxyusername,$this->proxypassword,$this->timeout,$this->response_timeout);
    6535. 

  6535.             }
    6536. 

  6536.             $this->appendDebug($this->wsdl->getDebug());
    6537. 

  6537.             $this->wsdl->clearDebug();
    6538. 

  6538.             // catch errors
    6539. 

  6539.             if($errstr = $this->wsdl->getError()){
    6540. 

  6540.                 $this->debug('got wsdl error: '.$errstr);
    6541. 

  6541.                 $this->setError('wsdl error: '.$errstr);
    6542. 

  6542.             } elseif($this->operations = $this->wsdl->getOperations()){
    6543. 

  6543.                 $this->debug( 'got '.count($this->operations).' operations from wsdl '.$this->wsdlFile);
    6544. 

  6544.                 $this->endpointType = 'wsdl';
    6545. 

  6545.             } else {
    6546. 

  6546.                 $this->debug( 'getOperations returned false');
    6547. 

  6547.                 $this->setError('no operations defined in the WSDL document!');
    6548. 

  6548.             }
    6549. 

  6549.         } else {
    6550. 

  6550.             $this->debug("instantiate SOAP with endpoint at $endpoint");
    6551. 

  6551.             $this->endpointType = 'soap';
    6552. 

  6552.         }
    6553. 

  6553.     }
    6554. 

  6554.  
    6555. 

  6555.     /**
    6556. 

  6556.     * calls method, returns PHP native type
    6557. 

  6557.     *
    6558. 

  6558.     * @param    string $method SOAP server URL or path
    6559. 

  6559.     * @param    mixed $params An array, associative or simple, of the parameters
    6560. 

  6560.     *                           for the method call, or a string that is the XML
    6561. 

  6561.     *                           for the call.  For rpc style, this call will
    6562. 

  6562.     *                           wrap the XML in a tag named after the method, as
    6563. 

  6563.     *                           well as the SOAP Envelope and Body.  For document
    6564. 

  6564.     *                           style, this will only wrap with the Envelope and Body.
    6565. 

  6565.     *                           IMPORTANT: when using an array with document style,
    6566. 

  6566.     *                           in which case there
    6567. 

  6567.     *                          is really one parameter, the root of the fragment
    6568. 

  6568.     *                          used in the call, which encloses what programmers
    6569. 

  6569.     *                          normally think of parameters.  A parameter array
    6570. 

  6570.     *                          *must* include the wrapper.
    6571. 

  6571.     * @param    string $namespace optional method namespace (WSDL can override)
    6572. 

  6572.     * @param    string $soapAction optional SOAPAction value (WSDL can override)
    6573. 

  6573.     * @param    mixed $headers optional string of XML with SOAP header content, or array of soapval objects for SOAP headers
    6574. 

  6574.     * @param    boolean $rpcParams optional (no longer used)
    6575. 

  6575.     * @param    string    $style optional (rpc|document) the style to use when serializing parameters (WSDL can override)
    6576. 

  6576.     * @param    string    $use optional (encoded|literal) the use when serializing parameters (WSDL can override)
    6577. 

  6577.     * @return    mixed    response from SOAP call
    6578. 

  6578.     * @access   public
    6579. 

  6579.     */
    6580. 

  6580.     function call($operation,$params=array(),$namespace='http://tempuri.org',$soapAction='',$headers=false,$rpcParams=null,$style='rpc',$use='encoded'){
    6581. 

  6581.         $this->operation = $operation;
    6582. 

  6582.         $this->fault = false;
    6583. 

  6583.         $this->setError('');
    6584. 

  6584.         $this->request = '';
    6585. 

  6585.         $this->response = '';
    6586. 

  6586.         $this->responseData = '';
    6587. 

  6587.         $this->faultstring = '';
    6588. 

  6588.         $this->faultcode = '';
    6589. 

  6589.         $this->opData = array();
    6590. 

  6590.         
    6591. 

  6591.         $this->debug("call: operation=$operation, namespace=$namespace, soapAction=$soapAction, rpcParams=$rpcParams, style=$style, use=$use, endpointType=$this->endpointType");
    6592. 

  6592.         $this->appendDebug('params=' . $this->varDump($params));
    6593. 

  6593.         $this->appendDebug('headers=' . $this->varDump($headers));
    6594. 

  6594.         if ($headers) {
    6595. 

  6595.             $this->requestHeaders = $headers;
    6596. 

  6596.         }
    6597. 

  6597.         // serialize parameters
    6598. 

  6598.         if($this->endpointType == 'wsdl' && $opData = $this->getOperationData($operation)){
    6599. 

  6599.             // use WSDL for operation
    6600. 

  6600.             $this->opData = $opData;
    6601. 

  6601.             $this->debug("found operation");
    6602. 

  6602.             $this->appendDebug('opData=' . $this->varDump($opData));
    6603. 

  6603.             if (isset($opData['soapAction'])) {
    6604. 

  6604.                 $soapAction = $opData['soapAction'];
    6605. 

  6605.             }
    6606. 

  6606.             if (! $this->forceEndpoint) {
    6607. 

  6607.                 $this->endpoint = $opData['endpoint'];
    6608. 

  6608.             } else {
    6609. 

  6609.                 $this->endpoint = $this->forceEndpoint;
    6610. 

  6610.             }
    6611. 

  6611.             $namespace = isset($opData['input']['namespace']) ? $opData['input']['namespace'] :    $namespace;
    6612. 

  6612.             $style = $opData['style'];
    6613. 

  6613.             $use = $opData['input']['use'];
    6614. 

  6614.             // add ns to ns array
    6615. 

  6615.             if($namespace != '' && !isset($this->wsdl->namespaces[$namespace])){
    6616. 

  6616.                 $nsPrefix = 'ns' . rand(1000, 9999);
    6617. 

  6617.                 $this->wsdl->namespaces[$nsPrefix] = $namespace;
    6618. 

  6618.             }
    6619. 

  6619.             $nsPrefix = $this->wsdl->getPrefixFromNamespace($namespace);
    6620. 

  6620.             // serialize payload
    6621. 

  6621.             if (is_string($params)) {
    6622. 

  6622.                 $this->debug("serializing param string for WSDL operation $operation");
    6623. 

  6623.                 $payload = $params;
    6624. 

  6624.             } elseif (is_array($params)) {
    6625. 

  6625.                 $this->debug("serializing param array for WSDL operation $operation");
    6626. 

  6626.                 $payload = $this->wsdl->serializeRPCParameters($operation,'input',$params);
    6627. 

  6627.             } else {
    6628. 

  6628.                 $this->debug('params must be array or string');
    6629. 

  6629.                 $this->setError('params must be array or string');
    6630. 

  6630.                 return false;
    6631. 

  6631.             }
    6632. 

  6632.             $usedNamespaces = $this->wsdl->usedNamespaces;
    6633. 

  6633.             if (isset($opData['input']['encodingStyle'])) {
    6634. 

  6634.                 $encodingStyle = $opData['input']['encodingStyle'];
    6635. 

  6635.             } else {
    6636. 

  6636.                 $encodingStyle = '';
    6637. 

  6637.             }
    6638. 

  6638.             $this->appendDebug($this->wsdl->getDebug());
    6639. 

  6639.             $this->wsdl->clearDebug();
    6640. 

  6640.             if ($errstr = $this->wsdl->getError()) {
    6641. 

  6641.                 $this->debug('got wsdl error: '.$errstr);
    6642. 

  6642.                 $this->setError('wsdl error: '.$errstr);
    6643. 

  6643.                 return false;
    6644. 

  6644.             }
    6645. 

  6645.         } elseif($this->endpointType == 'wsdl') {
    6646. 

  6646.             // operation not in WSDL
    6647. 

  6647.             $this->appendDebug($this->wsdl->getDebug());
    6648. 

  6648.             $this->wsdl->clearDebug();
    6649. 

  6649.             $this->setError( 'operation '.$operation.' not present.');
    6650. 

  6650.             $this->debug("operation '$operation' not present.");
    6651. 

  6651.             return false;
    6652. 

  6652.         } else {
    6653. 

  6653.             // no WSDL
    6654. 

  6654.             //$this->namespaces['ns1'] = $namespace;
    6655. 

  6655.             $nsPrefix = 'ns' . rand(1000, 9999);
    6656. 

  6656.             // serialize 
    6657. 

  6657.             $payload = '';
    6658. 

  6658.             if (is_string($params)) {
    6659. 

  6659.                 $this->debug("serializing param string for operation $operation");
    6660. 

  6660.                 $payload = $params;
    6661. 

  6661.             } elseif (is_array($params)) {
    6662. 

  6662.                 $this->debug("serializing param array for operation $operation");
    6663. 

  6663.                 foreach($params as $k => $v){
    6664. 

  6664.                     $payload .= $this->serialize_val($v,$k,false,false,false,false,$use);
    6665. 

  6665.                 }
    6666. 

  6666.             } else {
    6667. 

  6667.                 $this->debug('params must be array or string');
    6668. 

  6668.                 $this->setError('params must be array or string');
    6669. 

  6669.                 return false;
    6670. 

  6670.             }
    6671. 

  6671.             $usedNamespaces = array();
    6672. 

  6672.             if ($use == 'encoded') {
    6673. 

  6673.                 $encodingStyle = 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/';
    6674. 

  6674.             } else {
    6675. 

  6675.                 $encodingStyle = '';
    6676. 

  6676.             }
    6677. 

  6677.         }
    6678. 

  6678.         // wrap RPC calls with method element
    6679. 

  6679.         if ($style == 'rpc') {
    6680. 

  6680.             if ($use == 'literal') {
    6681. 

  6681.                 $this->debug("wrapping RPC request with literal method element");
    6682. 

  6682.                 if ($namespace) {
    6683. 

  6683.                     $payload = "<$operation xmlns=\"$namespace\">" . $payload . "</$operation>";
    6684. 

  6684.                 } else {
    6685. 

  6685.                     $payload = "<$operation>" . $payload . "</$operation>";
    6686. 

  6686.                 }
    6687. 

  6687.             } else {
    6688. 

  6688.                 $this->debug("wrapping RPC request with encoded method element");
    6689. 

  6689.                 if ($namespace) {
    6690. 

  6690.                     $payload = "<$nsPrefix:$operation xmlns:$nsPrefix=\"$namespace\">" .
    6691. 

  6691.                                 $payload .
    6692. 

  6692.                                 "</$nsPrefix:$operation>";
    6693. 

  6693.                 } else {
    6694. 

  6694.                     $payload = "<$operation>" .
    6695. 

  6695.                                 $payload .
    6696. 

  6696.                                 "</$operation>";
    6697. 

  6697.                 }
    6698. 

  6698.             }
    6699. 

  6699.         }
    6700. 

  6700.         // serialize envelope
    6701. 

  6701.         $soapmsg = $this->serializeEnvelope($payload,$this->requestHeaders,$usedNamespaces,$style,$use,$encodingStyle);
    6702. 

  6702.         $this->debug("endpoint=$this->endpoint, soapAction=$soapAction, namespace=$namespace, style=$style, use=$use, encodingStyle=$encodingStyle");
    6703. 

  6703.         $this->debug('SOAP message length=' . strlen($soapmsg) . ' contents (max 1000 bytes)=' . substr($soapmsg, 0, 1000));
    6704. 

  6704.         // send
    6705. 

  6705.         $return = $this->send($this->getHTTPBody($soapmsg),$soapAction,$this->timeout,$this->response_timeout);
    6706. 

  6706.         if($errstr = $this->getError()){
    6707. 

  6707.             $this->debug('Error: '.$errstr);
    6708. 

  6708.             return false;
    6709. 

  6709.         } else {
    6710. 

  6710.             $this->return = $return;
    6711. 

  6711.             $this->debug('sent message successfully and got a(n) '.gettype($return));
    6712. 

  6712.                $this->appendDebug('return=' . $this->varDump($return));
    6713. 

  6713.             
    6714. 

  6714.             // fault?
    6715. 

  6715.             if(is_array($return) && isset($return['faultcode'])){
    6716. 

  6716.                 $this->debug('got fault');
    6717. 

  6717.                 $this->setError($return['faultcode'].': '.$return['faultstring']);
    6718. 

  6718.                 $this->fault = true;
    6719. 

  6719.                 foreach($return as $k => $v){
    6720. 

  6720.                     $this->$k = $v;
    6721. 

  6721.                     $this->debug("$k = $v<br>");
    6722. 

  6722.                 }
    6723. 

  6723.                 return $return;
    6724. 

  6724.             } elseif ($style == 'document') {
    6725. 

  6725.                 // NOTE: if the response is defined to have multiple parts (i.e. unwrapped),
    6726. 

  6726.                 // we are only going to return the first part here...sorry about that
    6727. 

  6727.                 return $return;
    6728. 

  6728.             } else {
    6729. 

  6729.                 // array of return values
    6730. 

  6730.                 if(is_array($return)){
    6731. 

  6731.                     // multiple 'out' parameters, which we return wrapped up
    6732. 

  6732.                     // in the array
    6733. 

  6733.                     if(sizeof($return) > 1){
    6734. 

  6734.                         return $return;
    6735. 

  6735.                     }
    6736. 

  6736.                     // single 'out' parameter (normally the return value)
    6737. 

  6737.                     $return = array_shift($return);
    6738. 

  6738.                     $this->debug('return shifted value: ');
    6739. 

  6739.                     $this->appendDebug($this->varDump($return));
    6740. 

  6740.                        return $return;
    6741. 

  6741.                 // nothing returned (ie, echoVoid)
    6742. 

  6742.                 } else {
    6743. 

  6743.                     return "";
    6744. 

  6744.                 }
    6745. 

  6745.             }
    6746. 

  6746.         }
    6747. 

  6747.     }
    6748. 

  6748.  
    6749. 

  6749.     /**
    6750. 

  6750.     * get available data pertaining to an operation
    6751. 

  6751.     *
    6752. 

  6752.     * @param    string $operation operation name
    6753. 

  6753.     * @return    array array of data pertaining to the operation
    6754. 

  6754.     * @access   public
    6755. 

  6755.     */
    6756. 

  6756.     function getOperationData($operation){
    6757. 

  6757.         if(isset($this->operations[$operation])){
    6758. 

  6758.             return $this->operations[$operation];
    6759. 

  6759.         }
    6760. 

  6760.         $this->debug("No data for operation: $operation");
    6761. 

  6761.     }
    6762. 

  6762.  
    6763. 

  6763.     /**
    6764. 

  6764.     * send the SOAP message
    6765. 

  6765.     *
    6766. 

  6766.     * Note: if the operation has multiple return values
    6767. 

  6767.     * the return value of this method will be an array
    6768. 

  6768.     * of those values.
    6769. 

  6769.     *
    6770. 

  6770.     * @param    string $msg a SOAPx4 soapmsg object
    6771. 

  6771.     * @param    string $soapaction SOAPAction value
    6772. 

  6772.     * @param    integer $timeout set connection timeout in seconds
    6773. 

  6773.     * @param    integer $response_timeout set response timeout in seconds
    6774. 

  6774.     * @return    mixed native PHP types.
    6775. 

  6775.     * @access   private
    6776. 

  6776.     */
    6777. 

  6777.     function send($msg, $soapaction = '', $timeout=0, $response_timeout=30) {
    6778. 

  6778.         $this->checkCookies();
    6779. 

  6779.         // detect transport
    6780. 

  6780.         switch(true){
    6781. 

  6781.             // http(s)
    6782. 

  6782.             case ereg('^http',$this->endpoint):
    6783. 

  6783.                 $this->debug('transporting via HTTP');
    6784. 

  6784.                 if($this->persistentConnection == true && is_object($this->persistentConnection)){
    6785. 

  6785.                     $http =& $this->persistentConnection;
    6786. 

  6786.                 } else {
    6787. 

  6787.                     $http = new soap_transport_http($this->endpoint);
    6788. 

  6788.                     if ($this->persistentConnection) {
    6789. 

  6789.                         $http->usePersistentConnection();
    6790. 

  6790.                     }
    6791. 

  6791.                 }
    6792. 

  6792.                 $http->setContentType($this->getHTTPContentType(), $this->getHTTPContentTypeCharset());
    6793. 

  6793.                 $http->setSOAPAction($soapaction);
    6794. 

  6794.                 if($this->proxyhost && $this->proxyport){
    6795. 

  6795.                     $http->setProxy($this->proxyhost,$this->proxyport,$this->proxyusername,$this->proxypassword);
    6796. 

  6796.                 }
    6797. 

  6797.                 if($this->authtype != '') {
    6798. 

  6798.                     $http->setCredentials($this->username, $this->password, $this->authtype, array(), $this->certRequest);
    6799. 

  6799.                 }
    6800. 

  6800.                 if($this->http_encoding != ''){
    6801. 

  6801.                     $http->setEncoding($this->http_encoding);
    6802. 

  6802.                 }
    6803. 

  6803.                 $this->debug('sending message, length='.strlen($msg));
    6804. 

  6804.                 if(ereg('^http:',$this->endpoint)){
    6805. 

  6805.                 //if(strpos($this->endpoint,'http:')){
    6806. 

  6806.                     $this->responseData = $http->send($msg,$timeout,$response_timeout,$this->cookies);
    6807. 

  6807.                 } elseif(ereg('^https',$this->endpoint)){
    6808. 

  6808.                 //} elseif(strpos($this->endpoint,'https:')){
    6809. 

  6809.                     //if(phpversion() == '4.3.0-dev'){
    6810. 

  6810.                         //$response = $http->send($msg,$timeout,$response_timeout);
    6811. 

  6811.                            //$this->request = $http->outgoing_payload;
    6812. 

  6812.                         //$this->response = $http->incoming_payload;
    6813. 

  6813.                     //} else
    6814. 

  6814.                     $this->responseData = $http->sendHTTPS($msg,$timeout,$response_timeout,$this->cookies);
    6815. 

  6815.                 } else {
    6816. 

  6816.                     $this->setError('no http/s in endpoint url');
    6817. 

  6817.                 }
    6818. 

  6818.                 $this->request = $http->outgoing_payload;
    6819. 

  6819.                 $this->response = $http->incoming_payload;
    6820. 

  6820.                 $this->appendDebug($http->getDebug());
    6821. 

  6821.                 $this->UpdateCookies($http->incoming_cookies);
    6822. 

  6822.  
    6823. 

  6823.                 // save transport object if using persistent connections
    6824. 

  6824.                 if ($this->persistentConnection) {
    6825. 

  6825.                     $http->clearDebug();
    6826. 

  6826.                     if (!is_object($this->persistentConnection)) {
    6827. 

  6827.                         $this->persistentConnection = $http;
    6828. 

  6828.                     }
    6829. 

  6829.                 }
    6830. 

  6830.                 
    6831. 

  6831.                 if($err = $http->getError()){
    6832. 

  6832.                     $this->setError('HTTP Error: '.$err);
    6833. 

  6833.                     return false;
    6834. 

  6834.                 } elseif($this->getError()){
    6835. 

  6835.                     return false;
    6836. 

  6836.                 } else {
    6837. 

  6837.                     $this->debug('got response, length='. strlen($this->responseData).' type='.$http->incoming_headers['content-type']);
    6838. 

  6838.                     return $this->parseResponse($http->incoming_headers, $this->responseData);
    6839. 

  6839.                 }
    6840. 

  6840.             break;
    6841. 

  6841.             default:
    6842. 

  6842.                 $this->setError('no transport found, or selected transport is not yet supported!');
    6843. 

  6843.             return false;
    6844. 

  6844.             break;
    6845. 

  6845.         }
    6846. 

  6846.     }
    6847. 

  6847.  
    6848. 

  6848.     /**
    6849. 

  6849.     * processes SOAP message returned from server
    6850. 

  6850.     *
    6851. 

  6851.     * @param    array    $headers    The HTTP headers
    6852. 

  6852.     * @param    string    $data        unprocessed response data from server
    6853. 

  6853.     * @return    mixed    value of the message, decoded into a PHP type
    6854. 

  6854.     * @access   private
    6855. 

  6855.     */
    6856. 

  6856.     function parseResponse($headers, $data) {
    6857. 

  6857.         $this->debug('Entering parseResponse() for data of length ' . strlen($data) . ' and type ' . $headers['content-type']);
    6858. 

  6858.         if (!strstr($headers['content-type'], 'text/xml')) {
    6859. 

  6859.             $this->setError('Response not of type text/xml');
    6860. 

  6860.             return false;
    6861. 

  6861.         }
    6862. 

  6862.         if (strpos($headers['content-type'], '=')) {
    6863. 

  6863.             $enc = str_replace('"', '', substr(strstr($headers["content-type"], '='), 1));
    6864. 

  6864.             $this->debug('Got response encoding: ' . $enc);
    6865. 

  6865.             if(eregi('^(ISO-8859-1|US-ASCII|UTF-8)$',$enc)){
    6866. 

  6866.                 $this->xml_encoding = strtoupper($enc);
    6867. 

  6867.             } else {
    6868. 

  6868.                 $this->xml_encoding = 'US-ASCII';
    6869. 

  6869.             }
    6870. 

  6870.         } else {
    6871. 

  6871.             // should be US-ASCII for HTTP 1.0 or ISO-8859-1 for HTTP 1.1
    6872. 

  6872.             $this->xml_encoding = 'ISO-8859-1';
    6873. 

  6873.         }
    6874. 

  6874.         $this->debug('Use encoding: ' . $this->xml_encoding . ' when creating soap_parser');
    6875. 

  6875.         $parser = new soap_parser($data,$this->xml_encoding,$this->operation,$this->decode_utf8);
    6876. 

  6876.         // add parser debug data to our debug
    6877. 

  6877.         $this->appendDebug($parser->getDebug());
    6878. 

  6878.         // if parse errors
    6879. 

  6879.         if($errstr = $parser->getError()){
    6880. 

  6880.             $this->setError( $errstr);
    6881. 

  6881.             // destroy the parser object
    6882. 

  6882.             unset($parser);
    6883. 

  6883.             return false;
    6884. 

  6884.         } else {
    6885. 

  6885.             // get SOAP headers
    6886. 

  6886.             $this->responseHeaders = $parser->getHeaders();
    6887. 

  6887.             // get decoded message
    6888. 

  6888.             $return = $parser->get_response();
    6889. 

  6889.             // add document for doclit support
    6890. 

  6890.             $this->document = $parser->document;
    6891. 

  6891.             // destroy the parser object
    6892. 

  6892.             unset($parser);
    6893. 

  6893.             // return decode message
    6894. 

  6894.             return $return;
    6895. 

  6895.         }
    6896. 

  6896.      }
    6897. 

  6897.  
    6898. 

  6898.     /**
    6899. 

  6899.     * sets the SOAP endpoint, which can override WSDL
    6900. 

  6900.     *
    6901. 

  6901.     * @param    $endpoint string The endpoint URL to use, or empty string or false to prevent override
    6902. 

  6902.     * @access   public
    6903. 

  6903.     */
    6904. 

  6904.     function setEndpoint($endpoint) {
    6905. 

  6905.         $this->forceEndpoint = $endpoint;
    6906. 

  6906.     }
    6907. 

  6907.  
    6908. 

  6908.     /**
    6909. 

  6909.     * set the SOAP headers
    6910. 

  6910.     *
    6911. 

  6911.     * @param    $headers mixed String of XML with SOAP header content, or array of soapval objects for SOAP headers
    6912. 

  6912.     * @access   public
    6913. 

  6913.     */
    6914. 

  6914.     function setHeaders($headers){
    6915. 

  6915.         $this->requestHeaders = $headers;
    6916. 

  6916.     }
    6917. 

  6917.  
    6918. 

  6918.     /**
    6919. 

  6919.     * get the SOAP response headers (namespace resolution incomplete)
    6920. 

  6920.     *
    6921. 

  6921.     * @return    string 
    6922. 

  6922.     * @access   public
    6923. 

  6923.     */
    6924. 

  6924.     function getHeaders(){
    6925. 

  6925.         return $this->responseHeaders;
    6926. 

  6926.     }
    6927. 

  6927.  
    6928. 

  6928.     /**
    6929. 

  6929.     * set proxy info here
    6930. 

  6930.     *
    6931. 

  6931.     * @param    string $proxyhost 
    6932. 

  6932.     * @param    string $proxyport 
    6933. 

  6933.     * @param    string $proxyusername 
    6934. 

  6934.     * @param    string $proxypassword 
    6935. 

  6935.     * @access   public
    6936. 

  6936.     */
    6937. 

  6937.     function setHTTPProxy($proxyhost, $proxyport, $proxyusername = '', $proxypassword = '') {
    6938. 

  6938.         $this->proxyhost = $proxyhost;
    6939. 

  6939.         $this->proxyport = $proxyport;
    6940. 

  6940.         $this->proxyusername = $proxyusername;
    6941. 

  6941.         $this->proxypassword = $proxypassword;
    6942. 

  6942.     }
    6943. 

  6943.  
    6944. 

  6944.     /**
    6945. 

  6945.     * if authenticating, set user credentials here
    6946. 

  6946.     *
    6947. 

  6947.     * @param    string $username 
    6948. 

  6948.     * @param    string $password 
    6949. 

  6949.     * @param    string $authtype (basic|digest|certificate)
    6950. 

  6950.     * @param    array $certRequest (keys must be cainfofile (optional), sslcertfile, sslkeyfile, passphrase, verifypeer (optional), verifyhost (optional): see corresponding options in cURL docs)
    6951. 

  6951.     * @access   public
    6952. 

  6952.     */
    6953. 

  6953.     function setCredentials($username, $password, $authtype = 'basic', $certRequest = array()) {
    6954. 

  6954.         $this->username = $username;
    6955. 

  6955.         $this->password = $password;
    6956. 

  6956.         $this->authtype = $authtype;
    6957. 

  6957.         $this->certRequest = $certRequest;
    6958. 

  6958.     }
    6959. 

  6959.     
    6960. 

  6960.     /**
    6961. 

  6961.     * use HTTP encoding
    6962. 

  6962.     *
    6963. 

  6963.     * @param    string $enc 
    6964. 

  6964.     * @access   public
    6965. 

  6965.     */
    6966. 

  6966.     function setHTTPEncoding($enc='gzip, deflate'){
    6967. 

  6967.         $this->http_encoding = $enc;
    6968. 

  6968.     }
    6969. 

  6969.     
    6970. 

  6970.     /**
    6971. 

  6971.     * use HTTP persistent connections if possible
    6972. 

  6972.     *
    6973. 

  6973.     * @access   public
    6974. 

  6974.     */
    6975. 

  6975.     function useHTTPPersistentConnection(){
    6976. 

  6976.         $this->persistentConnection = true;
    6977. 

  6977.     }
    6978. 

  6978.     
    6979. 

  6979.     /**
    6980. 

  6980.     * gets the default RPC parameter setting.
    6981. 

  6981.     * If true, default is that call params are like RPC even for document style.
    6982. 

  6982.     * Each call() can override this value.
    6983. 

  6983.     *
    6984. 

  6984.     * This is no longer used.
    6985. 

  6985.     *
    6986. 

  6986.     * @return boolean 
    6987. 

  6987.     * @access public
    6988. 

  6988.     * @deprecated
    6989. 

  6989.     */
    6990. 

  6990.     function getDefaultRpcParams() {
    6991. 

  6991.         return $this->defaultRpcParams;
    6992. 

  6992.     }
    6993. 

  6993.  
    6994. 

  6994.     /**
    6995. 

  6995.     * sets the default RPC parameter setting.
    6996. 

  6996.     * If true, default is that call params are like RPC even for document style
    6997. 

  6997.     * Each call() can override this value.
    6998. 

  6998.     *
    6999. 

  6999.     * This is no longer used.
    7000. 

  7000.     *
    7001. 

  7001.     * @param    boolean $rpcParams 
    7002. 

  7002.     * @access public
    7003. 

  7003.     * @deprecated
    7004. 

  7004.     */
    7005. 

  7005.     function setDefaultRpcParams($rpcParams) {
    7006. 

  7006.         $this->defaultRpcParams = $rpcParams;
    7007. 

  7007.     }
    7008. 

  7008.     
    7009. 

  7009.     /**
    7010. 

  7010.     * dynamically creates an instance of a proxy class,
    7011. 

  7011.     * allowing user to directly call methods from wsdl
    7012. 

  7012.     *
    7013. 

  7013.     * @return   object soap_proxy object
    7014. 

  7014.     * @access   public
    7015. 

  7015.     */
    7016. 

  7016.     function getProxy(){
    7017. 

  7017.         $r = rand();
    7018. 

  7018.         $evalStr = $this->_getProxyClassCode($r);
    7019. 

  7019.         //$this->debug("proxy class: $evalStr";
    7020. 

  7020.         // eval the class
    7021. 

  7021.         eval($evalStr);
    7022. 

  7022.         // instantiate proxy object
    7023. 

  7023.         eval("\$proxy = new soap_proxy_$r('');");
    7024. 

  7024.         // transfer current wsdl data to the proxy thereby avoiding parsing the wsdl twice
    7025. 

  7025.         $proxy->endpointType = 'wsdl';
    7026. 

  7026.         $proxy->wsdlFile = $this->wsdlFile;
    7027. 

  7027.         $proxy->wsdl = $this->wsdl;
    7028. 

  7028.         $proxy->operations = $this->operations;
    7029. 

  7029.         $proxy->defaultRpcParams = $this->defaultRpcParams;
    7030. 

  7030.         // transfer other state
    7031. 

  7031.         $proxy->username = $this->username;
    7032. 

  7032.         $proxy->password = $this->password;
    7033. 

  7033.         $proxy->authtype = $this->authtype;
    7034. 

  7034.         $proxy->proxyhost = $this->proxyhost;
    7035. 

  7035.         $proxy->proxyport = $this->proxyport;
    7036. 

  7036.         $proxy->proxyusername = $this->proxyusername;
    7037. 

  7037.         $proxy->proxypassword = $this->proxypassword;
    7038. 

  7038.         $proxy->timeout = $this->timeout;
    7039. 

  7039.         $proxy->response_timeout = $this->response_timeout;
    7040. 

  7040.         $proxy->http_encoding = $this->http_encoding;
    7041. 

  7041.         $proxy->persistentConnection = $this->persistentConnection;
    7042. 

  7042.         $proxy->requestHeaders = $this->requestHeaders;
    7043. 

  7043.         $proxy->soap_defencoding = $this->soap_defencoding;
    7044. 

  7044.         $proxy->endpoint = $this->endpoint;
    7045. 

  7045.         $proxy->forceEndpoint = $this->forceEndpoint;
    7046. 

  7046.         return $proxy;
    7047. 

  7047.     }
    7048. 

  7048.  
    7049. 

  7049.     /**
    7050. 

  7050.     * dynamically creates proxy class code
    7051. 

  7051.     *
    7052. 

  7052.     * @return   string PHP/NuSOAP code for the proxy class
    7053. 

  7053.     * @access   private
    7054. 

  7054.     */
    7055. 

  7055.     function _getProxyClassCode($r) {
    7056. 

  7056.         if ($this->endpointType != 'wsdl') {
    7057. 

  7057.             $evalStr = 'A proxy can only be created for a WSDL client';
    7058. 

  7058.             $this->setError($evalStr);
    7059. 

  7059.             return $evalStr;
    7060. 

  7060.         }
    7061. 

  7061.         $evalStr = '';
    7062. 

  7062.         foreach ($this->operations as $operation => $opData) {
    7063. 

  7063.             if ($operation != '') {
    7064. 

  7064.                 // create param string and param comment string
    7065. 

  7065.                 if (sizeof($opData['input']['parts']) > 0) {
    7066. 

  7066.                     $paramStr = '';
    7067. 

  7067.                     $paramArrayStr = '';
    7068. 

  7068.                     $paramCommentStr = '';
    7069. 

  7069.                     foreach ($opData['input']['parts'] as $name => $type) {
    7070. 

  7070.                         $paramStr .= "\$$name, ";
    7071. 

  7071.                         $paramArrayStr .= "'$name' => \$$name, ";
    7072. 

  7072.                         $paramCommentStr .= "$type \$$name, ";
    7073. 

  7073.                     }
    7074. 

  7074.                     $paramStr = substr($paramStr, 0, strlen($paramStr)-2);
    7075. 

  7075.                     $paramArrayStr = substr($paramArrayStr, 0, strlen($paramArrayStr)-2);
    7076. 

  7076.                     $paramCommentStr = substr($paramCommentStr, 0, strlen($paramCommentStr)-2);
    7077. 

  7077.                 } else {
    7078. 

  7078.                     $paramStr = '';
    7079. 

  7079.                     $paramCommentStr = 'void';
    7080. 

  7080.                 }
    7081. 

  7081.                 $opData['namespace'] = !isset($opData['namespace']) ? 'http://testuri.com' : $opData['namespace'];
    7082. 

  7082.                 $evalStr .= "// $paramCommentStr
    7083. 

  7083.     function " . str_replace('.', '__', $operation) . "($paramStr) {
    7084. 

  7084.         \$params = array($paramArrayStr);
    7085. 

  7085.         return \$this->call('$operation', \$params, '".$opData['namespace']."', '".(isset($opData['soapAction']) ? $opData['soapAction'] : '')."');
    7086. 

  7086.     }
    7087. 

  7087.     ";
    7088. 

  7088.                 unset($paramStr);
    7089. 

  7089.                 unset($paramCommentStr);
    7090. 

  7090.             }
    7091. 

  7091.         }
    7092. 

  7092.         $evalStr = 'class soap_proxy_'.$r.' extends soapclient {
    7093. 

  7093.     '.$evalStr.'
    7094. 

  7094. }';
    7095. 

  7095.         return $evalStr;
    7096. 

  7096.     }
    7097. 

  7097.  
    7098. 

  7098.     /**
    7099. 

  7099.     * dynamically creates proxy class code
    7100. 

  7100.     *
    7101. 

  7101.     * @return   string PHP/NuSOAP code for the proxy class
    7102. 

  7102.     * @access   public
    7103. 

  7103.     */
    7104. 

  7104.     function getProxyClassCode() {
    7105. 

  7105.         $r = rand();
    7106. 

  7106.         return $this->_getProxyClassCode($r);
    7107. 

  7107.     }
    7108. 

  7108.  
    7109. 

  7109.     /**
    7110. 

  7110.     * gets the HTTP body for the current request.
    7111. 

  7111.     *
    7112. 

  7112.     * @param string $soapmsg The SOAP payload
    7113. 

  7113.     * @return string The HTTP body, which includes the SOAP payload
    7114. 

  7114.     * @access private
    7115. 

  7115.     */
    7116. 

  7116.     function getHTTPBody($soapmsg) {
    7117. 

  7117.         return $soapmsg;
    7118. 

  7118.     }
    7119. 

  7119.     
    7120. 

  7120.     /**
    7121. 

  7121.     * gets the HTTP content type for the current request.
    7122. 

  7122.     *
    7123. 

  7123.     * Note: getHTTPBody must be called before this.
    7124. 

  7124.     *
    7125. 

  7125.     * @return string the HTTP content type for the current request.
    7126. 

  7126.     * @access private
    7127. 

  7127.     */
    7128. 

  7128.     function getHTTPContentType() {
    7129. 

  7129.         return 'text/xml';
    7130. 

  7130.     }
    7131. 

  7131.     
    7132. 

  7132.     /**
    7133. 

  7133.     * gets the HTTP content type charset for the current request.
    7134. 

  7134.     * returns false for non-text content types.
    7135. 

  7135.     *
    7136. 

  7136.     * Note: getHTTPBody must be called before this.
    7137. 

  7137.     *
    7138. 

  7138.     * @return string the HTTP content type charset for the current request.
    7139. 

  7139.     * @access private
    7140. 

  7140.     */
    7141. 

  7141.     function getHTTPContentTypeCharset() {
    7142. 

  7142.         return $this->soap_defencoding;
    7143. 

  7143.     }
    7144. 

  7144.  
    7145. 

  7145.     /*
    7146. 

  7146.     * whether or not parser should decode utf8 element content
    7147. 

  7147.     *
    7148. 

  7148.     * @return   always returns true
    7149. 

  7149.     * @access   public
    7150. 

  7150.     */
    7151. 

  7151.     function decodeUTF8($bool){
    7152. 

  7152.         $this->decode_utf8 = $bool;
    7153. 

  7153.         return true;
    7154. 

  7154.     }
    7155. 

  7155.  
    7156. 

  7156.     /**
    7157. 

  7157.      * adds a new Cookie into $this->cookies array
    7158. 

  7158.      *
    7159. 

  7159.      * @param    string $name Cookie Name
    7160. 

  7160.      * @param    string $value Cookie Value
    7161. 

  7161.      * @return    if cookie-set was successful returns true, else false
    7162. 

  7162.      * @access    public
    7163. 

  7163.      */
    7164. 

  7164.     function setCookie($name, $value) {
    7165. 

  7165.         if (strlen($name) == 0) {
    7166. 

  7166.             return false;
    7167. 

  7167.         }
    7168. 

  7168.         $this->cookies[] = array('name' => $name, 'value' => $value);
    7169. 

  7169.         return true;
    7170. 

  7170.     }
    7171. 

  7171.  
    7172. 

  7172.     /**
    7173. 

  7173.      * gets all Cookies
    7174. 

  7174.      *
    7175. 

  7175.      * @return   array with all internal cookies
    7176. 

  7176.      * @access   public
    7177. 

  7177.      */
    7178. 

  7178.     function getCookies() {
    7179. 

  7179.         return $this->cookies;
    7180. 

  7180.     }
    7181. 

  7181.  
    7182. 

  7182.     /**
    7183. 

  7183.      * checks all Cookies and delete those which are expired
    7184. 

  7184.      *
    7185. 

  7185.      * @return   always return true
    7186. 

  7186.      * @access   private
    7187. 

  7187.      */
    7188. 

  7188.     function checkCookies() {
    7189. 

  7189.         if (sizeof($this->cookies) == 0) {
    7190. 

  7190.             return true;
    7191. 

  7191.         }
    7192. 

  7192.         $this->debug('checkCookie: check ' . sizeof($this->cookies) . ' cookies');
    7193. 

  7193.         $curr_cookies = $this->cookies;
    7194. 

  7194.         $this->cookies = array();
    7195. 

  7195.         foreach ($curr_cookies as $cookie) {
    7196. 

  7196.             if (! is_array($cookie)) {
    7197. 

  7197.                 $this->debug('Remove cookie that is not an array');
    7198. 

  7198.                 continue;
    7199. 

  7199.             }
    7200. 

  7200.             if ((isset($cookie['expires'])) && (! empty($cookie['expires']))) {
    7201. 

  7201.                 if (strtotime($cookie['expires']) > time()) {
    7202. 

  7202.                     $this->cookies[] = $cookie;
    7203. 

  7203.                 } else {
    7204. 

  7204.                     $this->debug('Remove expired cookie ' . $cookie['name']);
    7205. 

  7205.                 }
    7206. 

  7206.             } else {
    7207. 

  7207.                 $this->cookies[] = $cookie;
    7208. 

  7208.             }
    7209. 

  7209.         }
    7210. 

  7210.         $this->debug('checkCookie: '.sizeof($this->cookies).' cookies left in array');
    7211. 

  7211.         return true;
    7212. 

  7212.     }
    7213. 

  7213.  
    7214. 

  7214.     /**
    7215. 

  7215.      * updates the current cookies with a new set
    7216. 

  7216.      *
    7217. 

  7217.      * @param    array $cookies new cookies with which to update current ones
    7218. 

  7218.      * @return    always return true
    7219. 

  7219.      * @access    private
    7220. 

  7220.      */
    7221. 

  7221.     function UpdateCookies($cookies) {
    7222. 

  7222.         if (sizeof($this->cookies) == 0) {
    7223. 

  7223.             // no existing cookies: take whatever is new
    7224. 

  7224.             if (sizeof($cookies) > 0) {
    7225. 

  7225.                 $this->debug('Setting new cookie(s)');
    7226. 

  7226.                 $this->cookies = $cookies;
    7227. 

  7227.             }
    7228. 

  7228.             return true;
    7229. 

  7229.         }
    7230. 

  7230.         if (sizeof($cookies) == 0) {
    7231. 

  7231.             // no new cookies: keep what we've got
    7232. 

  7232.             return true;
    7233. 

  7233.         }
    7234. 

  7234.         // merge
    7235. 

  7235.         foreach ($cookies as $newCookie) {
    7236. 

  7236.             if (!is_array($newCookie)) {
    7237. 

  7237.                 continue;
    7238. 

  7238.             }
    7239. 

  7239.             if ((!isset($newCookie['name'])) || (!isset($newCookie['value']))) {
    7240. 

  7240.                 continue;
    7241. 

  7241.             }
    7242. 

  7242.             $newName = $newCookie['name'];
    7243. 

  7243.  
    7244. 

  7244.             $found = false;
    7245. 

  7245.             for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->cookies); $i++) {
    7246. 

  7246.                 $cookie = $this->cookies[$i];
    7247. 

  7247.                 if (!is_array($cookie)) {
    7248. 

  7248.                     continue;
    7249. 

  7249.                 }
    7250. 

  7250.                 if (!isset($cookie['name'])) {
    7251. 

  7251.                     continue;
    7252. 

  7252.                 }
    7253. 

  7253.                 if ($newName != $cookie['name']) {
    7254. 

  7254.                     continue;
    7255. 

  7255.                 }
    7256. 

  7256.                 $newDomain = isset($newCookie['domain']) ? $newCookie['domain'] : 'NODOMAIN';
    7257. 

  7257.                 $domain = isset($cookie['domain']) ? $cookie['domain'] : 'NODOMAIN';
    7258. 

  7258.                 if ($newDomain != $domain) {
    7259. 

  7259.                     continue;
    7260. 

  7260.                 }
    7261. 

  7261.                 $newPath = isset($newCookie['path']) ? $newCookie['path'] : 'NOPATH';
    7262. 

  7262.                 $path = isset($cookie['path']) ? $cookie['path'] : 'NOPATH';
    7263. 

  7263.                 if ($newPath != $path) {
    7264. 

  7264.                     continue;
    7265. 

  7265.                 }
    7266. 

  7266.                 $this->cookies[$i] = $newCookie;
    7267. 

  7267.                 $found = true;
    7268. 

  7268.                 $this->debug('Update cookie ' . $newName . '=' . $newCookie['value']);
    7269. 

  7269.                 break;
    7270. 

  7270.             }
    7271. 

  7271.             if (! $found) {
    7272. 

  7272.                 $this->debug('Add cookie ' . $newName . '=' . $newCookie['value']);
    7273. 

  7273.                 $this->cookies[] = $newCookie;
    7274. 

  7274.             }
    7275. 

  7275.         }
    7276. 

  7276.         return true;
    7277. 

  7277.     }
    7278. 

  7278. }
    7279. 

  7279. ?>
    7280.

Documentation generated on Wed, 3 Aug 2005 21:29:33 -0400 by phpDocumentor 1.3.0RC3
